#define ICCDUMPPIXEL(n, pix)
 
#define ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT   ICCMTXSTEPDUMPFMT
 
#define IsCompatSpace(x, y)   ((x)==(y) || (IsSpacePCS(x) && IsSpacePCS(y)) || (IsSpaceMCS(x) && IsSpaceMCS(y))/* || (IsSpaceCMYK(x) && IsSpaceCMYK(y))*/)
 
#define IsCompatSpacePCS(x, y)
 
#define IsNChannelCompat(x, y)   ((IsSpaceNChannel(x) && icNumColorSpaceChannels(x)==icGetSpaceSamples(y)) || (IsSpaceNChannel(y) && icNumColorSpaceChannels(y)==icGetSpaceSamples(x)))
 
#define IsSpaceCMYK(x)   ((x)==icSigCmykData || (x)==icSig4colorData)
 
#define IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(x)   ((x)==icSigXYZPcsData || (x)==icSigLabPcsData)
 
#define IsSpaceDevicePCS(x)   ((x)==icSigDevXYZData || (x)==icSigDevLabData)
 
#define IsSpaceMCS(x)   (icGetColorSpaceType(x)==icSigSrcMCSChannelData)
 
#define IsSpaceNChannel(x)   (icGetColorSpaceType(x)==icSigNChannelData)
 
#define IsSpacePCS(x)   (IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(x) || IsSpaceSpectralPCS(x))

133{
134 if (v<0)
135 v = 0;
136 if (v>1.0)
137 v = 1.0;
138
139 return v;
140}
141
150icFloatNumber CIccPCSUtil::NegClip(icFloatNumber v)
151{
152 if (v<0)
153 v=0;
154
155 return v;
156}
157
166void CIccPCSUtil::LabToXyz(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip)
167{
168 icFloatNumber Lab[3];
169
170 memcpy(&Lab,Src,sizeof(Lab));
171
172 icLabFromPcs(Lab);
173
174 icLabtoXYZ(Lab);
175
176 icXyzToPcs(Lab);
177
178 if (!bNoClip) {
179 Dst[0] = UnitClip(Lab[0]);
180 Dst[1] = UnitClip(Lab[1]);
181 Dst[2] = UnitClip(Lab[2]);
182 }
183 else {
184 Dst[0] = Lab[0];
185 Dst[1] = Lab[1];
186 Dst[2] = Lab[2];
187 }
188}
189
190
199void CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip)
200{
201 icFloatNumber XYZ[3];
202
203
204 if (!bNoClip) {
205 XYZ[0] = UnitClip(Src[0]);
206 XYZ[1] = UnitClip(Src[1]);
207 XYZ[2] = UnitClip(Src[2]);
208 }
209 else {
210 XYZ[0] = Src[0];
211 XYZ[1] = Src[1];
212 XYZ[2] = Src[2];
213 }
214
215 icXyzFromPcs(XYZ);
216
217 icXYZtoLab(XYZ);
218
219 icLabToPcs(XYZ);
220
221 if (!bNoClip) {
222 Dst[0] = UnitClip(XYZ[0]);
223 Dst[1] = UnitClip(XYZ[1]);
224 Dst[2] = UnitClip(XYZ[2]);
225 }
226 else {
227 Dst[0] = XYZ[0];
228 Dst[1] = XYZ[1];
229 Dst[2] = XYZ[2];
230 }
231}
232
233
242void CIccPCSUtil::Lab2ToXyz(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip)
243{
244 Lab2ToLab4(Dst, Src, bNoClip);
245 LabToXyz(Dst, Dst, bNoClip);
246}
247
248
257void CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab2(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip)
258{
259 XyzToLab(Dst, Src, bNoClip);
260 Lab4ToLab2(Dst, Dst);
261}
262
263
272void CIccPCSUtil::Lab2ToLab4(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip)
273{
274 if (bNoClip) {
275 Dst[0] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[0] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
276 Dst[1] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[1] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
277 Dst[2] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[2] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
278 }
279 else {
280 Dst[0] = UnitClip((icFloatNumber)(Src[0] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f));
281 Dst[1] = UnitClip((icFloatNumber)(Src[1] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f));
282 Dst[2] = UnitClip((icFloatNumber)(Src[2] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f));
283 }
284}
285
294void CIccPCSUtil::Lab4ToLab2(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src)
295{
296 Dst[0] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[0] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
297 Dst[1] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[1] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
298 Dst[2] = (icFloatNumber)(Src[2] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
299}
300
301
310CIccCreateXformHintManager::~CIccCreateXformHintManager()
311{
312 if (m_pList) {
313 IIccCreateXformHintList::iterator i;
314
315 for (i=m_pList->begin(); i!=m_pList->end(); i++) {
316 if (i->ptr)
317 delete i->ptr;
318 }
319
320 delete m_pList;
321 }
322}
323
339bool CIccCreateXformHintManager::AddHint(IIccCreateXformHint* pHint)
340{
341 if (!m_pList) {
342 m_pList = new IIccCreateXformHintList;
343 }
344
345 if (pHint) {
346 if (GetHint(pHint->GetHintType())) {
347 delete pHint;
348 return false;
349 }
350 IIccCreateXformHintPtr Hint;
351 Hint.ptr = pHint;
352 m_pList->push_back(Hint);
353 return true;
354 }
355
356 return false;
357}
358
375bool CIccCreateXformHintManager::DeleteHint(IIccCreateXformHint* pHint)
376{
377 if (m_pList && pHint) {
378 IIccCreateXformHintList::iterator i;
379 for (i=m_pList->begin(); i!=m_pList->end(); i++) {
380 if (i->ptr) {
381 if (i->ptr == pHint) {
382 delete pHint;
383 pHint = NULL;
384 m_pList->erase(i);
385 return true;
386 }
387 }
388 }
389 }
390
391 return false;
392}
393
408IIccCreateXformHint* CIccCreateXformHintManager::GetHint(const char* hintName)
409{
410 IIccCreateXformHint* pHint=NULL;
411
412 if (m_pList) {
413 IIccCreateXformHintList::iterator i;
414 for (i=m_pList->begin(); i!=m_pList->end(); i++) {
415 if (i->ptr) {
416 if (!strcmp(i->ptr->GetHintType(), hintName)) {
417 pHint = i->ptr;
418 break;
419 }
420 }
421 }
422 }
423
424 return pHint;
425}
426
435CIccXform::CIccXform()
436{
437 m_pProfile = NULL;
438 m_bOwnsProfile = true;
439 m_bInput = true;
440 m_nIntent = icUnknownIntent;
441 m_pAdjustPCS = NULL;
442 m_bAdjustPCS = false;
443 m_bAbsToRel = false;
444 m_nMCS = icNoMCS;
445 m_bUseSpectralPCS = false;
446 m_bSrcPcsConversion = true;
447 m_bDstPcsConversion = true;
448 m_pConnectionConditions = NULL;
449 m_bDeleteEnvLooup = true;
450 m_pCmmEnvVarLookup = NULL;
451 m_nTagIntent = icPerceptual;
452 m_MediaXYZ = {};
453 m_nInterp = icInterpLinear;
454 m_bUseD2BTags = false;
455 m_bLuminanceMatching = false;
456 m_PCSOffset[0] = m_PCSOffset[1] = m_PCSOffset[2] = 0;
457}
458
459
468CIccXform::~CIccXform()
469{
470 if (m_pProfile && m_bOwnsProfile)
471 delete m_pProfile;
472
473 if (m_pAdjustPCS) {
474 delete m_pAdjustPCS;
475 }
476
477 if (m_pCmmEnvVarLookup && m_bDeleteEnvLooup) {
478 delete m_pCmmEnvVarLookup;
479 }
480
481}
482
483
484void CIccXform::DetachAll()
485{
486 m_pProfile = NULL;
487 m_bOwnsProfile = true;
488 m_pConnectionConditions = NULL;
489}
490
514CIccXform *CIccXform::Create(CIccProfile *pProfile,
515 bool bInput/* =true */,
516 icRenderingIntent nIntent/* =icUnknownIntent */,
517 icXformInterp nInterp/* =icInterpLinear */,
518 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
519 icXformLutType nLutType/* =icXformLutColor */,
520 bool bUseD2BTags/* =true */, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager/* =NULL */)
521{
522 CIccXform *rv = NULL;
523 icRenderingIntent nTagIntent = nIntent;
524 bool bUseSpectralPCS = false;
525 bool bAbsToRel = false;
526 bool bRelToAbs = false;
527 icMCSConnectionType nMCS = icNoMCS;
528 icXformLutType nUseLutType = nLutType;
529 bool bUseColorimeticTags = true;
530
531 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral) {
532 nUseLutType = icXformLutColor;
533 bUseD2BTags = true;
534 bUseColorimeticTags = false;
535 }
536 else if (nLutType == icXformLutColorimetric) {
537 nUseLutType = icXformLutColor;
538 }
539
540 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigColorEncodingClass) {
541 CIccProfile *pEncProfile;
542 if (icConvertEncodingProfile(pEncProfile, pProfile)!=icEncConvertOk)
543 return NULL;
544 delete pProfile;
545 pProfile = pEncProfile;
546 }
547 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigLinkClass/* && nIntent==icAbsoluteColorimetric*/) {
548 nIntent = icPerceptual;
549 }
550
551 if (nTagIntent == icUnknownIntent)
552 nTagIntent = icPerceptual;
553
554 switch (nUseLutType) {
555 case icXformLutColor:
556 if (bInput) {
557 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
558 if (bUseD2BTags) {
559 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType!=icXformLutColorimetric) {
560 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
561
562 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
563 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB1Tag);
564 if (pTag)
565 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
566 }
567 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icRelativeColorimetric) {
568 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB3Tag);
569 if (pTag) {
570 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
571 bAbsToRel = true;
572 }
573 }
574
575 if (pTag)
576 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
577
578 if (!pTag) {
579 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag);
580 }
581 if (!pTag) {
582 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB1Tag);
583 }
584 if (!pTag) {
585 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB3Tag);
586 if (pTag) {
587 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
588 bAbsToRel = true;
589 }
590 }
591 }
592 else if (pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV5) {
593 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
594
595 if (!pTag && nTagIntent ==icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
596 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB1Tag);
597 if (pTag)
598 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
599 }
600
601 //Apparently Using DtoB0 is not prescribed here by the v4 ICC Specification
602 if (!pTag && pProfile->m_Header.version >= icVersionNumberV5) {
603 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag);
604 }
605 }
606 }
607
608 if (bUseColorimeticTags) {
609 if (!pTag) {
610 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
611 }
612
613 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
614 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB1Tag);
615 if (pTag)
616 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
617 }
618 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icRelativeColorimetric) {
619 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB3Tag);
620 if (pTag) {
621 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
622 bAbsToRel = true;
623 }
624 }
625
626 if (!pTag) {
627 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB0Tag);
628 }
629 if (!pTag) {
630 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB1Tag);
631 }
632 if (!pTag) {
633 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB3Tag);
634 if (pTag) {
635 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
636 bAbsToRel = true;
637 }
638 }
639 }
640
641 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
642 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
643 pTag = NULL;
644
645 if (!pTag) {
646 if (pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV5) {
647 //Matrix/TRC profiles are deprecated in v5 profiles
648 if (pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigRgbData) {
649 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMatrixTRC, NULL, pHintManager);
650 }
651 else if (pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigGrayData) {
652 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMonochrome, NULL, pHintManager);
653 }
654 else
655 return NULL;
656 }
657 else
658 return NULL;
659 }
660 else if (pTag->GetType()==icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
661 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
662 }
663 else {
664 switch(pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace) {
665 case icSigXYZData:
666 case icSigLabData:
667 case icSigLuvData:
668 case icSigYCbCrData:
669 case icSigYxyData:
670 case icSigRgbData:
671 case icSigHsvData:
672 case icSigHlsData:
673 case icSigCmyData:
674 case icSig3colorData:
675 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
676 break;
677
678 case icSigCmykData:
679 case icSig4colorData:
680 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType4DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
681 break;
682
683 default:
684 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeNDLut, pTag, pHintManager);
685 break;
686 }
687 }
688 }
689 else {
690 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
691
692 if (nLutType == icXformLutColorimetric && pProfile->m_Header.version >= icVersionNumberV5) {
693 bUseD2BTags = false;
694 }
695
696 if (bUseD2BTags) {
697 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD0Tag + nTagIntent);
698
699 //Additional precedence not prescribed by the v4 ICC Specification
700 if (!pTag && pProfile->m_Header.version >= icVersionNumberV5) {
701 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD0Tag);
702
703 if (!pTag) {
704 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD1Tag);
705 if (pTag) {
706 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
707 if (nTagIntent==icAbsoluteColorimetric)
708 bRelToAbs = true;
709 }
710 }
711
712 if (!pTag) {
713 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD3Tag);
714 if (pTag) {
715 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
716 bAbsToRel = true;
717 }
718 }
719 }
720
721 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
722 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
723 pTag = NULL;
724
725 if (pTag)
726 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
727
728 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric && pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV5) {
729 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD1Tag);
730
731 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
732 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
733 pTag = NULL;
734
735 if (pTag)
736 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
737 }
738 }
739
740 if (bUseColorimeticTags) {
741
742 if (!pTag) {
743 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA0Tag + nTagIntent);
744 }
745
746 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
747 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA1Tag);
748 if (pTag)
749 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
750 }
751
752 if (!pTag) {
753 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA0Tag);
754 }
755
756 //Additional precedence not prescribed by the v4 ICC Specification
757 if (!pTag && pProfile->m_Header.version >= icVersionNumberV5) {
758
759 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA1Tag);
760 if (pTag) {
761 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
762 if (nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric)
763 bRelToAbs = true;
764 }
765
766 if (!pTag) {
767 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA3Tag);
768 if (pTag) {
769 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
770 bAbsToRel = true;
771 }
772 }
773 }
774 }
775
776 if (!pTag) {
777 if (pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV5) {
778 if (pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigRgbData) {
779 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMatrixTRC, pTag, pHintManager);
780 }
781 else if (pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigGrayData) {
782 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMonochrome, NULL, pHintManager);
783 }
784 else
785 return NULL;
786 }
787 else
788 return NULL;
789 }
790 else if (pTag->GetType()==icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
791 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
792 }
793 else {
794 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
795 case icSigXYZData:
796 case icSigLabData:
797 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
798 break;
799
800 default:
801 break;
802 }
803 }
804 }
805 break;
806
807 case icXformLutNamedColor:
808 {
809 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigNamedColor2Tag);
810 if (!pTag)
811 return NULL;
812
813 CIccCreateNamedColorXformHint* pNamedColorHint = new CIccCreateNamedColorXformHint();
814 pNamedColorHint->csPcs = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
815 pNamedColorHint->csDevice = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
816 pNamedColorHint->csSpectralPcs = pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
817 pNamedColorHint->spectralRange = pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange;
818 pNamedColorHint->biSpectralRange = pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange;
819 if (pHintManager) {
820 pHintManager->AddHint(pNamedColorHint);
821 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeNamedColor, pTag, pHintManager);
822 pHintManager->DeleteHint(pNamedColorHint);
823 }
824 else {
825 CIccCreateXformHintManager HintManager;
826 HintManager.AddHint(pNamedColorHint);
827 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeNamedColor, pTag, &HintManager);
828 }
829
830 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS)
831 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
832 }
833 break;
834
835 case icXformLutPreview:
836 {
837 bInput = false;
838 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigPreview0Tag + nTagIntent);
839 if (!pTag) {
840 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigPreview0Tag);
841 }
842 if (!pTag) {
843 return NULL;
844 }
845 else {
846 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
847 case icSigXYZData:
848 case icSigLabData:
849 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
850
851 default:
852 break;
853 }
854 }
855 }
856 break;
857
858 case icXformLutGamut:
859 {
860 bInput = false;
861 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigGamutTag);
862 if (!pTag) {
863 return NULL;
864 }
865 else {
866 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
867 case icSigXYZData:
868 case icSigLabData:
869 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
870
871 default:
872 break;
873 }
874 }
875 }
876 break;
877
878 case icXformLutBRDFParam:
879 {
880 // get the correct tag first
881
882 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
883 if (bUseD2BTags) {
884 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
885
886 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBrdfSpectralParameter0Tag + nTagIntent);
887
888 if (pTag)
889 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
890 }
891 }
892 else
893 {
894 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBrdfColorimetricParameter0Tag + nTagIntent);
895
896 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
897 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
898 pTag = NULL;
899 }
900
901 // now extract the correct part from the structure
902 CIccStructBRDF* pStructTag = dynamic_cast<CIccStructBRDF*>(pTag);
903
904 if (pStructTag != NULL)
905 {
906 CIccTag *pTag2 = NULL;
907
908 switch (nLutType) {
909 case icXformLutBRDFParam:
910 pTag2 = pStructTag->GetElem(icSigBrdfTransformMbr);
911 break;
912 default:
913 // can't get here, get rid of warning
914 break;
915 }
916 if (pTag2)
917 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag2, pHintManager);
918 }
919 }
920 break;
921
922 case icXformLutBRDFDirect:
923 {
924 // get the correct tag first
925
926 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
927 if (bUseD2BTags) {
928 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
929
930 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFDToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
931
932 if (pTag)
933 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
934 }
935 }
936 else
937 {
938 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFAToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
939
940 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
941 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
942 pTag = NULL;
943 }
944
945 if (pTag != NULL)
946 {
947 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
948 }
949 }
950 break;
951
952 case icXformLutBRDFMcsParam:
953 {
954 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
955 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigMaterialVisualizationClass) {
956 bInput = true;
957 nMCS = icFromMCS;
958
959 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
960 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS0Tag + nTagIntent);
961
962 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
963 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS1Tag);
964 if (pTag)
965 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
966 }
967 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
968 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS3Tag);
969 if (pTag) {
970 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
971 bAbsToRel = true;
972 }
973 }
974
975 if (!pTag) {
976 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS0Tag);
977 }
978 if (!pTag) {
979 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS1Tag);
980 }
981 if (!pTag) {
982 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToS3Tag);
983 if (pTag) {
984 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
985 bAbsToRel = true;
986 }
987 }
988
989 if (pTag)
990 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
991 }
992 if (!pTag && pProfile->m_Header.pcs != 0) {
993 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
994
995 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
996 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB1Tag);
997 if (pTag)
998 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
999 }
1000 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1001 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB3Tag);
1002 if (pTag) {
1003 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1004 bAbsToRel = true;
1005 }
1006 }
1007 if (!pTag) {
1008 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB0Tag);
1009 }
1010 if (!pTag) {
1011 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB1Tag);
1012 }
1013 if (!pTag) {
1014 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBRDFMToB3Tag);
1015 if (pTag) {
1016 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1017 bAbsToRel = true;
1018 }
1019 }
1020 }
1021
1022 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
1023 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
1024 pTag = NULL;
1025
1026 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
1027 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
1028 pTag = NULL;
1029 }
1030 if (pTag && pProfile->m_Header.mcs) {
1031 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
1032 }
1033 else
1034 rv = NULL;
1035 }
1036 break;
1037
1038 case icXformLutMCS:
1039 {
1040 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
1041 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialIdentificationClass ||
1042 pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigInputClass) {
1043 bInput = true;
1044 nMCS = icToMCS;
1045 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToM0Tag);
1046 }
1047 else if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialVisualizationClass) {
1048 bInput = true;
1049 nMCS = icFromMCS;
1050
1051 if (pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
1052 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS0Tag + nTagIntent);
1053
1054 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1055 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS1Tag);
1056 if (pTag)
1057 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
1058 }
1059 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1060 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS3Tag);
1061 if (pTag) {
1062 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1063 bAbsToRel = true;
1064 }
1065 }
1066
1067 if (!pTag) {
1068 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS0Tag);
1069 }
1070 if (!pTag) {
1071 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS1Tag);
1072 }
1073 if (!pTag) {
1074 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToS3Tag);
1075 if (pTag) {
1076 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1077 bAbsToRel = true;
1078 }
1079 }
1080
1081 if (pTag)
1082 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
1083 }
1084 if (!pTag && pProfile->m_Header.pcs!=0) {
1085 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
1086
1087 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1088 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB1Tag);
1089 if (pTag)
1090 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
1091 }
1092 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1093 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB3Tag);
1094 if (pTag) {
1095 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1096 bAbsToRel = true;
1097 }
1098 }
1099
1100 if (!pTag) {
1101 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB0Tag);
1102 }
1103 if (!pTag) {
1104 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB1Tag);
1105 }
1106 if (!pTag) {
1107 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToB3Tag);
1108 if (pTag) {
1109 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
1110 bAbsToRel = true;
1111 }
1112 }
1113 }
1114
1115 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
1116 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
1117 pTag = NULL;
1118 }
1119 else if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialLinkClass) {
1120 bInput = false;
1121 nMCS = icFromMCS;
1122 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigMToA0Tag);
1123 }
1124 if (pTag && pProfile->m_Header.mcs) {
1125 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
1126 }
1127 else
1128 rv = NULL;
1129 }
1130 break;
1131
1132 }
1133
1134 if (rv) {
1135 if (pPcc)
1136 rv->m_pConnectionConditions = pPcc;
1137 else
1138 rv->m_pConnectionConditions = pProfile;
1139
1140 rv->SetParams(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nTagIntent, bUseSpectralPCS, nInterp, pHintManager, bAbsToRel, nMCS);
1141 }
1142
1143 return rv;
1144}
1145
1169CIccXform *CIccXform::Create(CIccProfile *pProfile,
1170 CIccTag *pTag,
1171 bool bInput/* =true */,
1172 icRenderingIntent nIntent/* =icUnknownIntent */,
1173 icXformInterp nInterp/* =icInterpLinear */,
1174 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
1175 bool bUseSpectralPCS/* =false*/,
1176 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager/* =NULL */)
1177{
1178 CIccXform *rv = NULL;
1179 icRenderingIntent nTagIntent = nIntent;
1180 bool bAbsToRel = false;
1181 bool bRelToAbs = false;
1182 icMCSConnectionType nMCS = icNoMCS;
1183
1184 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigColorEncodingClass) {
1185 return NULL;
1186 }
1187
1188 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigLinkClass/* && nIntent==icAbsoluteColorimetric*/) {
1189 nIntent = icPerceptual;
1190 }
1191
1192 if (nTagIntent == icUnknownIntent)
1193 nTagIntent = icPerceptual;
1194
1195 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
1196 if (pTag == NULL)
1197 return NULL;
1198 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
1199 return NULL;
1200
1201 if (bInput) {
1202 if (pTag->GetType() == icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
1203 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
1204 }
1205 else {
1206 switch (pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace) {
1207 case icSigXYZData:
1208 case icSigLabData:
1209 case icSigLuvData:
1210 case icSigYCbCrData:
1211 case icSigYxyData:
1212 case icSigRgbData:
1213 case icSigHsvData:
1214 case icSigHlsData:
1215 case icSigCmyData:
1216 case icSig3colorData:
1217 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
1218 break;
1219
1220 case icSigCmykData:
1221 case icSig4colorData:
1222 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType4DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
1223 break;
1224
1225 default:
1226 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeNDLut, pTag, pHintManager);
1227 break;
1228 }
1229 }
1230 }
1231 else {
1232 if (pTag->GetType() == icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
1233 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformTypeMpe, pTag, pHintManager);
1234 }
1235 else {
1236 switch (pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
1237 case icSigXYZData:
1238 case icSigLabData:
1239 rv = CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(icXformType3DLut, pTag, pHintManager);
1240 break;
1241
1242 default:
1243 break;
1244 }
1245 }
1246 }
1247
1248 if (rv) {
1249 if (pPcc)
1250 rv->m_pConnectionConditions = pPcc;
1251 else
1252 rv->m_pConnectionConditions = pProfile;
1253
1254 rv->SetParams(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nTagIntent, bUseSpectralPCS, nInterp, pHintManager, bAbsToRel, nMCS);
1255 }
1256
1257 return rv;
1258}
1259
1273void CIccXform::SetParams(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput, icRenderingIntent nIntent, icRenderingIntent nTagIntent,
1274 bool bUseSpectralPCS, icXformInterp nInterp, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager/* =NULL */,
1275 bool bAbsToRel/*=false*/, icMCSConnectionType nMCS/*=icNoMCS*/)
1276{
1277 m_pProfile = pProfile;
1278 m_bInput = bInput;
1279 m_nIntent = nIntent;
1280 m_nTagIntent = nTagIntent;
1281 m_nInterp = nInterp;
1282 m_pAdjustPCS = NULL;
1283 m_bUseSpectralPCS = bUseSpectralPCS;
1284 m_bAbsToRel = bAbsToRel;
1285 m_nMCS = nMCS;
1286 m_bLuminanceMatching = false;
1287
1288 if (pHintManager) {
1289 IIccCreateXformHint *pHint=NULL;
1290
1291 pHint = pHintManager->GetHint("CIccCreateAdjustPCSXformHint");
1292 if (pHint) {
1293 CIccCreateAdjustPCSXformHint *pAdjustPCSHint = (CIccCreateAdjustPCSXformHint*)pHint;
1294 m_pAdjustPCS = pAdjustPCSHint->GetNewAdjustPCSXform();
1295 }
1296
1297 pHint = pHintManager->GetHint("CIccCreateCmmEnvVarXformHint");
1298 if (pHint) {
1299 CIccCreateCmmEnvVarXformHint *pCmmEnvVarHint = (CIccCreateCmmEnvVarXformHint*)pHint;
1300 m_pCmmEnvVarLookup = pCmmEnvVarHint->GetNewCmmEnvVarLookup();
1301 }
1302
1303 pHint = pHintManager->GetHint("CIccLuminanceMatchingHint");
1304 if (pHint) {
1305 m_bLuminanceMatching = true;
1306 }
1307 }
1308}
1309
1333CIccXform *CIccXform::Create(CIccProfile &Profile,
1334 bool bInput/* =true */,
1335 icRenderingIntent nIntent/* =icUnknownIntent */,
1336 icXformInterp nInterp/* =icInterpLinear */,
1337 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
1338 icXformLutType nLutType/* =icXformLutColor */,
1339 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags/* =true */,
1340 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager/* =NULL */)
1341{
1342 CIccProfile *pProfile = new CIccProfile(Profile);
1343 CIccXform *pXform = Create(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
1344
1345 if (!pXform)
1346 delete pProfile;
1347
1348 return pXform;
1349}
1350
1351
1363icStatusCMM CIccXform::Begin()
1364{
1365 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pCond = GetConnectionConditions();
1366
1367 icFloatNumber mediaXYZ[3];
1368 icFloatNumber illumXYZ[3];
1369
1370 if (m_nIntent==icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
1371 if (pCond) {
1372 pCond->getMediaWhiteXYZ(mediaXYZ);
1373
1374 m_MediaXYZ.X = icFtoF16(mediaXYZ[0]);
1375 m_MediaXYZ.Y = icFtoF16(mediaXYZ[1]);
1376 m_MediaXYZ.Z = icFtoF16(mediaXYZ[2]);
1377 }
1378 else {
1379 CIccTag *pTag = m_pProfile->FindTag(icSigMediaWhitePointTag);
1380
1381 if (!pTag || pTag->GetType()!=icSigXYZType)
1382 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
1383
1384 CIccTagXYZ *pXyzTag = (CIccTagXYZ*)pTag;
1385
1386 m_MediaXYZ = (*pXyzTag)[0];
1387 mediaXYZ[0] = icFtoD(m_MediaXYZ.X);
1388 mediaXYZ[1] = icFtoD(m_MediaXYZ.Y);
1389 mediaXYZ[2] = icFtoD(m_MediaXYZ.Z);
1390 }
1391 }
1392
1393 icXYZNumber illXYZ;
1394 if (pCond) {
1395 pCond->getNormIlluminantXYZ(illumXYZ);
1396 illXYZ.X = icDtoF(illumXYZ[0]);
1397 illXYZ.Y = icDtoF(illumXYZ[1]);
1398 illXYZ.Z = icDtoF(illumXYZ[2]);
1399 }
1400 else {
1401 illXYZ = m_pProfile->m_Header.illuminant;
1402 illumXYZ[0] = icFtoD(illXYZ.X);
1403 illumXYZ[1] = icFtoD(illXYZ.Y);
1404 illumXYZ[2] = icFtoD(illXYZ.Z);
1405 }
1406
1407 // set up for any needed PCS adjustment
1408 if (m_nIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric &&
1409 (m_MediaXYZ.X != illXYZ.X ||
1410 m_MediaXYZ.Y != illXYZ.Y ||
1411 m_MediaXYZ.Z != illXYZ.Z)) {
1412
1413 icColorSpaceSignature Space = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1414
1415 if (IsSpacePCS(Space)) {
1416 m_bAdjustPCS = true; // turn ON PCS adjustment
1417
1418 // scale factors depend upon media white point
1419 // set up for input transform
1420 if (!m_bInput) {
1421 m_PCSScale[0] = illumXYZ[0] / mediaXYZ[0];
1422 m_PCSScale[1] = illumXYZ[1] / mediaXYZ[1];
1423 m_PCSScale[2] = illumXYZ[2] / mediaXYZ[2];
1424 }
1425 else {
1426 m_PCSScale[0] = mediaXYZ[0] / illumXYZ[0];
1427 m_PCSScale[1] = mediaXYZ[1] / illumXYZ[1];
1428 m_PCSScale[2] = mediaXYZ[2] / illumXYZ[2];
1429
1430 }
1431
1432 m_PCSOffset[0] = 0.0;
1433 m_PCSOffset[1] = 0.0;
1434 m_PCSOffset[2] = 0.0;
1435 }
1436 }
1437 else if (m_nIntent == icPerceptual && (IsVersion2() || !HasPerceptualHandling())) {
1438 icColorSpaceSignature Space = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1439
1440 if (IsSpacePCS(Space) && m_pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass!=icSigAbstractClass) {
1441 m_bAdjustPCS = true; // turn ON PCS adjustment
1442
1443 // set up for input transform, which needs version 2 black point to version 4
1444 m_PCSScale[0] = (icFloatNumber) (1.0 - icPerceptualRefBlackX / icPerceptualRefWhiteX); // scale factors
1445 m_PCSScale[1] = (icFloatNumber) (1.0 - icPerceptualRefBlackY / icPerceptualRefWhiteY);
1446 m_PCSScale[2] = (icFloatNumber) (1.0 - icPerceptualRefBlackZ / icPerceptualRefWhiteZ);
1447
1448 m_PCSOffset[0] = (icFloatNumber) (icPerceptualRefBlackX * 32768.0 / 65535.0); // offset factors
1449 m_PCSOffset[1] = (icFloatNumber) (icPerceptualRefBlackY * 32768.0 / 65535.0);
1450 m_PCSOffset[2] = (icFloatNumber) (icPerceptualRefBlackZ * 32768.0 / 65535.0);
1451
1452 if (!m_bInput) { // output transform must convert version 4 black point to version 2
1453 m_PCSScale[0] = (icFloatNumber) 1.0 / m_PCSScale[0]; // invert scale factors
1454 m_PCSScale[1] = (icFloatNumber) 1.0 / m_PCSScale[1];
1455 m_PCSScale[2] = (icFloatNumber) 1.0 / m_PCSScale[2];
1456
1457 m_PCSOffset[0] = - m_PCSOffset[0] * m_PCSScale[0]; // negate offset factors
1458 m_PCSOffset[1] = - m_PCSOffset[1] * m_PCSScale[1];
1459 m_PCSOffset[2] = - m_PCSOffset[2] * m_PCSScale[2];
1460 }
1461 }
1462 }
1463
1464
1465 if (m_pAdjustPCS) {
1466 CIccProfile ProfileCopy(*m_pProfile);
1467
1468 // need to read in all the tags, so that a copy of the profile can be made
1469 if (!ProfileCopy.ReadTags(m_pProfile)) {
1470 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
1471 }
1472
1473 if (!m_pAdjustPCS->CalcFactors(&ProfileCopy, this, m_PCSScale, m_PCSOffset)) {
1474 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
1475 }
1476
1477 m_bAdjustPCS = true;
1478 delete m_pAdjustPCS;
1479 m_pAdjustPCS = NULL;
1480 }
1481
1482 return icCmmStatOk;
1483}
1484
1494CIccApplyXform *CIccXform::GetNewApply(icStatusCMM &status)
1495{
1496 CIccApplyXform *rv = new CIccApplyXform(this);
1497
1498 if (!rv) {
1499 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
1500 return NULL;
1501 }
1502
1503 status = icCmmStatOk;
1504 return rv;
1505}
1506
1521void CIccXform::AdjustPCS(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
1522{
1523 icColorSpaceSignature Space = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1524
1525 if (Space==icSigLabData) {
1526 if (UseLegacyPCS()) {
1527 CIccPCSUtil::Lab2ToXyz(DstPixel, SrcPixel, true);
1528 }
1529 else {
1530 CIccPCSUtil::LabToXyz(DstPixel, SrcPixel, true);
1531 }
1532 }
1533 else {
1534 DstPixel[0] = SrcPixel[0];
1535 DstPixel[1] = SrcPixel[1];
1536 DstPixel[2] = SrcPixel[2];
1537 }
1538
1539 DstPixel[0] = DstPixel[0] * m_PCSScale[0] + m_PCSOffset[0];
1540 DstPixel[1] = DstPixel[1] * m_PCSScale[1] + m_PCSOffset[1];
1541 DstPixel[2] = DstPixel[2] * m_PCSScale[2] + m_PCSOffset[2];
1542
1543 if (Space==icSigLabData) {
1544 if (UseLegacyPCS()) {
1545
1546 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab2(DstPixel, DstPixel, true);
1547 }
1548 else {
1549 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab(DstPixel, DstPixel, true);
1550 }
1551 }
1552#ifndef SAMPLEICC_NOCLIPLABTOXYZ
1553 else {
1554 DstPixel[0] = CIccPCSUtil::NegClip(DstPixel[0]);
1555 DstPixel[1] = CIccPCSUtil::NegClip(DstPixel[1]);
1556 DstPixel[2] = CIccPCSUtil::NegClip(DstPixel[2]);
1557 }
1558#endif
1559}
1560
1577const icFloatNumber *CIccXform::CheckSrcAbs(CIccApplyXform *pApply, const icFloatNumber *Pixel) const
1578{
1579 if (m_bAdjustPCS && !m_bInput) {
1580 icFloatNumber *pAbsLab = pApply->m_AbsLab;
1581 AdjustPCS(pAbsLab, Pixel);
1582 return pAbsLab;
1583 }
1584
1585 return Pixel;
1586}
1587
1602void CIccXform::CheckDstAbs(icFloatNumber *Pixel) const
1603{
1604 if (m_bAdjustPCS && m_bInput) {
1605 AdjustPCS(Pixel, Pixel);
1606 }
1607}
1608
1620icColorSpaceSignature CIccXform::GetSrcSpace() const
1621{
1622 icColorSpaceSignature rv;
1623 icProfileClassSignature deviceClass = m_pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass;
1624
1625 if (m_bInput) {
1626 if (m_bPcsAdjustXform)
1627 rv = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1628 else {
1629 rv = m_pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
1630
1631 if (deviceClass != icSigAbstractClass) {
1632 //convert signature to device colorspace signature (avoid confusion about encoding).
1633 if (rv == icSigXYZData) {
1634 rv = icSigDevXYZData;
1635 }
1636 else if (rv == icSigLabData) {
1637 rv = icSigDevLabData;
1638 }
1639 }
1640 }
1641 }
1642 else if (!m_bUseSpectralPCS || !m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
1643 rv = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1644 }
1645 else {
1646 rv = icGetColorSpaceType(m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS);
1647 }
1648
1649 return rv;
1650}
1651
1663icUInt16Number CIccXform::GetNumSrcSamples() const
1664{
1665 icUInt16Number rv;
1666
1667 if (m_nMCS==icFromMCS) {
1668 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples((icColorSpaceSignature)m_pProfile->m_Header.mcs);
1669 }
1670 else if (m_bInput) {
1671 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace);
1672 }
1673 else if (!m_bUseSpectralPCS || !m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
1674 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs);
1675 }
1676 else {
1677 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpectralSpaceSamples(&m_pProfile->m_Header);
1678 }
1679
1680 return rv;
1681}
1682
1694icColorSpaceSignature CIccXform::GetDstSpace() const
1695{
1696 icColorSpaceSignature rv;
1697 icProfileClassSignature deviceClass = m_pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass;
1698
1699 if (m_nMCS==icToMCS) {
1700 rv = (icColorSpaceSignature)m_pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
1701 }
1702 else if (m_bInput) {
1703 if (m_bUseSpectralPCS && m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS)
1704 rv = icGetColorSpaceType(m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS);
1705 else
1706 rv = m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
1707 }
1708 else {
1709 rv = m_pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
1710
1711 //convert signature to device colorspace signature (avoid confusion about encoding).
1712 if (deviceClass != icSigAbstractClass) {
1713 if (rv==icSigXYZData) {
1714 rv = icSigDevXYZData;
1715 }
1716 else if (rv==icSigLabData) {
1717 rv = icSigDevLabData;
1718 }
1719 }
1720 }
1721
1722 return rv;
1723}
1724
1736icUInt16Number CIccXform::GetNumDstSamples() const
1737{
1738 icUInt16Number rv;
1739
1740 if (m_nMCS==icToMCS) {
1741 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples((icColorSpaceSignature)m_pProfile->m_Header.mcs);
1742 }
1743 else if (!m_bInput) {
1744 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace);
1745 }
1746 else if (!m_bUseSpectralPCS || !m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
1747 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs);
1748 }
1749 else {
1750 rv = (icUInt16Number)icGetSpectralSpaceSamples(&m_pProfile->m_Header);
1751 }
1752
1753 return rv;
1754}
1755
1756
1765CIccApplyXform::CIccApplyXform(CIccXform *pXform) : m_AbsLab{}
1766{
1767 m_pXform = pXform;
1768}
1769
1778CIccApplyXform::~CIccApplyXform()
1779{
1780}
1781
1782
1791CIccApplyNDLutXform::CIccApplyNDLutXform(CIccXformNDLut* pXform, CIccApplyCLUT *pApply) : CIccApplyXform(pXform)
1792{
1793 m_pApply = pApply;
1794}
1795
1796
1805CIccApplyNDLutXform::~CIccApplyNDLutXform()
1806{
1807 if (m_pApply)
1808 delete m_pApply;
1809}
1810
1811
1820CIccApplyPcsXform::CIccApplyPcsXform(CIccXform *pXform) : CIccApplyXform(pXform)
1821{
1822 m_list = new CIccApplyPcsStepList();
1823 m_temp1 = NULL;
1824 m_temp2 = NULL;
1825}
1826
1835CIccApplyPcsXform::~CIccApplyPcsXform()
1836{
1837
1838 if (m_list) {
1839 CIccApplyPcsStepList::iterator i;
1840 for (i=m_list->begin(); i!=m_list->end(); i++) {
1841 if (i->ptr)
1842 delete i->ptr;
1843 }
1844
1845 delete m_list;
1846 }
1847
1848 if (m_temp1)
1849 delete [] m_temp1;
1850 if (m_temp2)
1851 delete [] m_temp2;
1852}
1853
1862bool CIccApplyPcsXform::Init()
1863{
1864 CIccPcsXform *pXform = (CIccPcsXform*)m_pXform;
1865 icUInt16Number nChan = pXform->MaxChannels();
1866
1867 if (nChan) {
1868 m_temp1 = new icFloatNumber[nChan];
1869 m_temp2 = new icFloatNumber[nChan];
1870 }
1871
1872 return m_temp1!=NULL && m_temp2!=NULL;
1873}
1874
1875
1876void CIccApplyPcsXform::AppendApplyStep(CIccApplyPcsStep *pStep)
1877{
1878 CIccApplyPcsStepPtr ptr;
1879
1880 if (pStep && m_list) {
1881 ptr.ptr = pStep;
1882 m_list->push_back(ptr);
1883 }
1884}
1885
1886
1895CIccPcsXform::CIccPcsXform()
1896{
1897 m_list = new CIccPcsStepList();
1898
1899 m_srcSpace = icSigUnknownData;
1900 m_nSrcSamples = 0;
1901
1902 m_dstSpace = icSigUnknownData;
1903 m_nDstSamples = 0;
1904}
1905
1914CIccPcsXform::~CIccPcsXform()
1915{
1916 if (m_list) {
1917 CIccPcsStepList::iterator step;
1918 for (step=m_list->begin(); step!=m_list->end(); step++) {
1919 if (step->ptr) {
1920 delete step->ptr;
1921 step->ptr = NULL;
1922 }
1923 }
1924 delete m_list;
1925 }
1926}
1927
1937icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::Connect(CIccXform *pFromXform, CIccXform *pToXform)
1938{
1939 icStatusCMM stat;
1940
1941 if (!pFromXform || !pToXform)
1942 return icCmmStatBadXform;
1943
1944 if (pFromXform->IsMCS() && pToXform->IsMCS()) {
1945 CIccProfile *pFromProfile = pFromXform->GetProfilePtr();
1946 CIccProfile *pToProfile = pToXform->GetProfilePtr();
1947
1948 if (!pFromProfile || !pToProfile) {
1949 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
1950 }
1951 CIccTagArray *pFromChannels = (CIccTagArray*)(pFromProfile->FindTagOfType(icSigMaterialTypeArrayTag, icSigTagArrayType));
1952 CIccTagArray *pToChannels = (CIccTagArray*)(pToProfile->FindTagOfType(icSigMaterialTypeArrayTag, icSigTagArrayType));
1953
1954 if (!pFromChannels || !pToChannels) {
1955 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
1956 }
1957 if (pFromChannels->GetTagArrayType()!=icSigUtf8TextTypeArray ||
1958 pToChannels->GetTagArrayType()!=icSigUtf8TextTypeArray ||
1959 !pFromChannels->AreAllOfType(icSigUtf8TextType) ||
1960 !pToChannels->AreAllOfType(icSigUtf8TextType)) {
1961 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
1962 }
1963
1964 m_nSrcSamples = pFromXform->GetNumDstSamples();
1965 m_nDstSamples = pToXform->GetNumSrcSamples();
1966
1967 if (pFromChannels->GetSize() != m_nSrcSamples || pToChannels->GetSize() != m_nDstSamples) {
1968 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
1969 }
1970 int i, j;
1971
1972 if (pFromProfile->m_Header.flags&icMCSNeedsSubsetTrue) {
1973 for (i=0; i<m_nSrcSamples; i++) {
1974 const icUChar *szSrcChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)pFromChannels->GetIndex(i))->GetText();
1975 for (j=0; j<m_nDstSamples; j++) {
1976 const icUChar *szDstChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)pToChannels->GetIndex(i))->GetText();
1977 if (!icUtf8StrCmp(szSrcChan, szDstChan))
1978 break;
1979 }
1980 if (j==m_nDstSamples)
1981 return icCmmStatBadMCSLink;
1982 }
1983 }
1984
1985 if (pToProfile->m_Header.flags&icMCSNeedsSubsetTrue) {
1986 for (i=0; i<m_nDstSamples; i++) {
1987 const icUChar *szDstChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)pToChannels->GetIndex(i))->GetText();
1988 for (j=0; j<m_nSrcSamples; j++) {
1989 const icUChar *szSrcChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)pFromChannels->GetIndex(i))->GetText();
1990 if (!icUtf8StrCmp(szSrcChan, szDstChan))
1991 break;
1992 }
1993 if (j==m_nSrcSamples)
1994 return icCmmStatBadMCSLink;
1995 }
1996 }
1997 CIccTag *pTag = pToProfile->FindTag(icSigMaterialDefaultValuesTag);
1998 CIccTagNumArray *pDefaults = NULL;
1999 if (pTag && pTag->IsNumArrayType()) {
2000 pDefaults = (CIccTagNumArray *)pTag;
2001 }
2002
2003 pushRouteMcs(pFromChannels, pToChannels, pDefaults);
2004 }
2005 else {
2006 if (!pFromXform->IsInput() || (pToXform->IsInput() && !pToXform->IsAbstract())) {
2007 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
2008 }
2009
2010 m_srcSpace = pFromXform->GetDstSpace();
2011 if (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(m_srcSpace))
2012 m_srcSpace = icGetColorSpaceType(m_srcSpace);
2013
2014 m_nSrcSamples = pFromXform->GetNumDstSamples();
2015
2016 m_dstSpace = pToXform->GetSrcSpace();
2017 if (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(m_dstSpace))
2018 m_dstSpace = icGetColorSpaceType(m_dstSpace);
2019
2020 m_nDstSamples = pToXform->GetNumSrcSamples();
2021
2022 switch (m_srcSpace) {
2023 case icSigLabPcsData:
2024 switch (m_dstSpace) {
2025 case icSigLabPcsData:
2026 if (pFromXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2027 pushLab2ToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2028 else
2029 pushLabToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2030 if (pFromXform->NeedAdjustDstPCS()) {
2031 pushScale3(pFromXform->m_PCSScale[0], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[1], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2032 pushOffset3(pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2033 }
2034 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2035 return stat;
2036 }
2037 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2038 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2039 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2040 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2041 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2042 }
2043 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2044 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2045 else
2046 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2047 break;
2048
2049 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2050 if (pFromXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2051 pushLab2ToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2052 else
2053 pushLabToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2054 if (pFromXform->NeedAdjustDstPCS()) {
2055 pushScale3(pFromXform->m_PCSScale[0], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[1], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2056 pushOffset3(pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2057 }
2058 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2059 return stat;
2060 }
2061 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2062 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2063 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2064 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2065 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2066 }
2067 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2068 break;
2069
2070 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2071 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2072 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData:
2073 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2074 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2075 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2076 }
2077 break;
2078
2079 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2080 switch (m_dstSpace) {
2081 case icSigLabPcsData:
2082 pushXyzInToXyz();
2083 if (pFromXform->NeedAdjustDstPCS()) {
2084 pushScale3(pFromXform->m_PCSScale[0], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[1], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2085 pushOffset3(pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2086 }
2087 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2088 return stat;
2089 }
2090 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2091 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2092 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2093 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2094 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2095 }
2096 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2097 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2098 else
2099 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2100 break;
2101
2102 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2103 pushXyzInToXyz();
2104 if (pFromXform->NeedAdjustDstPCS()) {
2105 pushScale3(pFromXform->m_PCSScale[0], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[1], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2106 pushOffset3(pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2107 }
2108 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2109 return stat;
2110 }
2111 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2112 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2113 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2114 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2115 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2116 }
2117 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2118 break;
2119
2120 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2121 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2122 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData:
2123 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2124 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2125 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2126 }
2127 break;
2128
2129 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2130 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2131 switch (m_dstSpace) {
2132 case icSigLabPcsData:
2133 pushRef2Xyz(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2134 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2135 return stat;
2136 }
2137 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2138 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2139 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2140 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2141 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2142 }
2143 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2144 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2145 else
2146 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2147 break;
2148
2149 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2150 pushRef2Xyz(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2151 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2152 return stat;
2153 }
2154 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2155 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2156 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2157 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2158 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2159 }
2160 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2161 break;
2162
2163 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2164 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2165 pushSpecToRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
2166 pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
2167 break;
2168
2169 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData:
2170 pushApplyIllum(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2171 pushSpecToRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
2172 pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
2173 break;
2174
2175 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2176 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2177 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2178 }
2179 break;
2180
2181 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData: {
2182 CIccProfile *pFromProfile = pFromXform->GetProfilePtr();
2183 CIccProfile *pToProfile = pToXform->GetProfilePtr();
2184
2185 switch (m_dstSpace) {
2186 case icSigLabPcsData:
2187 pushRad2Xyz(pFromProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions, false);
2188 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2189 return stat;
2190 }
2191 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2192 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2193 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2194 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2195 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2196 }
2197 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2198 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2199 else
2200 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2201 break;
2202
2203 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2204 pushRad2Xyz(pFromProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions, false);
2205 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2206 return stat;
2207 }
2208 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2209 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2210 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2211 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2212 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2213 }
2214 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2215 break;
2216
2217 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2218 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2219 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2220
2221
2222 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData:
2223 pushSpecToRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
2224 pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
2225 break;
2226
2227 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2228 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2229 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2230 }
2231 }
2232 break;
2233
2234 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2235 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2236 switch (m_dstSpace) {
2237 case icSigLabPcsData:
2238 pushBiRef2Xyz(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2239 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2240 return stat;
2241 }
2242 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2243 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2244 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2245 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2246 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2247 }
2248 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2249 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2250 else
2251 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2252 break;
2253
2254 case icSigXYZPcsData:
2255 if ((stat=pushBiRef2Xyz(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2256 return stat;
2257 }
2258 if ((stat=pushXYZConvert(pFromXform, pToXform))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2259 return stat;
2260 }
2261 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2262 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[0],
2263 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[1],
2264 pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]/pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2265 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2266 }
2267 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2268 break;
2269
2270 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2271 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
2272 if ((stat=pushBiRef2Ref(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2273 return stat;
2274 }
2275 pushSpecToRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
2276 pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
2277 break;
2278
2279 case icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData:
2280 if ((stat=pushBiRef2Rad(pFromXform->m_pProfile, pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions))!=icCmmStatOk) {
2281 return stat;
2282 }
2283 pushSpecToRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
2284 pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
2285 break;
2286
2287 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
2288 if (icSameSpectralRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange) &&
2289 icSameSpectralRange(pFromXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange, pToXform->m_pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange))
2290 break;
2291 else
2292 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2293
2294 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
2295 return icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink;
2296 }
2297 break;
2298 }
2299 }
2300
2301 icStatusCMM rv = Optimize();
2302 if (rv!=icCmmStatOk)
2303 return rv;
2304
2305 if (m_list->begin()==m_list->end())
2306 return icCmmStatIdentityXform;
2307
2308 return icCmmStatOk;
2309}
2310
2311
2321icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::ConnectFirst(CIccXform* pToXform, icColorSpaceSignature srcSpace)
2322{
2323 if (!pToXform)
2324 return icCmmStatBadXform;
2325
2326
2327 if (srcSpace == icSigXYZData) {
2328 pushXyzInToXyz();
2329 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2330 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2331 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2332 }
2333
2334 if (pToXform->GetSrcSpace() == icSigLabData) {
2335 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2336 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2337 else
2338 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2339 }
2340 else {
2341 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2342 }
2343 }
2344 else if (srcSpace == icSigLabData) {
2345
2346 if (pToXform->GetSrcSpace() == icSigXYZData) {
2347 pushLabToXyz(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2348 if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2349 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2350 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2351 }
2352 }
2353 else if (pToXform->NeedAdjustSrcPCS()) {
2354 pushLabToXyz(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2355 pushScale3(pToXform->m_PCSScale[0], pToXform->m_PCSScale[1], pToXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2356 pushOffset3(pToXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pToXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2357 if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2358 pushXyzToLab2(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2359 else
2360 pushXyzToLab(pToXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2361 }
2362 else if (pToXform->UseLegacyPCS() && !pToXform->IsInput()) {
2363 pushLabToLab2();
2364 }
2365
2366 }
2367
2368
2369 icStatusCMM rv = Optimize();
2370 if (rv != icCmmStatOk)
2371 return rv;
2372
2373 if (m_list->begin() == m_list->end())
2374 return icCmmStatIdentityXform;
2375
2376 return icCmmStatOk;
2377}
2378
2379
2389icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::ConnectLast(CIccXform* pFromXform, icColorSpaceSignature dstSpace)
2390{
2391 if (!pFromXform)
2392 return icCmmStatBadXform;
2393 icColorSpaceSignature srcSpace = pFromXform->GetDstSpace();
2394
2395 if (pFromXform->NeedAdjustDstPCS() && IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(dstSpace)) {
2396 if (srcSpace == icSigLabData) {
2397 if (pFromXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2398 pushLab2ToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2399 else
2400 pushLabToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2401 }
2402
2403 pushScale3(pFromXform->m_PCSScale[0], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[1], pFromXform->m_PCSScale[2]);
2404 pushOffset3(pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[0], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[1], pFromXform->m_PCSOffset[2]);
2405
2406 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2407
2408 srcSpace = icSigXYZData;
2409 }
2410
2411 if (srcSpace == icSigXYZData && dstSpace == icSigLabData) {
2412 pushXyzInToXyz();
2413 pushXyzToLab(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2414 }
2415 else if (srcSpace == icSigLabData && dstSpace == icSigXYZData) {
2416 if (pFromXform->UseLegacyPCS())
2417 pushLab2ToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2418 else
2419 pushLabToXyz(pFromXform->m_pConnectionConditions);
2420 if (pFromXform->IsInput())
2421 pushXyzToXyzIn();
2422 }
2423 else if (pFromXform->UseLegacyPCS() && pFromXform->IsInput() && srcSpace == icSigLabData && dstSpace == icSigLabData) {
2424 pushLab2ToLab();
2425 }
2426
2427 icStatusCMM rv = Optimize();
2428 if (rv != icCmmStatOk)
2429 return rv;
2430
2431 if (m_list->begin() == m_list->end())
2432 return icCmmStatIdentityXform;
2433
2434 return icCmmStatOk;
2435}
2436
2437
2446icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::Optimize()
2447{
2448 if (!m_list)
2449 return icCmmStatBadXform;
2450
2451 CIccPcsStepList steps = *m_list;
2452 CIccPcsStepList::iterator next, last;
2453 bool done=false;
2454
2455#if 0
2456 std::string str;
2457 for (next = steps.begin(); next != steps.end(); next++) {
2458 next->ptr->dump(str);
2459 }
2460 printf("PCS_Steps:\n%s", str.c_str());
2461#endif
2462
2463 while (!done) {
2464 CIccPcsStepList newSteps;
2465 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2466
2467 done = true;
2468
2469 next = steps.begin();
2470 if (next==steps.end()) {
2471 *m_list = steps;
2472 return icCmmStatIdentityXform;
2473 }
2474 last = next;
2475 next++;
2476
2477 ptr.ptr = last->ptr;
2478
2479 for (;next!=steps.end(); next++) {
2480 CIccPcsStep *pStep = ptr.ptr->concat(next->ptr);
2481
2482 if (pStep) {
2483 done = false;
2484
2485 delete ptr.ptr;
2486 delete next->ptr;
2487 ptr.ptr = pStep;
2488 }
2489 else {
2490 if (!ptr.ptr->isIdentity()) {
2491 newSteps.push_back(ptr);
2492 }
2493 ptr.ptr = next->ptr;
2494 }
2495 }
2496 if (!ptr.ptr->isIdentity()) {
2497 newSteps.push_back(ptr);
2498 }
2499
2500 steps = newSteps;
2501
2502// for (next=steps.begin(); next!=steps.end(); next++) {
2503// ptr.ptr = next->ptr;
2504// done = true;
2505// }
2506
2507 }
2508
2509 if (!steps.empty()) {
2510 CIccPcsStepList newSteps;
2511 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2512
2513 for (next=steps.begin(); next != steps.end(); next++) {
2514 ptr.ptr = next->ptr->reduce();
2515 if (ptr.ptr != next->ptr)
2516 delete next->ptr;
2517 newSteps.push_back(ptr);
2518 }
2519 steps = newSteps;
2520 }
2521
2522 *m_list = steps;
2523
2524 return icCmmStatOk;
2525}
2526
2527
2537CIccApplyXform *CIccPcsXform::GetNewApply(icStatusCMM &status)
2538{
2539 CIccApplyPcsXform *pNew = new CIccApplyPcsXform(this);
2540
2541 if (pNew) {
2542 if (!pNew->Init()) {
2543 delete pNew;
2544 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
2545 return NULL;
2546 }
2547 }
2548 else {
2549 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
2550 return NULL;
2551 }
2552
2553 CIccPcsStepList::iterator i;
2554 CIccApplyPcsStep *pStep;
2555
2556 for (i=m_list->begin(); i!=m_list->end(); i++) {
2557 pStep = i->ptr->GetNewApply();
2558 if (!pStep || status != icCmmStatOk) {
2559 delete pNew;
2560 return NULL;
2561 }
2562 pNew->AppendApplyStep(pStep);
2563 }
2564
2565 return pNew;
2566}
2567
2568
2577icUInt16Number CIccPcsXform::MaxChannels()
2578{
2579 icUInt16Number nMax = 0;
2580 CIccPcsStepList::const_iterator s = m_list->begin();
2581 if (s==m_list->end())
2582 return nMax;
2583 nMax = s->ptr->GetDstChannels();
2584 s++;
2585 for (; s!= m_list->end(); s++) {
2586 if (s->ptr->GetSrcChannels()>nMax)
2587 nMax = s->ptr->GetSrcChannels();
2588 }
2589 return nMax;
2590}
2591
2600void CIccPcsXform::pushRouteMcs(CIccTagArray *pSrcChannels, CIccTagArray *pDstChannels, CIccTagNumArray *pDefaults)
2601{
2602 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2603
2604 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepRouteMcs(pSrcChannels, pDstChannels, pDefaults);
2605 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2606}
2607
2608
2617void CIccPcsXform::pushLab2ToLab()
2618{
2619 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2620
2621 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepLab2ToLab();
2622 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2623}
2624
2625
2634void CIccPcsXform::pushLabToLab2()
2635{
2636 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2637
2638 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepLabToLab2();
2639 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2640}
2641
2642
2651void CIccPcsXform::pushLab2ToXyz( IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2652{
2653 icFloatNumber xyzWhite[3];
2654 pPCC->getNormIlluminantXYZ(xyzWhite);
2655
2656 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2657
2658 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ(xyzWhite);
2659 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2660}
2661
2662
2671void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzToLab2(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2672{
2673 icFloatNumber xyzWhite[3];
2674 pPCC->getNormIlluminantXYZ(xyzWhite);
2675
2676 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2677
2678 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2(xyzWhite);
2679 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2680}
2681
2682
2691void CIccPcsXform::pushLabToXyz(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2692{
2693 icFloatNumber xyzWhite[3];
2694 pPCC->getNormIlluminantXYZ(xyzWhite);
2695
2696 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2697
2698 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ(xyzWhite);
2699 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2700}
2701
2702
2711void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzToLab( IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2712{
2713 icFloatNumber xyzWhite[3];
2714 pPCC->getNormIlluminantXYZ(xyzWhite);
2715
2716 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2717
2718 ptr.ptr = new CIccPcsStepXYZToLab(xyzWhite);
2719 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2720}
2721
2731void CIccPcsXform::pushScale3(icFloatNumber v1, icFloatNumber v2, icFloatNumber v3)
2732{
2733 CIccPcsStepScale *scale;
2734 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2735
2736 scale = new CIccPcsStepScale(3);
2737 icFloatNumber *data = scale->data();
2738 data[0] = v1;
2739 data[1] = v2;
2740 data[2] = v3;
2741
2742 ptr.ptr = scale;
2743 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2744}
2745
2754void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzToXyzIn()
2755{
2756 icFloatNumber scale = (icFloatNumber) (32768.0 / 65535.0);
2757 pushScale3(scale, scale, scale);
2758}
2759
2760
2769void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzInToXyz()
2770{
2771 icFloatNumber scale = (icFloatNumber) (65535.0 / 32768.0);
2772 return pushScale3(scale, scale, scale);
2773}
2774
2775
2784void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzToXyzLum(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2785{
2786 icFloatNumber XYZLum[3];
2787 pPCC->getLumIlluminantXYZ(&XYZLum[0]);
2788
2789 icFloatNumber scale = XYZLum[1];
2790
2791 return pushScale3(scale, scale, scale);
2792}
2793
2794
2803void CIccPcsXform::pushXyzLumToXyz(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
2804{
2805 icFloatNumber XYZLum[3];
2806 pPCC->getLumIlluminantXYZ(&XYZLum[0]);
2807
2808 icFloatNumber scale = 1.0f / XYZLum[1];
2809
2810 return pushScale3(scale, scale, scale);
2811}
2812
2813
2824void CIccPcsXform::pushOffset3(icFloatNumber v1, icFloatNumber v2, icFloatNumber v3, bool bConvertIntXyzOffset/*=true*/)
2825{
2826 CIccPcsStepOffset *offset;
2827 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2828
2829 offset = new CIccPcsStepOffset(3);
2830 icFloatNumber *data = offset->data();
2831 if (bConvertIntXyzOffset) {
2832 data[0] = v1*65535.0f/32768.0f;
2833 data[1] = v2*65535.0f/32768.0f;
2834 data[2] = v3*65535.0f/32768.0f;
2835 }
2836 else {
2837 data[0] = v1;
2838 data[1] = v2;
2839 data[2] = v3;
2840 }
2841
2842 ptr.ptr = offset;
2843 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2844}
2845
2846
2856void CIccPcsXform::pushScale(icUInt16Number n, const icFloatNumber *vals)
2857{
2858 CIccPcsStepScale *scale = new CIccPcsStepScale(n);
2859 memcpy(scale->data(), vals, n*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
2860
2861 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2862 ptr.ptr = scale;
2863 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2864}
2865
2866
2875void CIccPcsXform::pushMatrix(icUInt16Number nRows, icUInt16Number nCols, const icFloatNumber *vals)
2876{
2877 CIccPcsStepMatrix *mtx = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(nRows, nCols);
2878 memcpy(mtx->entry(0), vals, nRows*nCols*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
2879
2880 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2881 ptr.ptr = mtx;
2882 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2883}
2884
2885
2896icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::pushXYZConvert(CIccXform *pFromXform, CIccXform *pToXform)
2897{
2898 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pSrcPcc = pFromXform->GetConnectionConditions();
2899 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pDstPcc = pToXform->GetConnectionConditions();
2900
2901 if (!pSrcPcc || !pDstPcc)
2902 return icCmmStatBadConnection;
2903
2904 //If source and dest observer and illuminant are same then no transform is needed
2905 if (pSrcPcc->isEquivalentPcc(*pDstPcc)) {
2906 return icCmmStatOk;
2907 }
2908
2909 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
2910
2911 if (!pSrcPcc->isStandardPcc()) {
2912
2913 CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMpe = pSrcPcc->getCustomToStandardPcc();
2914
2915 if (!pMpe || pMpe->NumInputChannels()!=3 || pMpe->NumOutputChannels()!=3)
2916 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
2917
2918 ptr.ptr = NULL;
2919
2920 //push single matrix element as a CIccPcsStepMatrix so it can be optimized
2921 if (pMpe->NumElements()==1) {
2922 CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem = pMpe->GetElement(0);
2923 if (pElem) {
2924 if (pElem->GetType()==icSigMatrixElemType) {
2925 CIccMpeMatrix *pMatElem = (CIccMpeMatrix*)pElem;
2926
2927 icFloatNumber *pMat = pMatElem->GetMatrix();
2928 icFloatNumber *pOffset = pMatElem->GetConstants();
2929
2930 if (pMat && (!pOffset || (pOffset[0]==0.0 && pOffset[1]==0.0 && pOffset[2]==0.0))) {
2931 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pStepMtx = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(3, 3);
2932
2933 if (pStepMtx ) {
2934 memcpy(pStepMtx->entry(0,0), pMat, 9*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
2935 }
2936 ptr.ptr = pStepMtx;
2937 }
2938 }
2939 }
2940 }
2941
2942 if (!ptr.ptr) {
2943 CIccPcsStepMpe *pStepMpe = new CIccPcsStepMpe((CIccTagMultiProcessElement*)pMpe->NewCopy());
2944
2945 if (!pStepMpe)
2946 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
2947
2948 if (!pStepMpe->Begin()) {
2949 delete pStepMpe;
2950 return icCmmStatBadConnection;
2951 }
2952
2953 ptr.ptr = pStepMpe;
2954 }
2955
2956 m_list->push_back(ptr);
2957 }
2958
2959 if (!pDstPcc->isStandardPcc()) {
2960
2961 CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMpe = pDstPcc->getStandardToCustomPcc();
2962
2963 if (!pMpe || pMpe->NumInputChannels()!=3 || pMpe->NumOutputChannels()!=3)
2964 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
2965
2966 ptr.ptr = NULL;
2967
2968 //push single matrix element as a CIccPcsStepMatrix so it can be optimized
2969 if (pMpe->NumElements()==1) {
2970 CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem = pMpe->GetElement(0);
2971 if (pElem) {
2972 if (pElem->GetType()==icSigMatrixElemType) {
2973 CIccMpeMatrix *pMatElem = (CIccMpeMatrix*)pElem;
2974
2975 icFloatNumber *pMat = pMatElem->GetMatrix();
2976 icFloatNumber *pOffset = pMatElem->GetConstants();
2977
2978 if (pMat && (!pOffset || (pOffset[0]==0.0 && pOffset[1]==0.0 && pOffset[2]==0.0))) {
2979 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pStepMtx = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(3, 3);
2980
2981 if (pStepMtx ) {
2982 memcpy(pStepMtx->entry(0,0), pMat, 9*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
2983 }
2984 ptr.ptr = pStepMtx;
2985 }
2986 }
2987 }
2988 }
2989
2990 if (!ptr.ptr) {
2991 CIccPcsStepMpe *pStepMpe = new CIccPcsStepMpe((CIccTagMultiProcessElement*)pMpe->NewCopy());
2992
2993 if (!pStepMpe)
2994 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
2995
2996 if (!pStepMpe->Begin()) {
2997 delete pStepMpe;
2998 return icCmmStatBadConnection;
2999 }
3000
3001 ptr.ptr = pStepMpe;
3002 }
3003
3004 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3005 }
3006
3007 if (pFromXform->LuminanceMatching()) {
3008 pushXyzToXyzLum(pSrcPcc);
3009 }
3010 if (pToXform->LuminanceMatching()) {
3011 pushXyzLumToXyz(pDstPcc);
3012 }
3013
3014 return icCmmStatOk;
3015}
3016
3017void CIccPcsXform::pushXYZNormalize(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc, const icSpectralRange &srcRange, const icSpectralRange &dstRange)
3018{
3019 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3020 CIccPcsXform tmp;
3021
3022 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3023 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3024
3025 icSpectralRange observerRange;
3026 const icFloatNumber *observer = pView->getObserver(observerRange);
3027
3028 //make sure illuminant goes through identical conversion steps
3029 if (!icSameSpectralRange(srcRange, illuminantRange) || !icSameSpectralRange(dstRange, illuminantRange)) {
3030 tmp.pushSpecToRange(illuminantRange, srcRange);
3031 tmp.pushSpecToRange(srcRange, dstRange);
3032 tmp.pushSpecToRange(dstRange, observerRange);
3033 }
3034 else {
3035 tmp.pushSpecToRange(illuminantRange, observerRange);
3036 }
3037 tmp.pushMatrix(3, observerRange.steps, observer);
3038
3039 icStatusCMM stat=icCmmStatOk;
3040 CIccApplyXform *pApply = tmp.GetNewApply(stat);
3041 if (pApply) {
3042 icFloatNumber xyz[3], normxyz[3], pccxyz[3];
3043
3044 //Get absolute xyz for illuminant and observer
3045 tmp.Apply(pApply, xyz, illuminant);
3046
3047 //calculate normalized XYZ
3048 normxyz[0] = xyz[0] / xyz[1];
3049 normxyz[1] = xyz[1] / xyz[1];
3050 normxyz[2] = xyz[2] / xyz[1];
3051
3052 //get desired XYZ from pcc (might be slightly different from calculated normxyz)
3053 pPcc->getNormIlluminantXYZ(pccxyz);
3054
3055#if 1
3056 //push scale factor to normalize XYZ values and correct for difference between calculated and desired XYZ
3057 pushScale3(pccxyz[0] / (normxyz[0] * xyz[1]),
3058 pccxyz[1] / (normxyz[1] * xyz[1]),
3059 pccxyz[2] / (normxyz[2] * xyz[1]));
3060#else
3061 pushScale3(1.0f/xyz[1], 1.0f/xyz[1], 1.0f/xyz[1]);
3062#endif
3063
3064 delete pApply;
3065 }
3066}
3067
3078void CIccPcsXform::pushRef2Xyz(CIccProfile *pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc)
3079{
3080 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3081
3082 if (pView) {
3083 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3084 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3085
3086 icSpectralRange observerRange;
3087 const icFloatNumber *observer = pView->getObserver(observerRange);
3088
3089 pushSpecToRange(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, illuminantRange);
3090 pushScale(illuminantRange.steps, illuminant);
3091 pushSpecToRange(illuminantRange, observerRange);
3092 pushMatrix(3, observerRange.steps, observer);
3093
3094 pushXYZNormalize(pPcc, illuminantRange, illuminantRange);
3095 }
3096}
3097
3098
3108CIccPcsStepMatrix *CIccPcsXform::rangeMap(const icSpectralRange &srcRange, const icSpectralRange &dstRange)
3109{
3110 if (srcRange.steps != dstRange.steps ||
3111 srcRange.start != dstRange.start ||
3112 srcRange.end != dstRange.end) {
3113 CIccPcsStepMatrix *mtx = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(dstRange.steps, srcRange.steps);
3114 if (!mtx->SetRange(srcRange, dstRange))
3115 {
3116 delete mtx;
3117 return NULL;
3118 }
3119 return mtx;
3120 }
3121
3122 return NULL;
3123}
3124
3125
3135void CIccPcsXform::pushSpecToRange(const icSpectralRange &srcRange, const icSpectralRange &dstRange)
3136{
3137 if (!icSameSpectralRange(srcRange, dstRange)) {
3138 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
3139 ptr.ptr = rangeMap(srcRange, dstRange);
3140
3141 if (ptr.ptr)
3142 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3143 }
3144}
3145
3146
3158void CIccPcsXform::pushApplyIllum(CIccProfile *pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc)
3159{
3160 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3161
3162 if (pView) {
3163 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
3164
3165 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3166 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3167
3168 CIccPcsStepScale *pScale = new CIccPcsStepScale(illuminantRange.steps);
3169 memcpy(pScale->data(), illuminant, illuminantRange.steps*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3170
3171 if (icSameSpectralRange(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, illuminantRange)) {
3172 ptr.ptr = pScale;
3173 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3174 }
3175 else {
3176 ptr.ptr = rangeMap(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, illuminantRange);
3177 if (ptr.ptr) {
3178 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3179 }
3180
3181 ptr.ptr = pScale;
3182 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3183
3184 ptr.ptr = rangeMap(illuminantRange, pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
3185 if (ptr.ptr)
3186 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3187 }
3188 }
3189}
3190
3191
3202void CIccPcsXform::pushRad2Xyz(CIccProfile* pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc, bool bAbsoluteCIEColorimetry)
3203{
3204 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pProfView = pProfile ? pProfile->getPccViewingConditions() : NULL;
3205 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3206 if (pProfView && pView) {
3207 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3208 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3209
3210 icSpectralRange observerRange;
3211 const icFloatNumber *observer = pView->getObserver(observerRange);
3212
3213 //Preserve smallest step size
3214 icFloatNumber dPCSStepSize = (icF16toF(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.end) - icF16toF(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.start))/(icFloatNumber)pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps;
3215 icFloatNumber dObsStepSize = (icF16toF(observerRange.end) - icF16toF(observerRange.start)) / (icFloatNumber) observerRange.steps;
3216
3217 if (dPCSStepSize<dObsStepSize) {
3218 icFloatNumber *obs = pView->applyRangeToObserver(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
3219
3220 pushMatrix(3, pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps, obs);
3221 free(obs);
3222 }
3223 else {
3224 pushSpecToRange(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, observerRange);
3225 pushMatrix(3, observerRange.steps, observer);
3226
3227 }
3228 icFloatNumber k;
3229 if (bAbsoluteCIEColorimetry) {
3230 k = 683;
3231 }
3232 else {
3233 k = 1.0f / pPcc->getObserverWhiteScaleFactor(illuminant, illuminantRange);
3234 }
3235 pushScale3(k, k, k);
3236 }
3237}
3238
3239
3249icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::pushBiRef2Rad(CIccProfile *pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc)
3250{
3251 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3252
3253 if (pView) {
3254 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3255 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3256
3257 if (icGetColorSpaceType(pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS)==icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData) {
3258 CIccPcsStepSrcSparseMatrix *pMtx = new CIccPcsStepSrcSparseMatrix(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps,
3259 pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange.steps,
3260 (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples((icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS));
3261 if (!pMtx)
3262 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
3263
3264 CIccPcsStepMatrix *illumMtx = rangeMap(illuminantRange, pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange);
3265 if (illumMtx) {
3266 illumMtx->Apply(NULL, pMtx->data(), illuminant);
3267 delete illumMtx;
3268 }
3269 else {
3270 memcpy(pMtx->data(), illuminant, illuminantRange.steps*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3271 }
3272
3273 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
3274 ptr.ptr = pMtx;
3275 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3276
3277 }
3278 else {
3279 CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix *pMtx = new CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps, pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange.steps);
3280 if (!pMtx)
3281 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
3282
3283 CIccPcsStepMatrix *illumMtx = rangeMap(illuminantRange, pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange);
3284 if (illumMtx) {
3285 illumMtx->Apply(NULL, pMtx->data(), illuminant);
3286 delete illumMtx;
3287 }
3288 else {
3289 memcpy(pMtx->data(), illuminant, illuminantRange.steps*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3290 }
3291
3292 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
3293 ptr.ptr = pMtx;
3294 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3295
3296 }
3297 }
3298
3299 return icCmmStatOk;
3300}
3301
3302
3314icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::pushBiRef2Xyz(CIccProfile *pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc)
3315{
3316 icStatusCMM stat = pushBiRef2Rad(pProfile, pPcc);
3317 if (stat!=icCmmStatOk)
3318 return stat;
3319
3320 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3321
3322 if (pView) {
3323 icSpectralRange observerRange;
3324 const icFloatNumber *observer = pView->getObserver(observerRange);
3325
3326 pushSpecToRange(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange, observerRange);
3327 pushMatrix(3, observerRange.steps, observer);
3328 pushXYZNormalize(pPcc, pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange, pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
3329 }
3330 else {
3331 return icCmmStatBadConnection;
3332 }
3333
3334 return icCmmStatOk;
3335}
3336
3337
3348icStatusCMM CIccPcsXform::pushBiRef2Ref(CIccProfile *pProfile, IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc)
3349{
3350 icStatusCMM stat = pushBiRef2Rad(pProfile, pPcc);
3351 if (stat!=icCmmStatOk)
3352 return stat;
3353
3354 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pView = pPcc->getPccViewingConditions();
3355
3356 if (pView) {
3357 icSpectralRange illuminantRange;
3358 const icFloatNumber *illuminant = pView->getIlluminant(illuminantRange);
3359
3360 CIccPcsStepScale *pScale = new CIccPcsStepScale(pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps);
3361
3362 if (pScale) {
3363 icFloatNumber *pData = pScale->data();
3364 CIccPcsStepMatrix *illumMtx = rangeMap(illuminantRange, pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange);
3365 int i;
3366
3367 if (illumMtx) {
3368 illumMtx->Apply(NULL, pData, illuminant);
3369 for (i=0; i<pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps; i++)
3370 pData[i] = 1.0f / pData[i];
3371
3372 delete illumMtx;
3373
3374 }
3375 else {
3376 for (i=0; i<pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange.steps; i++) {
3377 pData[i] = 1.0f / illuminant[i];
3378 }
3379 }
3380
3381 CIccPcsStepPtr ptr;
3382 ptr.ptr = pScale;
3383 m_list->push_back(ptr);
3384 }
3385 else
3386 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
3387 }
3388 else
3389 return icCmmStatBadConnection;
3390
3391 return icCmmStatOk;
3392}
3393
3394
3395#ifdef _DEBUG
3396//#define DUMPCSSTEPRESULTS
3397#ifdef DUMPCSSTEPRESULTS
3398 #define ICCDUMPPIXEL(n, pix) \
3399 if ((n)<96) { \
3400 printf("["); \
3401 int i; \
3402 for (i=0; i<(n); i++) { \
3403 if (i && !(i%12)) \
3404 printf("...\n"); \
3405 printf(" %.5f", pix[i]); \
3406 } \
3407 printf("]\n"); \
3408 } \
3409 else { \
3410 printf("[ BigAray with %d elements]\n", (n)); \
3411 }
3412#else
3413 #define ICCDUMPPIXEL(n, pix)
3414#endif
3415#else
3416 #define ICCDUMPPIXEL(n, pix)
3417#endif
3418
3419
3428void CIccPcsXform::Apply(CIccApplyXform *pXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
3429{
3430 CIccApplyPcsXform *pApplyXform = (CIccApplyPcsXform*)pXform;
3431 CIccApplyPcsStepList *pList = pApplyXform->m_list;
3432
3433 ICCDUMPPIXEL(GetNumSrcSamples(), SrcPixel);
3434
3435 if (!pList) {
3436 memcpy(DstPixel, SrcPixel, GetNumSrcSamples()*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3437 ICCDUMPPIXEL(GetNumSrcSamples(), DstPixel);
3438 return;
3439 }
3440
3441 CIccApplyPcsStepList::iterator s, n;
3442 s = n =pList->begin();
3443
3444 if (s==pList->end()) {
3445 memcpy(DstPixel, SrcPixel, GetNumSrcSamples()*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3446 ICCDUMPPIXEL(GetNumSrcSamples(), DstPixel);
3447 return;
3448 }
3449
3450 n++;
3451
3452 if (n==pList->end()) {
3453 s->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
3454 ICCDUMPPIXEL(s->ptr->GetStep()->GetDstChannels(), DstPixel);
3455 }
3456 else {
3457 const icFloatNumber *src = SrcPixel;
3458 icFloatNumber *p1 = pApplyXform->m_temp1;
3459 icFloatNumber *p2 = pApplyXform->m_temp2;
3460 icFloatNumber *t;
3461
3462 for (;n!=pList->end(); s=n, n++) {
3463 s->ptr->Apply(p1, src);
3464 ICCDUMPPIXEL(s->ptr->GetStep()->GetDstChannels(), p1);
3465 src=p1;
3466 t=p1; p1=p2; p2=t;
3467 }
3468 s->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, src);
3469 ICCDUMPPIXEL(s->ptr->GetStep()->GetDstChannels(), DstPixel);
3470 }
3471}
3472
3481CIccApplyPcsStep* CIccPcsStep::GetNewApply()
3482{
3483 return new CIccApplyPcsStep(this);
3484}
3485
3486
3495void CIccPcsStepIdentity::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3496{
3497 if (pDst != pSrc)
3498 memcpy(pDst, pSrc, m_nChannels*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3499}
3500
3501
3510void CIccPcsStepIdentity::dump(std::string &str) const
3511{
3512 str += "\nCIccPcsStepIdentity\n\n";
3513}
3514
3515
3524CIccPcsStepRouteMcs::CIccPcsStepRouteMcs(CIccTagArray *pSrcChannels, CIccTagArray *pDstChannels, CIccTagNumArray *pDefaults)
3525{
3526 m_nSrcChannels = (icUInt16Number)pSrcChannels->GetSize();
3527 m_nDstChannels = (icUInt16Number)pDstChannels->GetSize();
3528 m_Index = new int[m_nDstChannels];
3529 m_Defaults = new icFloatNumber[m_nDstChannels];
3530
3531 memset(m_Defaults, 0, m_nDstChannels*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
3532
3533 if (pDefaults) {
3534 pDefaults->GetValues(m_Defaults, 0, m_nDstChannels);
3535 }
3536
3537 int i, j;
3538 char *szSrc;
3539
3540 for (i=0; i<m_nDstChannels; i++) {
3541 const icUChar *szDstChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)(pDstChannels->GetIndex(i)))->GetText();
3542 for (j=0; j<m_nSrcChannels; j++) {
3543 const icUChar *szSrcChan = ((CIccTagUtf8Text*)(pSrcChannels->GetIndex(j)))->GetText();
3544 szSrc = (char*)szSrcChan;
3545 if (!icUtf8StrCmp(szDstChan, szSrcChan))
3546 break;
3547 }
3548 if (j==m_nSrcChannels) {
3549 m_Index[i] = -1;
3550 }
3551 else {
3552 m_Index[i] = j;
3553 }
3554 //printf("%d - %d %s\n", m_Index[i], i, szDstChan);
3555 }
3556}
3557
3558
3567CIccPcsStepRouteMcs::~CIccPcsStepRouteMcs()
3568{
3569 if (m_Index)
3570 delete [] m_Index;
3571 if (m_Defaults)
3572 delete [] m_Defaults;
3573}
3574
3575
3584bool CIccPcsStepRouteMcs::isIdentity() const
3585{
3586 if (m_nSrcChannels!=m_nDstChannels)
3587 return false;
3588
3589 int i;
3590 for (i=0; i<m_nDstChannels; i++) {
3591 if (m_Index[i]!=i)
3592 return false;
3593 }
3594
3595 return true;
3596}
3597
3598
3599
3608void CIccPcsStepRouteMcs::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3609{
3610 if (pDst != pSrc) {
3611 int i;
3612 for (i=0; i<m_nDstChannels; i++) {
3613 if (m_Index[i]>=0)
3614 pDst[i] = pSrc[m_Index[i]];
3615 else
3616 pDst[i] = m_Defaults[i];
3617 }
3618 }
3619}
3620
3621
3630void CIccPcsStepRouteMcs::dump(std::string &str) const
3631{
3632 str += "\nCIccPcsStepRouteMcs\n\n";
3633}
3634
3635extern icFloatNumber icD50XYZ[3];
3636
3645bool CIccPcsLabStep::isSameWhite(const icFloatNumber *xyzWhite)
3646{
3647 return (m_xyzWhite[0]==xyzWhite[0] &&
3648 m_xyzWhite[1]==xyzWhite[1] &&
3649 m_xyzWhite[2]==xyzWhite[2]);
3650}
3651
3652
3653
