3662CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ::CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ(const icFloatNumber *xyzWhite/*=NULL*/)
3663{
3664 if (xyzWhite) {
3665 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, xyzWhite, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3666 }
3667 else {
3668 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, icD50XYZ, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3669 }
3670}
3671
3672
3681void CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3682{
3683 icFloatNumber Lab[3];
3684
3685 //lab4 to XYZ
3686 Lab[0] = pSrc[0] * 100.0f;
3687 Lab[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[1]*255.0f - 128.0f);
3688 Lab[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[2]*255.0f - 128.0f);
3689
3690 icLabtoXYZ(pDst, Lab, m_xyzWhite);
3691}
3692
3693
3702void CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ::dump(std::string &str) const
3703{
3704 str += "\nCIccPcsStepLabToXYZ\n\n";
3705}
3706
3707
3718CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepLabToXYZ::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
3719{
3720 if (pNext) {
3721 if (pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepXYZToLab) {
3722 CIccPcsLabStep* pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep*)pNext;
3723 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3724 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
3725 }
3726 else if (pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepXYZToLab2) {
3727 CIccPcsLabStep* pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep*)pNext;
3728 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3729 return new CIccPcsStepLabToLab2();
3730 }
3731 }
3732 return NULL;
3733}
3734
3735
3744CIccPcsStepXYZToLab::CIccPcsStepXYZToLab(const icFloatNumber *xyzWhite/*=NULL*/)
3745{
3746 if (xyzWhite) {
3747 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, xyzWhite, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3748 }
3749 else {
3750 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, icD50XYZ, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3751 }
3752}
3753
3754
3763void CIccPcsStepXYZToLab::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3764{
3765 icFloatNumber Lab[3];
3766 icXYZtoLab(Lab, (icFloatNumber*)pSrc, m_xyzWhite);
3767 //lab4 from XYZ
3768 pDst[0] = Lab[0] / 100.0f;
3769 pDst[1] = (icFloatNumber)((Lab[1] + 128.0f) / 255.0f);
3770 pDst[2] = (icFloatNumber)((Lab[2] + 128.0f) / 255.0f);
3771}
3772
3773
3782void CIccPcsStepXYZToLab::dump(std::string &str) const
3783{
3784 str += "\nCIccPcsStepXYZToLab\n\n";
3785}
3786
3787
3798CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepXYZToLab::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
3799{
3800 if (pNext && pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepLabToXYZ) {
3801 CIccPcsLabStep *pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep *)pNext;
3802 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3803 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
3804 }
3805 return NULL;
3806}
3807
3808
3817CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ::CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ(const icFloatNumber *xyzWhite/*=NULL*/)
3818{
3819 if (xyzWhite) {
3820 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, xyzWhite, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3821 }
3822 else {
3823 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, icD50XYZ, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3824 }
3825}
3826
3835void CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3836{
3837 icFloatNumber Lab[3];
3838
3839 //lab2 to XYZ
3840 Lab[0] = pSrc[0] * (65535.0f / 65280.0f) * 100.0f;
3841 Lab[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[1] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f * 255.0f - 128.0f);
3842 Lab[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[2] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f * 255.0f - 128.0f);
3843
3844 icLabtoXYZ(pDst, Lab, m_xyzWhite);
3845}
3846
3847
3856void CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ::dump(std::string &str) const
3857{
3858 str += "\nCIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ\n\n";
3859}
3860
3861
3872CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepLab2ToXYZ::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
3873{
3874 if (pNext) {
3875 if (pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepXYZToLab2) {
3876 CIccPcsLabStep* pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep*)pNext;
3877 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3878 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
3879 }
3880 else if (pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepXYZToLab) {
3881 CIccPcsLabStep* pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep*)pNext;
3882 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3883 return new CIccPcsStepLab2ToLab();
3884 }
3885 }
3886
3887 return NULL;
3888}
3889
3890
3899CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2::CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2(const icFloatNumber *xyzWhite/*=NULL*/)
3900{
3901 if (xyzWhite) {
3902 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, xyzWhite, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3903 }
3904 else {
3905 memcpy(m_xyzWhite, icD50XYZ, sizeof(m_xyzWhite));
3906 }
3907}
3908
3909
3918void CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
3919{
3920 icFloatNumber Lab[3];
3921 icXYZtoLab(Lab, (icFloatNumber*)pSrc, m_xyzWhite);
3922 //lab2 from XYZ
3923 pDst[0] = (Lab[0] / 100.0f) * (65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3924 pDst[1] = (icFloatNumber)((Lab[1] + 128.0f) / 255.0f) * (65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3925 pDst[2] = (icFloatNumber)((Lab[2] + 128.0f) / 255.0f) * (65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3926}
3927
3928
3937void CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2::dump(std::string &str) const
3938{
3939 str += "\nCIccPcsStepXYZToLab2\n\n";
3940}
3941
3942
3953CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepXYZToLab2::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
3954{
3955 if (pNext && pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepLab2ToXYZ) {
3956 CIccPcsLabStep *pStep = (CIccPcsLabStep *)pNext;
3957 if (pStep->isSameWhite(m_xyzWhite))
3958 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
3959 }
3960 return NULL;
3961}
3962
3963
3972void CIccPcsStepLabToLab2::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep* pApply, icFloatNumber* pDst, const icFloatNumber* pSrc) const
3973{
3974 pDst[0] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[0] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3975 pDst[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[1] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3976 pDst[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[2] * 65280.0f / 65535.0f);
3977}
3978
3979
3988void CIccPcsStepLabToLab2::dump(std::string& str) const
3989{
3990 str += "\nCIccPcsStepLabToLab2\n\n";
3991}
3992
4003CIccPcsStep* CIccPcsStepLabToLab2::concat(CIccPcsStep* pNext) const
4004{
4005 if (pNext && pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepLab2ToLab) {
4006 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
4007 }
4008 return NULL;
4009}
4010
4011
4020void CIccPcsStepLab2ToLab::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep* pApply, icFloatNumber* pDst, const icFloatNumber* pSrc) const
4021{
4022 pDst[0] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[0] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
4023 pDst[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[1] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
4024 pDst[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pSrc[2] * 65535.0f / 65280.0f);
4025}

4036void CIccPcsStepLab2ToLab::dump(std::string& str) const
4037{
4038 str += "\nCIccPcsStepLab2ToLab\n\n";
4039}

4041
4052CIccPcsStep* CIccPcsStepLab2ToLab::concat(CIccPcsStep* pNext) const
4053{
4054 if (pNext && pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepLabToLab2) {
4055 return new CIccPcsStepIdentity(3);
4056 }
4057 return NULL;
4058}
4059
4060
4069CIccPcsStepOffset::CIccPcsStepOffset(icUInt16Number nChannels)
4070{
4071 m_nChannels = nChannels;
4072 m_vals = new icFloatNumber[nChannels];
4073}
4074
4075
4084CIccPcsStepOffset::~CIccPcsStepOffset()
4085{
4086 if (m_vals)
4087 delete [] m_vals;
4088}
4089
4090
4099void CIccPcsStepOffset::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4100{
4101 if (m_nChannels==3) {
4102 pDst[0] = m_vals[0] + pSrc[0];
4103 pDst[1] = m_vals[1] + pSrc[1];
4104 pDst[2] = m_vals[2] + pSrc[2];
4105 }
4106 else {
4107 int i;
4108 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4109 pDst[i] = m_vals[i] + pSrc[i];
4110 }
4111 }
4112}
4113
4114
4123void CIccPcsStepOffset::dump(std::string &str) const
4124{
4125 str += "\nCIccPcsStepOffset\n\n";
4126 char buf[80];
4127 for (int i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4128 sprintf(buf, ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT, m_vals[i]);
4129 str += buf;
4130 }
4131 str +="\n";
4132}
4133
4134
4144CIccPcsStepOffset *CIccPcsStepOffset::Add(const CIccPcsStepOffset *offset) const
4145{
4146 if (offset->m_nChannels != m_nChannels)
4147 return NULL;
4148
4149 CIccPcsStepOffset *pNew = new CIccPcsStepOffset(m_nChannels);
4150
4151 if (pNew) {
4152 int i;
4153 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4154 pNew->m_vals[i] = m_vals[i] + offset->m_vals[i];
4155 }
4156 }
4157
4158 return pNew;
4159}
4160
4171CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepOffset::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
4172{
4173 if (pNext && pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepOffset && m_nChannels==pNext->GetSrcChannels())
4174 return Add((const CIccPcsStepOffset*)pNext);
4175
4176 return NULL;
4177}
4178
4179
4188bool CIccPcsStepOffset::isIdentity() const
4189{
4190 int i;
4191 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4192 if (m_vals[i]<-icNearRange || m_vals[i]>icNearRange)
4193 return false;
4194 }
4195
4196 return true;
4197}
4198
4199
4208CIccPcsStepScale::CIccPcsStepScale(icUInt16Number nChannels)
4209{
4210 m_nChannels = nChannels;
4211 m_vals = new icFloatNumber[nChannels];
4212}
4213
4214
4223CIccPcsStepScale::~CIccPcsStepScale()
4224{
4225 if (m_vals)
4226 delete [] m_vals;
4227}
4228
4237void CIccPcsStepScale::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4238{
4239 if (m_nChannels==3) {
4240 pDst[0] = m_vals[0] * pSrc[0];
4241 pDst[1] = m_vals[1] * pSrc[1];
4242 pDst[2] = m_vals[2] * pSrc[2];
4243 }
4244 else {
4245 int i;
4246 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4247 pDst[i] = m_vals[i] * pSrc[i];
4248 }
4249 }
4250}
4251
4252
4261void CIccPcsStepScale::dump(std::string &str) const
4262{
4263 str += "\nCIccPcsStepScale\n\n";
4264 char buf[80];
4265 for (int i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4266 sprintf(buf, ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT, m_vals[i]);
4267 str += buf;
4268 }
4269 str +="\n";
4270}
4271
4272
4282CIccPcsStepScale *CIccPcsStepScale::Mult(const CIccPcsStepScale *scale) const
4283{
4284 if (scale->m_nChannels != m_nChannels)
4285 return NULL;
4286
4287 CIccPcsStepScale *pNew = new CIccPcsStepScale(m_nChannels);
4288
4289 if (pNew) {
4290 int i;
4291 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4292 pNew->m_vals[i] = m_vals[i] * scale->m_vals[i];
4293 }
4294 }
4295 return pNew;
4296}
4297
4307CIccPcsStepMatrix *CIccPcsStepScale::Mult(const CIccPcsStepMatrix *matrix) const
4308{
4309 if (matrix->GetSrcChannels() != m_nChannels)
4310 return NULL;
4311
4312 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pNew = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(matrix->GetDstChannels(), matrix->GetSrcChannels());
4313
4314 if (pNew) {
4315 int i, j;
4316 for (j=0; j<matrix->GetDstChannels(); j++) {
4317 const icFloatNumber *row = matrix->entry(j);
4318 icFloatNumber *to=pNew->entry(j);
4319
4320 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4321 to[i] = m_vals[i] * row[i];
4322 }
4323 }
4324 }
4325
4326 return pNew;
4327}
4328
4338CIccPcsStepMatrix *CIccPcsStepScale::Mult(const CIccMpeMatrix *matrix) const
4339{
4340 if (matrix->NumInputChannels() != m_nChannels)
4341 return NULL;
4342
4343 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pNew = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(matrix->NumOutputChannels(), matrix->NumInputChannels());
4344
4345 if (pNew) {
4346 int i, j;
4347 icFloatNumber *mtx = matrix->GetMatrix();
4348 for (j = 0; j < matrix->NumOutputChannels(); j++) {
4349 const icFloatNumber *row = &mtx[j*matrix->NumInputChannels()];
4350 icFloatNumber *to = pNew->entry(j);
4351
4352 for (i = 0; i < m_nChannels; i++) {
4353 to[i] = m_vals[i] * row[i];
4354 }
4355 }
4356 }
4357
4358 return pNew;
4359}
4360
4361
4372CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepScale::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
4373{
4374 if (pNext) {
4375 if (pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepScale && m_nChannels==pNext->GetSrcChannels())
4376 return Mult((const CIccPcsStepScale*)pNext);
4377 if (pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepMatrix && m_nChannels==pNext->GetSrcChannels())
4378 return Mult((const CIccPcsStepMatrix*)pNext);
4379 if (pNext->GetType() == icPcsStepMpe && m_nChannels == pNext->GetSrcChannels()) {
4380 CIccPcsStepMpe *pMpe = (CIccPcsStepMpe*)pNext;
4381 CIccMpeMatrix *pMatrix = pMpe->GetMatrix();
4382 if (pMatrix)
4383 return Mult(pMatrix);
4384 }
4385 }
4386
4387 return NULL;
4388}
4389
4390
4399bool CIccPcsStepScale::isIdentity() const
4400{
4401 int i;
4402 for (i=0; i<m_nChannels; i++) {
4403 if (m_vals[i]<1.0f-icNearRange || m_vals[i]>1.0f+icNearRange)
4404 return false;
4405 }
4406
4407 return true;
4408}
4409
4410
4411
4420void CIccPcsStepMatrix::dump(std::string &str) const
4421{
4422 str += "\nCIccPcsStepMatrix\n\n";
4423 dumpMtx(str);
4424}
4425
4426
4436CIccPcsStepMatrix *CIccPcsStepMatrix::Mult(const CIccPcsStepScale *scale) const
4437{
4438 icUInt16Number mCols = scale->GetSrcChannels();
4439 icUInt16Number mRows = mCols;
4440
4441 if (m_nRows != mCols)
4442 return NULL;
4443
4444 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pNew = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(m_nRows, m_nCols);
4445 const icFloatNumber *data = scale->data();
4446
4447 int i, j;
4448 for (j=0; j<m_nRows; j++) {
4449 const icFloatNumber *row = entry(j);
4450 icFloatNumber *to = pNew->entry(j);
4451 for (i=0; i<m_nCols; i++) {
4452 to[i] = data[j] * row[i];
4453 }
4454 }
4455
4456 return pNew;
4457}
4458
4468CIccPcsStepMatrix *CIccPcsStepMatrix::Mult(const CIccPcsStepMatrix *matrix) const
4469{
4470 icUInt16Number mCols = matrix->m_nCols;
4471 icUInt16Number mRows = matrix->m_nRows;
4472
4473 if (m_nRows != mCols)
4474 return NULL;
4475
4476 CIccPcsStepMatrix *pNew = new CIccPcsStepMatrix(mRows, m_nCols);
4477
4478 int i, j, k;
4479 for (j=0; j<mRows; j++) {
4480 const icFloatNumber *row = matrix->entry(j);
4481 for (i=0; i<m_nCols; i++) {
4482 icFloatNumber *to = pNew->entry(j, i);
4483 const icFloatNumber *from = entry(0, i);
4484
4485 *to = 0.0f;
4486 for (k=0; k<m_nRows; k++) {
4487 *to += row[k] * (*from);
4488 from += m_nCols;
4489 }
4490 }
4491 }
4492
4493 return pNew;
4494}
4495
4496
4507CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepMatrix::concat(CIccPcsStep *pNext) const
4508{
4509 if (pNext) {
4510 if (pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepScale && GetDstChannels()==pNext->GetSrcChannels())
4511 return Mult((const CIccPcsStepScale*)pNext);
4512 if (pNext->GetType()==icPcsStepMatrix && GetDstChannels()==pNext->GetSrcChannels())
4513 return Mult((const CIccPcsStepMatrix*)pNext);
4514 }
4515
4516 return NULL;
4517}
4518
4529CIccPcsStep *CIccPcsStepMatrix::reduce() const
4530{
4531 int nVals = m_nRows*m_nCols;
4532 int nNonZeros = 0;
4533 int i;
4534
4535 for (i=0; i<nVals; i++) {
4536 icFloatNumber v = m_vals[i];
4537 if (icNotZero(v))
4538 nNonZeros++;
4539 }
4540 if (nNonZeros<nVals*3/4) {
4541 icUInt32Number nMatrixBytes = CIccSparseMatrix::MemSize(nNonZeros, m_nRows, sizeof(icFloatNumber))+4*sizeof(icFloatNumber);
4542 CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix *pMtx = new CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix(m_nRows, m_nCols, nMatrixBytes);
4543 CIccSparseMatrix mtx(pMtx->data(), nMatrixBytes);
4544 mtx.Init(m_nRows, m_nCols, true);
4545 mtx.FillFromFullMatrix(m_vals);
4546 return pMtx;
4547 }
4548
4549 return (CIccPcsStep*)this;
4550}
4551
4552
4553
4562CIccPcsStepMpe::CIccPcsStepMpe(CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMpe)
4563{
4564 m_pMpe = pMpe;
4565}
4566
4567
4576CIccPcsStepMpe::~CIccPcsStepMpe()
4577{
4578 if (m_pMpe)
4579 delete m_pMpe;
4580}
4581
4582
4591CIccApplyPcsStep* CIccPcsStepMpe::GetNewApply()
4592{
4593 CIccApplyPcsStepMpe *rv = new CIccApplyPcsStepMpe(this, m_pMpe->GetNewApply());
4594
4595 return rv;
4596}
4597
4598
4607void CIccPcsStepMpe::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4608{
4609 CIccApplyPcsStepMpe *pMpeApply = (CIccApplyPcsStepMpe*)pApply;
4610
4611 m_pMpe->Apply(pMpeApply->m_pApply, pDst, pSrc);
4612}
4613
4614
4623void CIccPcsStepMpe::dump(std::string &str) const
4624{
4625 str += "\nCIccPcsStepMpe\n\n";
4626 m_pMpe->Describe(str, 100); // TODO propogate nVerboseness
4627}
4628
4629
4638bool CIccPcsStepMpe::isIdentity() const
4639{
4640 if (!m_pMpe || !m_pMpe->NumElements())
4641 return true;
4642 return false;
4643}
4644
4654icUInt16Number CIccPcsStepMpe::GetSrcChannels() const
4655{
4656 return m_pMpe->NumInputChannels();
4657}
4658
4659
4669icUInt16Number CIccPcsStepMpe::GetDstChannels() const
4670{
4671 return m_pMpe->NumOutputChannels();
4672}
4673
4674
4684CIccMpeMatrix *CIccPcsStepMpe::GetMatrix() const
4685{
4686 //Must be single element
4687 if (m_pMpe->NumElements() == 1) {
4688 CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem = m_pMpe->GetElement(0);
4689 //Must be a matrix
4690 if (pElem && pElem->GetType() == icSigMatrixElemType) {
4691 CIccMpeMatrix *pMtx = (CIccMpeMatrix*)pElem;
4692
4693 //Should not apply any constants
4694 if (!pMtx->GetConstants() || !pMtx->GetApplyConstants())
4695 return pMtx;
4696 }
4697 }
4698
4699 return NULL;
4700}
4701
4702
4703
4704
4714bool CIccPcsStepMpe::Begin()
4715{
4716 return m_pMpe->Begin();
4717}
4718
4719
4728CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix::CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix(icUInt16Number nRows, icUInt16Number nCols)
4729{
4730 m_nRows = nRows;
4731 m_nCols = nCols;
4732 m_vals = new icFloatNumber[nCols];
4733}
4734
4735
4744CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix::~CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix()
4745{
4746 if (m_vals)
4747 delete m_vals;
4748}
4749
4750
4760void CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4761{
4762 int i, j;
4763 const icFloatNumber *row = pSrc;
4764 for (j=0; j<m_nRows; j++) {
4765 pDst[j] = 0.0f;
4766 for (i=0; i<m_nCols; i++) {
4767 pDst[j] += row[i] * m_vals[i];
4768 }
4769 row += m_nCols;
4770 }
4771}
4772
4773
4782void CIccPcsStepSrcMatrix::dump(std::string &str) const
4783{
4784 str += "\nCIccPcsStepSrcMatrix\n\n";
4785 char buf[80];
4786 for (int i=0; i<m_nCols; i++) {
4787 sprintf(buf, ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT, m_vals[i]);
4788 str += buf;
4789 }
4790 str += "\n";
4791}
4792
4793
4802CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix::CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix(icUInt16Number nRows, icUInt16Number nCols, icUInt32Number nBytesPerMatrix)
4803{
4804 m_nRows = nRows;
4805 m_nCols = nCols;
4806 m_nBytesPerMatrix = nBytesPerMatrix;
4807 m_nChannels = 0;
4808 m_vals = new icFloatNumber[m_nBytesPerMatrix/sizeof(icFloatNumber)];
4809}
4810
4811
4820CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix::~CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix()
4821{
4822 if (m_vals)
4823 delete [] m_vals;
4824}
4825
4826
4836void CIccPcsStepSparseMatrix::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4837{
4838 CIccSparseMatrix mtx((icUInt8Number*)m_vals, m_nBytesPerMatrix, icSparseMatrixFloatNum, true);
4839
4840 mtx.MultiplyVector(pDst, pSrc);
4841}

4855// char buf[80];

4857// sprintf(buf, ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT, m_vals[i]);
4858// str += buf;
4859// }

4861}

4873{

4875 m_nCols = nCols;
4876 m_nChannels = nChannels;
4877 m_nBytesPerMatrix = nChannels * sizeof(icFloatNumber);
4878
4879 m_vals = new icFloatNumber[nCols];
4880}

4895}

4907void CIccPcsStepSrcSparseMatrix::Apply(CIccApplyPcsStep *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDst, const icFloatNumber *pSrc) const
4908{
4909 CIccSparseMatrix mtx((icUInt8Number*)pSrc, m_nBytesPerMatrix, icSparseMatrixFloatNum, true);
4910
4911 mtx.MultiplyVector(pDst, m_vals);
4912}

4914
4923void CIccPcsStepSrcSparseMatrix::dump(std::string &str) const

4926 char buf[80];

4928 sprintf(buf, ICCPCSSTEPDUMPFMT, m_vals[i]);
4929 str += buf;
4930 }

4933
4934
4943CIccXformMonochrome::CIccXformMonochrome()
4944{
4945 m_Curve = NULL;
4946 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
4947 m_bFreeCurve = false;
4948}
4949
4958CIccXformMonochrome::~CIccXformMonochrome()
4959{
4960 if (m_bFreeCurve && m_Curve) {
4961 delete m_Curve;
4962 }
4963}
4964
4975icStatusCMM CIccXformMonochrome::Begin()
4976{
4977 icStatusCMM status;
4978
4979 status = CIccXform::Begin();
4980 if (status != icCmmStatOk)
4981 return status;
4982
4983 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
4984
4985 if (m_bInput) {
4986 m_Curve = GetCurve(icSigGrayTRCTag);
4987
4988 if (!m_Curve) {
4989 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
4990 }
4991 }
4992 else {
4993 m_Curve = GetInvCurve(icSigGrayTRCTag);
4994 m_bFreeCurve = true;
4995
4996 if (!m_Curve) {
4997 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
4998 }
4999 }
5000
5001 m_Curve->Begin();
5002 if (!m_Curve->IsIdentity()) {
5003 m_ApplyCurvePtr = m_Curve;
5004 }
5005
5006 return icCmmStatOk;
5007}
5008
5022void CIccXformMonochrome::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
5023{
5024 icFloatNumber Pixel[3];
5025
5026 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
5027 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
5028
5029 if (m_bInput) {
5030 Pixel[0] = SrcPixel[0];
5031
5032 if (m_ApplyCurvePtr) {
5033 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtr->Apply(Pixel[0]);
5034 }
5035
5036 DstPixel[0] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteX);
5037 DstPixel[1] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteY);
5038 DstPixel[2] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteZ);
5039
5040 icXyzToPcs(DstPixel);
5041
5042 if (m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs==icSigLabData) {
5043 if (UseLegacyPCS()) {
5044 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab2(DstPixel, DstPixel, true);
5045 }
5046 else {
5047 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab(DstPixel, DstPixel, true);
5048 }
5049 }
5050
5051 DstPixel[0] *= Pixel[0];
5052 DstPixel[1] *= Pixel[0];
5053 DstPixel[2] *= Pixel[0];
5054 }
5055 else {
5056 Pixel[0] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteX);
5057 Pixel[1] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteY);
5058 Pixel[2] = icFloatNumber(icPerceptualRefWhiteZ);
5059
5060 icXyzToPcs(Pixel);
5061
5062 if (m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs==icSigLabData) {
5063 if (UseLegacyPCS()) {
5064 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab2(Pixel, Pixel, true);
5065 }
5066 else {
5067 CIccPCSUtil::XyzToLab(Pixel, Pixel, true);
5068 }
5069 DstPixel[0] = SrcPixel[0]/Pixel[0];
5070 }
5071 else {
5072 DstPixel[0] = SrcPixel[1]/Pixel[1];
5073 }
5074
5075 if (m_ApplyCurvePtr) {
5076 DstPixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtr->Apply(DstPixel[0]);
5077 }
5078 }
5079
5080 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
5081 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
5082}
5083
5098CIccCurve *CIccXformMonochrome::GetCurve(icSignature sig) const
5099{
5100 CIccTag *pTag = m_pProfile->FindTag(sig);
5101
5102 if (pTag && (pTag->GetType()==icSigCurveType || pTag->GetType()==icSigParametricCurveType)) {
5103 return (CIccCurve*)pTag;
5104 }
5105
5106 return NULL;
5107}
5108
5123CIccCurve *CIccXformMonochrome::GetInvCurve(icSignature sig) const
5124{
5125 CIccCurve *pCurve;
5126 CIccTagCurve *pInvCurve;
5127
5128 if (!(pCurve = GetCurve(sig)))
5129 return NULL;
5130
5131 pCurve->Begin();
5132
5133 pInvCurve = new CIccTagCurve(2048);
5134
5135 int i;
5136 icFloatNumber x;
5137 icFloatNumber *Lut = &(*pInvCurve)[0];
5138
5139 for (i=0; i<2048; i++) {
5140 x=(icFloatNumber)i / 2047;
5141
5142 Lut[i] = pCurve->Find(x);
5143 }
5144
5145 return pInvCurve;
5146}
5147
5162LPIccCurve* CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractInputCurves()
5163{
5164 if (m_bInput) {
5165 if (m_Curve) {
5166 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[1];
5167 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve->NewCopy());
5168 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5169 return Curve;
5170 }
5171 }
5172
5173 return NULL;
5174}
5175
5190LPIccCurve* CIccXformMonochrome::ExtractOutputCurves()
5191{
5192 if (!m_bInput) {
5193 if (m_Curve) {
5194 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[1];
5195 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve->NewCopy());
5196 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5197 return Curve;
5198 }
5199 }
5200
5201 return NULL;
5202}
5203
5212CIccXformMatrixTRC::CIccXformMatrixTRC() : m_e{}
5213{
5214 m_Curve[0] = m_Curve[1] = m_Curve[2] = NULL;
5215 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5216 m_bFreeCurve = false;
5217}
5218
5227CIccXformMatrixTRC::~CIccXformMatrixTRC()
5228{
5229 if (m_bFreeCurve) {
5230 if (m_Curve[0])
5231 delete m_Curve[0];
5232 if (m_Curve[1])
5233 delete m_Curve[1];
5234 if (m_Curve[2])
5235 delete m_Curve[2];
5236 }
5237}
5238
5249icStatusCMM CIccXformMatrixTRC::Begin()
5250{
5251 icStatusCMM status;
5252 const CIccTagXYZ *pXYZ;
5253
5254 status = CIccXform::Begin();
5255 if (status != icCmmStatOk)
5256 return status;
5257
5258 pXYZ = GetColumn(icSigRedMatrixColumnTag);
5259 if (!pXYZ) {
5260 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
5261 }
5262
5263 m_e[0] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].X);
5264 m_e[3] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Y);
5265 m_e[6] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Z);
5266
5267 pXYZ = GetColumn(icSigGreenMatrixColumnTag);
5268 if (!pXYZ) {
5269 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
5270 }
5271
5272 m_e[1] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].X);
5273 m_e[4] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Y);
5274 m_e[7] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Z);
5275
5276 pXYZ = GetColumn(icSigBlueMatrixColumnTag);
5277 if (!pXYZ) {
5278 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
5279 }
5280
5281 m_e[2] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].X);
5282 m_e[5] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Y);
5283 m_e[8] = icFtoD((*pXYZ)[0].Z);
5284
5285 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5286
5287 if (m_bInput) {
5288 m_Curve[0] = GetCurve(icSigRedTRCTag);
5289 m_Curve[1] = GetCurve(icSigGreenTRCTag);
5290 m_Curve[2] = GetCurve(icSigBlueTRCTag);
5291
5292 if (!m_Curve[0] || !m_Curve[1] || !m_Curve[2]) {
5293 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
5294 }
5295
5296 }
5297 else {
5298 if (m_pProfile->m_Header.pcs!=icSigXYZData) {
5299 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
5300 }
5301
5302 m_Curve[0] = GetInvCurve(icSigRedTRCTag);
5303 m_Curve[1] = GetInvCurve(icSigGreenTRCTag);
5304 m_Curve[2] = GetInvCurve(icSigBlueTRCTag);
5305
5306 m_bFreeCurve = true;
5307
5308 if (!m_Curve[0] || !m_Curve[1] || !m_Curve[2]) {
5309 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
5310 }
5311
5312 if (!icMatrixInvert3x3(m_e)) {
5313 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
5314 }
5315 }
5316
5317 m_Curve[0]->Begin();
5318 m_Curve[1]->Begin();
5319 m_Curve[2]->Begin();
5320
5321 if (!m_Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !m_Curve[1]->IsIdentity() || !m_Curve[2]->IsIdentity()) {
5322 m_ApplyCurvePtr = m_Curve;
5323 }
5324
5325 return icCmmStatOk;
5326}
5327
5328
5329static icFloatNumber XYZScale(icFloatNumber v)
5330{
5331 v = (icFloatNumber)(v * 32768.0 / 65535.0);
5332 return v;
5333}
5334
5335static icFloatNumber XYZDescale(icFloatNumber v)
5336{
5337 return (icFloatNumber)(v * 65535.0 / 32768.0);
5338}
5339
5340static icFloatNumber RGBClip(icFloatNumber v, CIccCurve *pCurve)
5341{
5342 if (v<=0)
5343 return(pCurve->Apply(0));
5344 else if (v>=1.0)
5345 return (pCurve->Apply(1.0));
5346
5347 return pCurve->Apply(v);
5348}
5349
5363void CIccXformMatrixTRC::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
5364{
5365 icFloatNumber Pixel[3];
5366
5367 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
5368 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
5369
5370 Pixel[0] = SrcPixel[0];
5371 Pixel[1] = SrcPixel[1];
5372 Pixel[2] = SrcPixel[2];
5373
5374 if (m_bInput) {
5375
5376 double LinR, LinG, LinB;
5377 if (m_ApplyCurvePtr) {
5378 LinR = m_ApplyCurvePtr[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
5379 LinG = m_ApplyCurvePtr[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
5380 LinB = m_ApplyCurvePtr[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
5381 }
5382 else {
5383 LinR = Pixel[0];
5384 LinG = Pixel[1];
5385 LinB = Pixel[2];
5386 }
5387
5388 DstPixel[0] = XYZScale((icFloatNumber)(m_e[0] * LinR + m_e[1] * LinG + m_e[2] * LinB));
5389 DstPixel[1] = XYZScale((icFloatNumber)(m_e[3] * LinR + m_e[4] * LinG + m_e[5] * LinB));
5390 DstPixel[2] = XYZScale((icFloatNumber)(m_e[6] * LinR + m_e[7] * LinG + m_e[8] * LinB));
5391 }
5392 else {
5393 double X = XYZDescale(Pixel[0]);
5394 double Y = XYZDescale(Pixel[1]);
5395 double Z = XYZDescale(Pixel[2]);
5396
5397 if (m_ApplyCurvePtr) {
5398 DstPixel[0] = RGBClip((icFloatNumber)(m_e[0] * X + m_e[1] * Y + m_e[2] * Z), m_ApplyCurvePtr[0]);
5399 DstPixel[1] = RGBClip((icFloatNumber)(m_e[3] * X + m_e[4] * Y + m_e[5] * Z), m_ApplyCurvePtr[1]);
5400 DstPixel[2] = RGBClip((icFloatNumber)(m_e[6] * X + m_e[7] * Y + m_e[8] * Z), m_ApplyCurvePtr[2]);
5401 }
5402 else {
5403 DstPixel[0] = (icFloatNumber)(m_e[0] * X + m_e[1] * Y + m_e[2] * Z);
5404 DstPixel[1] = (icFloatNumber)(m_e[3] * X + m_e[4] * Y + m_e[5] * Z);
5405 DstPixel[2] = (icFloatNumber)(m_e[6] * X + m_e[7] * Y + m_e[8] * Z);
5406 }
5407 }
5408
5409 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
5410 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
5411}
5412
5427CIccCurve *CIccXformMatrixTRC::GetCurve(icSignature sig) const
5428{
5429 CIccTag *pTag = m_pProfile->FindTag(sig);
5430
5431 if (pTag && (pTag->GetType()==icSigCurveType || pTag->GetType()==icSigParametricCurveType)) {
5432 return (CIccCurve*)pTag;
5433 }
5434
5435 return NULL;
5436}
5437
5452CIccTagXYZ *CIccXformMatrixTRC::GetColumn(icSignature sig) const
5453{
5454 CIccTag *pTag = m_pProfile->FindTag(sig);
5455
5456 if (!pTag || pTag->GetType()!=icSigXYZType) {
5457 return NULL;
5458 }
5459
5460 return (CIccTagXYZ*)pTag;
5461}
5462
5477CIccCurve *CIccXformMatrixTRC::GetInvCurve(icSignature sig) const
5478{
5479 CIccCurve *pCurve;
5480 CIccTagCurve *pInvCurve;
5481
5482 if (!(pCurve = GetCurve(sig)))
5483 return NULL;
5484
5485 pCurve->Begin();
5486
5487 pInvCurve = new CIccTagCurve(2048);
5488
5489 int i;
5490 icFloatNumber x;
5491 icFloatNumber *Lut = &(*pInvCurve)[0];
5492
5493 for (i=0; i<2048; i++) {
5494 x=(icFloatNumber)i / 2047;
5495
5496 Lut[i] = pCurve->Find(x);
5497 }
5498
5499 return pInvCurve;
5500}
5501
5516LPIccCurve* CIccXformMatrixTRC::ExtractInputCurves()
5517{
5518 if (m_bInput) {
5519 if (m_Curve[0]) {
5520 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[3];
5521 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[0]->NewCopy());
5522 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[1]->NewCopy());
5523 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[2]->NewCopy());
5524 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5525 return Curve;
5526 }
5527 }
5528
5529 return NULL;
5530}
5531
5546LPIccCurve* CIccXformMatrixTRC::ExtractOutputCurves()
5547{
5548 if (!m_bInput) {
5549 if (m_Curve[0]) {
5550 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[3];
5551 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[0]->NewCopy());
5552 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[1]->NewCopy());
5553 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_Curve[2]->NewCopy());
5554 m_ApplyCurvePtr = NULL;
5555 return Curve;
5556 }
5557 }
5558
5559 return NULL;
5560}
5561
5573CIccXform3DLut::CIccXform3DLut(CIccTag *pTag)
5574{
5575 if (pTag && pTag->IsMBBType()) {
5576 m_pTag = (CIccMBB*)pTag;
5577 }
5578 else
5579 m_pTag = NULL;
5580
5581 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = m_ApplyCurvePtrB = m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
5582 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
5583}
5584
5593CIccXform3DLut::~CIccXform3DLut()
5594{
5595}
5596
5607 icStatusCMM CIccXform3DLut::Begin()
5608{
5609 icStatusCMM status;
5610 CIccCurve **Curve;
5611 int i;
5612
5613 status = CIccXform::Begin();
5614 if (status != icCmmStatOk)
5615 return status;
5616
5617 if (!m_pTag ||
5618 m_pTag->InputChannels()!=3) {
5619 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
5620 }
5621
5622 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
5623 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
5624 m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
5625
5626 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5627 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
5628 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
5629
5630 Curve[0]->Begin();
5631 Curve[1]->Begin();
5632 Curve[2]->Begin();
5633
5634 if (!Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[1]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[2]->IsIdentity()) {
5635 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
5636 }
5637 }
5638
5639 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesM) {
5640 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesM;
5641
5642 Curve[0]->Begin();
5643 Curve[1]->Begin();
5644 Curve[2]->Begin();
5645
5646 if (!Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[1]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[2]->IsIdentity()) {
5647 m_ApplyCurvePtrM = Curve;
5648 }
5649 }
5650
5651 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
5652 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
5653 }
5654
5655 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
5656 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
5657
5658 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5659 Curve[i]->Begin();
5660 }
5661
5662 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5663 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
5664 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
5665 break;
5666 }
5667 }
5668 }
5669
5670 }
5671 else {
5672 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
5673 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
5674
5675 Curve[0]->Begin();
5676 Curve[1]->Begin();
5677 Curve[2]->Begin();
5678
5679 if (!Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[1]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[2]->IsIdentity()) {
5680 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
5681 }
5682 }
5683
5684 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
5685 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
5686 }
5687
5688 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesM) {
5689 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesM;
5690
5691 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5692 Curve[i]->Begin();
5693 }
5694
5695 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5696 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
5697 m_ApplyCurvePtrM = Curve;
5698 break;
5699 }
5700 }
5701 }
5702
5703 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
5704 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
5705
5706 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5707 Curve[i]->Begin();
5708 }
5709
5710 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5711 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
5712 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
5713 break;
5714 }
5715 }
5716 }
5717 }
5718
5719 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
5720 if (m_pTag->m_Matrix) {
5721 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5722 if (m_pTag->m_nInput!=3) {
5723 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
5724 }
5725 }
5726 else {
5727 if (m_pTag->m_nOutput!=3) {
5728 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
5729 }
5730 }
5731
5732 if (!m_pTag->m_Matrix->IsIdentity()) {
5733 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = m_pTag->m_Matrix;
5734 }
5735 }
5736
5737 return icCmmStatOk;
5738}
5739
5753void CIccXform3DLut::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
5754{
5755 icFloatNumber Pixel[16];
5756 int i;
5757
5758 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
5759 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
5760
5761 Pixel[0] = SrcPixel[0];
5762 Pixel[1] = SrcPixel[1];
5763 Pixel[2] = SrcPixel[2];
5764
5765 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5766 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
5767 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
5768 Pixel[1] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
5769 Pixel[2] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
5770 }
5771
5772 if (m_ApplyMatrixPtr) {
5773 m_ApplyMatrixPtr->Apply(Pixel);
5774 }
5775
5776 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrM) {
5777 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
5778 Pixel[1] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
5779 Pixel[2] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
5780 }
5781
5782 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
5783 if (m_nInterp==icInterpLinear)
5784 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp3d(Pixel, Pixel);
5785 else
5786 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp3dTetra(Pixel, Pixel);
5787 }
5788
5789 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
5790 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5791 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
5792 }
5793 }
5794
5795 }
5796 else {
5797 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
5798 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
5799 Pixel[1] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
5800 Pixel[2] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
5801 }
5802
5803 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
5804 if (m_nInterp==icInterpLinear)
5805 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp3d(Pixel, Pixel);
5806 else
5807 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp3dTetra(Pixel, Pixel);
5808 }
5809
5810 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrM) {
5811 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5812 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
5813 }
5814 }
5815
5816 if (m_ApplyMatrixPtr) {
5817 m_ApplyMatrixPtr->Apply(Pixel);
5818 }
5819
5820 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
5821 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5822 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
5823 }
5824 }
5825 }
5826
5827 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5828 DstPixel[i] = Pixel[i];
5829 }
5830
5831 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
5832 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
5833}
5834
5849LPIccCurve* CIccXform3DLut::ExtractInputCurves()
5850{
5851 if (m_bInput) {
5852 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5853 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
5854 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[3];
5855 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[0]->NewCopy());
5856 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[1]->NewCopy());
5857 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[2]->NewCopy());
5858 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
5859 return Curve;
5860 }
5861 }
5862 else {
5863 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
5864 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[3];
5865 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[0]->NewCopy());
5866 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[1]->NewCopy());
5867 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[2]->NewCopy());
5868 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
5869 return Curve;
5870 }
5871 }
5872 }
5873
5874 return NULL;
5875}
5876
5891LPIccCurve* CIccXform3DLut::ExtractOutputCurves()
5892{
5893 if (!m_bInput) {
5894 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5895 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
5896 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
5897 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5898 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[i]->NewCopy());
5899 }
5900 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
5901 return Curve;
5902 }
5903 }
5904 else {
5905 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
5906 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
5907 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
5908 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[i]->NewCopy());
5909 }
5910 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
5911 return Curve;
5912 }
5913 }
5914 }
5915
5916 return NULL;
5917}
5918
5930CIccXform4DLut::CIccXform4DLut(CIccTag *pTag)
5931{
5932 if (pTag && pTag->IsMBBType()) {
5933 m_pTag = (CIccMBB*)pTag;
5934 }
5935 else
5936 m_pTag = NULL;
5937
5938 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = m_ApplyCurvePtrB = m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
5939 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
5940}
5941
5942
5951CIccXform4DLut::~CIccXform4DLut()
5952{
5953}
5954
5955
5966icStatusCMM CIccXform4DLut::Begin()
5967{
5968 icStatusCMM status;
5969 CIccCurve **Curve;
5970 int i;
5971
5972 status = CIccXform::Begin();
5973 if (status != icCmmStatOk) {
5974 return status;
5975 }
5976
5977 if (!m_pTag ||
5978 m_pTag->InputChannels()!=4) {
5979 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
5980 }
5981
5982 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = m_ApplyCurvePtrB = m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
5983
5984 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
5985 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
5986 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
5987
5988 Curve[0]->Begin();
5989 Curve[1]->Begin();
5990 Curve[2]->Begin();
5991 Curve[3]->Begin();
5992
5993 if (!Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[1]->IsIdentity() ||
5994 !Curve[2]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[3]->IsIdentity())
5995 {
5996 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
5997 }
5998 }
5999
6000 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6001 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
6002 }
6003
6004 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6005 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
6006
6007 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6008 Curve[i]->Begin();
6009 }
6010
6011 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6012 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6013 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
6014 break;
6015 }
6016 }
6017 }
6018
6019 }
6020 else {
6021 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6022 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
6023
6024 Curve[0]->Begin();
6025 Curve[1]->Begin();
6026 Curve[2]->Begin();
6027 Curve[3]->Begin();
6028
6029 if (!Curve[0]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[1]->IsIdentity() ||
6030 !Curve[2]->IsIdentity() || !Curve[3]->IsIdentity())
6031 {
6032 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
6033 }
6034 }
6035
6036 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6037 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
6038 }
6039
6040 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesM) {
6041 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesM;
6042
6043 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6044 Curve[i]->Begin();
6045 }
6046
6047 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6048 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6049 m_ApplyCurvePtrM = Curve;
6050 break;
6051 }
6052 }
6053 }
6054
6055 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6056 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
6057
6058 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6059 Curve[i]->Begin();
6060 }
6061
6062 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6063 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6064 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
6065 break;
6066 }
6067 }
6068 }
6069 }
6070
6071 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
6072 if (m_pTag->m_Matrix) {
6073 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6074 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
6075 }
6076 else {
6077 if (m_pTag->m_nOutput!=3) {
6078 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
6079 }
6080 }
6081
6082 if (!m_pTag->m_Matrix->IsIdentity()) {
6083 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = m_pTag->m_Matrix;
6084 }
6085 }
6086
6087 return icCmmStatOk;
6088}
6089
6090
6104void CIccXform4DLut::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
6105{
6106 icFloatNumber Pixel[16];
6107 int i;
6108
6109 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
6110 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
6111
6112 Pixel[0] = SrcPixel[0];
6113 Pixel[1] = SrcPixel[1];
6114 Pixel[2] = SrcPixel[2];
6115 Pixel[3] = SrcPixel[3];
6116
6117 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6118 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
6119 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
6120 Pixel[1] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
6121 Pixel[2] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
6122 Pixel[3] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[3]->Apply(Pixel[3]);
6123 }
6124
6125 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6126 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp4d(Pixel, Pixel);
6127 }
6128
6129 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
6130 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6131 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6132 }
6133 }
6134
6135 }
6136 else {
6137 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
6138 Pixel[0] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[0]->Apply(Pixel[0]);
6139 Pixel[1] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[1]->Apply(Pixel[1]);
6140 Pixel[2] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[2]->Apply(Pixel[2]);
6141 Pixel[3] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[3]->Apply(Pixel[3]);
6142 }
6143
6144 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6145 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp4d(Pixel, Pixel);
6146 }
6147
6148 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrM) {
6149 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6150 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6151 }
6152 }
6153
6154 if (m_ApplyMatrixPtr) {
6155 m_ApplyMatrixPtr->Apply(Pixel);
6156 }
6157
6158 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
6159 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6160 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6161 }
6162 }
6163 }
6164
6165 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6166 DstPixel[i] = Pixel[i];
6167 }
6168
6169 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
6170 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
6171}
6172
6187LPIccCurve* CIccXform4DLut::ExtractInputCurves()
6188{
6189 if (m_bInput) {
6190 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6191 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6192 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[4];
6193 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[0]->NewCopy());
6194 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[1]->NewCopy());
6195 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[2]->NewCopy());
6196 Curve[3] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[3]->NewCopy());
6197 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
6198 return Curve;
6199 }
6200 }
6201 else {
6202 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6203 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[4];
6204 Curve[0] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[0]->NewCopy());
6205 Curve[1] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[1]->NewCopy());
6206 Curve[2] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[2]->NewCopy());
6207 Curve[3] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[3]->NewCopy());
6208 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
6209 return Curve;
6210 }
6211 }
6212 }
6213
6214 return NULL;
6215}
6216
6231LPIccCurve* CIccXform4DLut::ExtractOutputCurves()
6232{
6233 if (!m_bInput) {
6234 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6235 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6236 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
6237 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6238 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[i]->NewCopy());
6239 }
6240 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
6241 return Curve;
6242 }
6243 }
6244 else {
6245 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6246 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
6247 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6248 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[i]->NewCopy());
6249 }
6250 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
6251 return Curve;
6252 }
6253 }
6254 }
6255
6256 return NULL;
6257}
6258
6259
6271CIccXformNDLut::CIccXformNDLut(CIccTag *pTag)
6272{
6273 if (pTag && pTag->IsMBBType()) {
6274 m_pTag = (CIccMBB*)pTag;
6275 }
6276 else
6277 m_pTag = NULL;
6278
6279 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = m_ApplyCurvePtrB = m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
6280 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
6281 m_nNumInput = 0;
6282}
6283
6284
6293CIccXformNDLut::~CIccXformNDLut()
6294{
6295}
6296
6297
6308icStatusCMM CIccXformNDLut::Begin()
6309{
6310 icStatusCMM status;
6311 CIccCurve **Curve;
6312 int i;
6313
6314 status = CIccXform::Begin();
6315 if (status != icCmmStatOk) {
6316 return status;
6317 }
6318
6319 if (!m_pTag || (m_pTag->InputChannels()>2 && m_pTag->InputChannels()<5)) {
6320 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
6321 }
6322
6323 m_nNumInput = m_pTag->m_nInput;
6324
6325 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = m_ApplyCurvePtrB = m_ApplyCurvePtrM = NULL;
6326
6327 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6328 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6329 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
6330
6331 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++)
6332 Curve[i]->Begin();
6333
6334 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++) {
6335 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6336 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
6337 break;
6338 }
6339 }
6340 }
6341
6342 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6343 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
6344 }
6345
6346 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6347 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
6348
6349 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6350 Curve[i]->Begin();
6351 }
6352
6353 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6354 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6355 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
6356 break;
6357 }
6358 }
6359 }
6360
6361 }
6362 else {
6363 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6364 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesA;
6365
6366 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++)
6367 Curve[i]->Begin();
6368
6369 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++) {
6370 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6371 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = Curve;
6372 break;
6373 }
6374 }
6375 }
6376
6377 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6378 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Begin();
6379 }
6380
6381 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesM) {
6382 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesM;
6383
6384 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6385 Curve[i]->Begin();
6386 }
6387
6388 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6389 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6390 m_ApplyCurvePtrM = Curve;
6391 break;
6392 }
6393 }
6394 }
6395
6396 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6397 Curve = m_pTag->m_CurvesB;
6398
6399 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6400 Curve[i]->Begin();
6401 }
6402
6403 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6404 if (!Curve[i]->IsIdentity()) {
6405 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = Curve;
6406 break;
6407 }
6408 }
6409 }
6410 }
6411
6412 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = NULL;
6413 if (m_pTag->m_Matrix) {
6414 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6415 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
6416 }
6417 else {
6418 if (m_pTag->m_nOutput!=3) {
6419 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
6420 }
6421 }
6422
6423 if (!m_pTag->m_Matrix->IsIdentity()) {
6424 m_ApplyMatrixPtr = m_pTag->m_Matrix;
6425 }
6426 }
6427
6428 return icCmmStatOk;
6429}
6430
6431
6443CIccApplyXform* CIccXformNDLut::GetNewApply(icStatusCMM& status)
6444{
6445 if (!m_pTag)
6446 return NULL;
6447
6448 CIccCLUT* pCLUT = m_pTag->GetCLUT();
6449 CIccApplyCLUT* pApply = NULL;
6450
6451 if (pCLUT && m_nNumInput > 6) {
6452 pApply = pCLUT->GetNewApply();
6453 if (!pApply) {
6454 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
6455 return NULL;
6456 }
6457 }
6458
6459 CIccApplyNDLutXform* rv = new CIccApplyNDLutXform(this, pApply);
6460
6461 if (!rv) {
6462 if (pApply)
6463 delete pApply;
6464 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
6465 return NULL;
6466 }
6467
6468 status = icCmmStatOk;
6469 return rv;
6470}
6471
6485void CIccXformNDLut::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
6486{
6487 icFloatNumber Pixel[16] = {0};
6488 int i;
6489
6490 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
6491 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
6492
6493 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++)
6494 Pixel[i] = SrcPixel[i];
6495
6496 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6497 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
6498 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++)
6499 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6500 }
6501
6502 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6503 switch(m_nNumInput) {
6504 case 5:
6505 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp5d(Pixel, Pixel);
6506 break;
6507 case 6:
6508 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp6d(Pixel, Pixel);
6509 break;
6510 default:
6511 {
6512 CIccApplyNDLutXform* pNDApply = (CIccApplyNDLutXform*)pApply;
6513 m_pTag->m_CLUT->InterpND(Pixel, Pixel, pNDApply->m_pApply);
6514 break;
6515 }
6516 }
6517 }
6518
6519 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
6520 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6521 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6522 }
6523 }
6524
6525 }
6526 else {
6527 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrA) {
6528 for (i=0; i<m_nNumInput; i++)
6529 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrA[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6530 }
6531
6532 if (m_pTag->m_CLUT) {
6533 switch(m_nNumInput) {
6534 case 5:
6535 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp5d(Pixel, Pixel);
6536 break;
6537 case 6:
6538 m_pTag->m_CLUT->Interp6d(Pixel, Pixel);
6539 break;
6540 default:
6541 {
6542 CIccApplyNDLutXform* pNDApply = (CIccApplyNDLutXform*)pApply;
6543 m_pTag->m_CLUT->InterpND(Pixel, Pixel, pNDApply->m_pApply);
6544 break;
6545 }
6546 break;
6547 }
6548 }
6549
6550 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrM) {
6551 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6552 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrM[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6553 }
6554 }
6555
6556 if (m_ApplyMatrixPtr) {
6557 m_ApplyMatrixPtr->Apply(Pixel);
6558 }
6559
6560 if (m_ApplyCurvePtrB) {
6561 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6562 Pixel[i] = m_ApplyCurvePtrB[i]->Apply(Pixel[i]);
6563 }
6564 }
6565 }
6566
6567 for (i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6568 DstPixel[i] = Pixel[i];
6569 }
6570
6571 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
6572 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
6573}
6574
6589LPIccCurve* CIccXformNDLut::ExtractInputCurves()
6590{
6591 if (m_bInput) {
6592 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6593 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6594 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nInput];
6595 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nInput; i++) {
6596 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[i]->NewCopy());
6597 }
6598 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
6599 return Curve;
6600 }
6601 }
6602 else {
6603 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6604 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nInput];
6605 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nInput; i++) {
6606 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[i]->NewCopy());
6607 }
6608 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
6609 return Curve;
6610 }
6611 }
6612 }
6613
6614 return NULL;
6615}
6616
6631LPIccCurve* CIccXformNDLut::ExtractOutputCurves()
6632{
6633 if (!m_bInput) {
6634 if (m_pTag->m_bInputMatrix) {
6635 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesA) {
6636 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
6637 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6638 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesA[i]->NewCopy());
6639 }
6640 m_ApplyCurvePtrA = NULL;
6641 return Curve;
6642 }
6643 }
6644 else {
6645 if (m_pTag->m_CurvesB) {
6646 LPIccCurve* Curve = new LPIccCurve[m_pTag->m_nOutput];
6647 for (int i=0; i<m_pTag->m_nOutput; i++) {
6648 Curve[i] = (LPIccCurve)(m_pTag->m_CurvesB[i]->NewCopy());
6649 }
6650 m_ApplyCurvePtrB = NULL;
6651 return Curve;
6652 }
6653 }
6654 }
6655
6656 return NULL;
6657}
6658
6672CIccXformNamedColor::CIccXformNamedColor(CIccTag *pTag, icColorSpaceSignature csPcs, icColorSpaceSignature csDevice,
6673 icSpectralColorSignature csSpectralPcs/* =icSigNoSpectralData */,
6674 const icSpectralRange *pSpectralRange /* = NULL */,
6675 const icSpectralRange *pBiSpectralRange /* = NULL */)
6676{
6677 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Pixel; // was uninitialized
6678 m_pTag = NULL;
6679 if (pTag) {
6680 if (pTag->GetType()==icSigNamedColor2Type) {
6681 m_pTag = (CIccTagNamedColor2*)pTag;
6682 m_pArray = NULL;
6683
6684 m_pTag->SetColorSpaces(csPcs, csDevice);
6685 }
6686 else if (pTag->GetTagArrayType()==icSigNamedColorArray) {
6687 CIccTagArray *pArray = (CIccTagArray*)pTag;
6688 CIccArrayNamedColor *pNamed = (CIccArrayNamedColor*)pArray->GetArrayHandler();
6689
6690 if (pNamed) {
6691 m_pTag = NULL;
6692 m_pArray = pNamed;
6693 pNamed->SetColorSpaces(csPcs, csDevice, csSpectralPcs, pSpectralRange, pBiSpectralRange);
6694 }
6695 }
6696 }
6697
6698 m_nSrcSpace = icSigUnknownData;
6699 m_nDestSpace = icSigUnknownData;
6700 m_pArray = NULL;
6701}
6702
6703
6712CIccXformNamedColor::~CIccXformNamedColor()
6713{
6714}
6715
6726icStatusCMM CIccXformNamedColor::Begin()
6727{
6728 icStatusCMM status;
6729
6730 status = CIccXform::Begin();
6731 if (status != icCmmStatOk)
6732 return status;
6733
6734 if (m_pTag==NULL && m_pArray==NULL) {
6735 return icCmmStatProfileMissingTag;
6736 }
6737
6738 if (m_nSrcSpace==icSigUnknownData ||
6739 m_nDestSpace==icSigUnknownData) {
6740 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
6741 }
6742
6743 if (m_nSrcSpace != icSigNamedData) {
6744 if (m_nDestSpace != icSigNamedData) {
6745 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Pixel;
6746 }
6747 else {
6748 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Named;
6749 }
6750 }
6751 else {
6752 if (m_nDestSpace != icSigNamedData) {
6753 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyNamed2Pixel;
6754 }
6755 else {
6756 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
6757 }
6758 }
6759
6760 if (m_pTag && !m_pTag->InitFindCachedPCSColor())
6761 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
6762 else if (m_pArray && !m_pArray->Begin())
6763 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
6764
6765 return icCmmStatOk;
6766}
6767
6768
6769
6783icStatusCMM CIccXformNamedColor::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icChar *DstColorName, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
6784{
6785
6786 if (m_pArray) {
6787 const CIccArrayNamedColor *pArray = m_pArray;
6788 CIccStructNamedColor *pColor;
6789
6790 std::string NamedColor;
6791
6792 if (IsSrcPCS()) {
6793 if (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(m_nSrcSpace)) {
6794 pColor = pArray->FindSpectralColor(SrcPixel);
6795 if (pColor)
6796 NamedColor = pColor->getName();
6797 else
6798 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6799 }
6800 else {
6801 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
6802 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
6803
6804 icFloatNumber pix[3];
6805 memcpy(pix, SrcPixel, 3*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
6806
6807 if (m_nSrcSpace == icSigLabPcsData)
6808 icLabFromPcs(pix);
6809 else {
6810 icXyzFromPcs(pix);
6811 icXYZtoLab(pix, pix);
6812 }
6813
6814 pColor = pArray->FindPcsColor(pix);
6815 if (pColor)
6816 NamedColor = pColor->getName();
6817 else
6818 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6819 }
6820 }
6821 else {
6822 pColor = pArray->FindDeviceColor(SrcPixel);
6823 if (pColor)
6824 NamedColor = pColor->getName();
6825 else
6826 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6827 }
6828
6829 sprintf(DstColorName, "%s", NamedColor.c_str());
6830 }
6831 else if (m_pTag) {
6832 const CIccTagNamedColor2 *pTag = m_pTag;
6833
6834 icFloatNumber DevicePix[16], PCSPix[3];
6835 std::string NamedColor;
6836 icUInt32Number i, j;
6837
6838 if (IsSrcPCS()) {
6839 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
6840 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
6841
6842 for(i=0; i<3; i++)
6843 PCSPix[i] = SrcPixel[i];
6844
6845 j = pTag->FindCachedPCSColor(PCSPix);
6846 pTag->GetColorName(NamedColor, j);
6847 }
6848 else {
6849 for(i=0; i<m_pTag->GetDeviceCoords(); i++)
6850 DevicePix[i] = SrcPixel[i];
6851
6852 j = pTag->FindDeviceColor(DevicePix);
6853 pTag->GetColorName(NamedColor, j);
6854 }
6855
6856 sprintf(DstColorName, "%s", NamedColor.c_str());
6857 }
6858 else
6859 return icCmmStatBadXform;
6860
6861 return icCmmStatOk;
6862}
6863
6864
6878icStatusCMM CIccXformNamedColor::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icChar *SrcColorName, icFloatNumber tint) const
6879{
6880
6881 if (m_pArray) {
6882 const CIccArrayNamedColor *pArray = m_pArray;
6883
6884 CIccStructNamedColor *pColor;
6885
6886 if (m_nSrcSpace != icSigNamedData)
6887 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
6888
6889 pColor = pArray->FindColor(SrcColorName);
6890 if (!pColor)
6891 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6892
6893 if (IsDestPCS()) {
6894 if (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(m_nDestSpace)) {
6895 if (!pArray->GetSpectralTint(DstPixel, pColor, tint))
6896 return icCmmStatBadTintXform;
6897 }
6898 else {
6899 if (!pArray->GetPcsTint(DstPixel, pColor, tint))
6900 return icCmmStatBadTintXform;
6901
6902 if (m_nDestSpace == icSigLabData) {
6903 icLabToPcs(DstPixel);
6904 }
6905 else {
6906 icXyzToPcs(DstPixel);
6907 }
6908 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
6909 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
6910 }
6911 }
6912 else {
6913 if (!pArray->GetDeviceTint(DstPixel, pColor, tint))
6914 return icCmmStatBadTintXform;
6915 }
6916 }
6917 else if (m_pTag) {
6918 const CIccTagNamedColor2 *pTag = m_pTag;
6919
6920 icInt32Number j;
6921
6922 if (m_nSrcSpace != icSigNamedData)
6923 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
6924
6925 if (IsDestPCS()) {
6926
6927 j = pTag->FindColor(SrcColorName);
6928 if (j<0)
6929 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6930
6931 if (m_nDestSpace == icSigLabData) {
6932 memcpy(DstPixel, pTag->GetEntry(j)->pcsCoords, 3*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
6933 }
6934 else {
6935 memcpy(DstPixel, pTag->GetEntry(j)->pcsCoords, 3*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
6936 }
6937 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
6938 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
6939 }
6940 else {
6941 j = pTag->FindColor(SrcColorName);
6942 if (j<0)
6943 return icCmmStatColorNotFound;
6944 memcpy(DstPixel, pTag->GetEntry(j)->deviceCoords, pTag->GetDeviceCoords()*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
6945 }
6946 }
6947
6948 return icCmmStatOk;
6949}
6950
6962icStatusCMM CIccXformNamedColor::SetSrcSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace)
6963{
6964 if (m_pArray) {
6965
6966 }
6967 else if (m_pTag) {
6968 CIccTagNamedColor2 *pTag = m_pTag;
6969
6970 if (nSrcSpace!=pTag->GetPCS())
6971 if (nSrcSpace!=pTag->GetDeviceSpace())
6972 if (nSrcSpace!=icSigNamedData)
6973 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
6974 }
6975
6976 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
6977
6978 return icCmmStatOk;
6979}
6980
6992icStatusCMM CIccXformNamedColor::SetDestSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace)
6993{
6994 if (m_nSrcSpace == nDestSpace)
6995 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
6996
6997 if (m_pArray) {
6998
6999 }
7000 else if (m_pTag) {
7001 CIccTagNamedColor2 *pTag = (CIccTagNamedColor2*)m_pTag;
7002
7003 if (nDestSpace!=pTag->GetPCS())
7004 if (nDestSpace!=pTag->GetDeviceSpace())
7005 if (nDestSpace!=icSigNamedData)
7006 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
7007 }
7008
7009 m_nDestSpace = nDestSpace;
7010
7011 return icCmmStatOk;
7012}
7013
7022bool CIccXformNamedColor::IsSrcPCS() const
7023{
7024 if (m_pTag) {
7025 return m_nSrcSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();
7026 }
7027 else if (m_pArray) {
7028 return IsSpacePCS(m_nSrcSpace);
7029 }
7030 else
7031 return false;
7032}
7033
7034
7043bool CIccXformNamedColor::IsDestPCS() const
7044{
7045 if (m_pTag) {
7046 return m_nDestSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();
7047 }
7048 else if (m_pArray) {
7049 return IsSpacePCS(m_nDestSpace);
7050 }
7051 else
7052 return false;
7053}
7054
7055
7064CIccXformMpe::CIccXformMpe(CIccTag *pTag)
7065{
7066 if (pTag && pTag->GetType()==icSigMultiProcessElementType)
7067 m_pTag = (CIccTagMultiProcessElement*)pTag;
7068 else
7069 m_pTag = NULL;
7070
7071 m_bUsingAcs = false;
7072 m_pAppliedPCC = NULL;
7073 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = false;
7074}
7075
7084CIccXformMpe::~CIccXformMpe()
7085{
7086 if (m_pAppliedPCC && m_bDeleteAppliedPCC)
7087 delete m_pAppliedPCC;
7088}
7089
7112CIccXform *CIccXformMpe::Create(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput/* =true */, icRenderingIntent nIntent/* =icUnknownIntent */,
7113 icXformInterp nInterp/* =icInterpLinear */, icXformLutType nLutType/* =icXformLutColor */,
7114 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager/* =NULL */)
7115{
7116 CIccXform *rv = NULL;
7117 icRenderingIntent nTagIntent = nIntent;
7118 bool bUseSpectralPCS = false;
7119 bool bAbsToRel = false;
7120 icXformLutType nUseLutType = nLutType;
7121 bool bUseColorimeticTags = true;
7122 bool bUseDToB = true;
7123
7124 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral) {
7125 nUseLutType = icXformLutColor;
7126 bUseColorimeticTags = false;
7127 }
7128 else if (nLutType == icXformLutColorimetric) {
7129 nUseLutType = icXformLutColor;
7130 bUseDToB = false;
7131 }
7132
7133 if (nTagIntent == icUnknownIntent)
7134 nTagIntent = icPerceptual;
7135
7136 switch (nUseLutType) {
7137 case icXformLutColor:
7138 if (bInput) {
7139 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
7140 if (bUseDToB) {
7141 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
7142
7143 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
7144 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB1Tag);
7145 if (pTag)
7146 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
7147 }
7148 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
7149 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB3Tag);
7150 if (pTag) {
7151 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
7152 bAbsToRel = true;
7153 }
7154 }
7155
7156 if (!pTag) {
7157 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigDToB0Tag);
7158 }
7159 }
7160
7161 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
7162 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
7163 pTag = NULL;
7164
7165 if (pTag && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
7166 bUseSpectralPCS = true;
7167 }
7168
7169 if (bUseColorimeticTags) {
7170 if (!pTag) {
7171 if (nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric)
7172 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
7173 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB0Tag + nTagIntent);
7174 }
7175
7176 if (!pTag) {
7177 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigAToB0Tag);
7178 }
7179 }
7180
7181 if (!pTag) {
7182 if (bUseColorimeticTags && pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigRgbData && pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV5) {
7183 rv = new CIccXformMatrixTRC();
7184 }
7185 else
7186 return NULL;
7187 }
7188 else if (pTag->GetType()==icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
7189 rv = new CIccXformMpe(pTag);
7190 }
7191 else {
7192 switch(pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace) {
7193 case icSigXYZData:
7194 case icSigLabData:
7195 case icSigLuvData:
7196 case icSigYCbCrData:
7197 case icSigYxyData:
7198 case icSigRgbData:
7199 case icSigHsvData:
7200 case icSigHlsData:
7201 case icSigCmyData:
7202 case icSig3colorData:
7203 rv = new CIccXform3DLut(pTag);
7204 break;
7205
7206 case icSigCmykData:
7207 case icSig4colorData:
7208 rv = new CIccXform4DLut(pTag);
7209 break;
7210
7211 default:
7212 rv = new CIccXformNDLut(pTag);
7213 break;
7214 }
7215 }
7216 }
7217 else {
7218 CIccTag *pTag = NULL;
7219
7220 if (bUseDToB) {
7221 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD0Tag + nTagIntent);
7222
7223 if (!pTag && nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
7224 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD1Tag);
7225 if (pTag)
7226 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
7227 }
7228 else if (!pTag && nTagIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric) {
7229 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD3Tag);
7230 if (pTag) {
7231 nTagIntent = icAbsoluteColorimetric;
7232 bAbsToRel = true;
7233 }
7234 }
7235
7236 if (!pTag) {
7237 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToD0Tag);
7238 }
7239 }
7240
7241 //Unsupported elements cause fall back behavior
7242 if (pTag && !pTag->IsSupported())
7243 pTag = NULL;
7244
7245 if (bUseColorimeticTags) {
7246 if (!pTag) {
7247 if (nTagIntent == icAbsoluteColorimetric)
7248 nTagIntent = icRelativeColorimetric;
7249 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA0Tag + nTagIntent);
7250 }
7251
7252 if (!pTag) {
7253 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigBToA0Tag);
7254 }
7255 }
7256
7257 if (!pTag) {
7258 if (bUseColorimeticTags && pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace == icSigRgbData && pProfile->m_Header.version<icVersionNumberV5) {
7259 rv = new CIccXformMatrixTRC();
7260 }
7261 else
7262 return NULL;
7263 }
7264
7265 if (pTag && pTag->GetType()==icSigMultiProcessElementType) {
7266 rv = new CIccXformMpe(pTag);
7267 }
7268 else {
7269 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
7270 case icSigXYZData:
7271 case icSigLabData:
7272 rv = new CIccXform3DLut(pTag);
7273
7274 default:
7275 break;
7276 }
7277 }
7278 }
7279 break;
7280
7281 case icXformLutNamedColor:
7282 {
7283 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigNamedColor2Tag);
7284 if (!pTag)
7285 return NULL;
7286
7287 rv = new CIccXformNamedColor(pTag, pProfile->m_Header.pcs, pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace,
7288 pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS,
7289 &pProfile->m_Header.spectralRange,
7290 &pProfile->m_Header.biSpectralRange);
7291 }
7292 break;
7293
7294 case icXformLutPreview:
7295 {
7296 bInput = false;
7297 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigPreview0Tag + nTagIntent);
7298 if (!pTag) {
7299 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigPreview0Tag);
7300 }
7301 if (!pTag) {
7302 return NULL;
7303 }
7304 else {
7305 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
7306 case icSigXYZData:
7307 case icSigLabData:
7308 rv = new CIccXform3DLut(pTag);
7309
7310 default:
7311 break;
7312 }
7313 }
7314 }
7315 break;
7316
7317 case icXformLutGamut:
7318 {
7319 bInput = false;
7320 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigGamutTag);
7321 if (!pTag) {
7322 return NULL;
7323 }
7324 else {
7325 switch(pProfile->m_Header.pcs) {
7326 case icSigXYZData:
7327 case icSigLabData:
7328 rv = new CIccXform3DLut(pTag);
7329
7330 default:
7331 break;
7332 }
7333 }
7334 }
7335 break;
7336 }
7337
7338 if (rv) {
7339 rv->SetParams(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nTagIntent, bUseSpectralPCS, nInterp, pHintManager, bAbsToRel);
7340 }
7341
7342 return rv;
7343}
7344
7354bool CIccXformMpe::IsLateBinding() const
7355{
7356 if (m_pTag)
7357 return m_pTag->IsLateBinding();
7358
7359 return false;
7360}
7361
7371bool CIccXformMpe::IsLateBindingReflectance() const
7372{
7373 if (m_pTag)
7374 return m_pTag->IsLateBindingReflectance();
7375
7376 return false;
7377}
7378
7387IIccProfileConnectionConditions *CIccXformMpe::GetConnectionConditions() const
7388{
7389 if (m_pAppliedPCC)
7390 return m_pAppliedPCC;
7391
7392 return m_pConnectionConditions;
7393}
7394
7405void CIccXformMpe::SetAppliedCC(IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPCC)
7406{
7407 if (!pPCC) {
7408 if (m_pAppliedPCC && m_bDeleteAppliedPCC) {
7409 delete m_pAppliedPCC;
7410 }
7411 m_pAppliedPCC = NULL;
7412 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = false;
7413 return;
7414 }
7415
7416 if (m_pTag) {
7417 bool bReflectance = m_pTag->IsLateBindingReflectance();
7418
7419 if (pPCC != (IIccProfileConnectionConditions *)m_pProfile) {
7420 if (!bReflectance) {
7421 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pViewPCC = pPCC ? pPCC->getPccViewingConditions() : NULL;
7422 const CIccTagSpectralViewingConditions *pViewProfile = m_pProfile ? m_pProfile->getPccViewingConditions() : NULL;
7423
7424 if (pViewPCC && pViewProfile &&
7425 pViewPCC->getStdIllumiant() == pViewProfile->getStdIllumiant() &&
7426 pViewPCC->getIlluminantCCT() == pViewProfile->getIlluminantCCT() &&
7427 pViewPCC->getStdIllumiant() != icIlluminantUnknown) {
7428 m_pAppliedPCC = pPCC;
7429 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = false;
7430 }
7431 else {
7432 m_pAppliedPCC = new CIccCombinedConnectionConditions(m_pProfile, pPCC, bReflectance);
7433 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = true;
7434 }
7435 }
7436 else {
7437 m_pAppliedPCC = new CIccCombinedConnectionConditions(m_pProfile, pPCC, bReflectance);
7438 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = true;
7439 }
7440 }
7441 else {
7442 m_pAppliedPCC = NULL;
7443 }
7444 }
7445 else {
7446 m_pAppliedPCC = pPCC;
7447 m_bDeleteAppliedPCC = false;
7448 }
7449}
7450
7451
7463icStatusCMM CIccXformMpe::Begin()
7464{
7465 icStatusCMM status;
7466 status = CIccXform::Begin();
7467
7468 if (status != icCmmStatOk)
7469 return status;
7470
7471 if (!m_pTag) {
7472 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
7473 }
7474
7475 if (!m_pTag->Begin(icElemInterpLinear, GetProfileCC(), GetConnectionConditions(), GetCmmEnvVarLookup())) {
7476 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
7477 }
7478
7479 return icCmmStatOk;
7480}
7481
7482
7492CIccApplyXform *CIccXformMpe::GetNewApply(icStatusCMM &status)
7493{
7494 if (!m_pTag)
7495 return NULL;
7496
7497 CIccApplyXformMpe *rv= new CIccApplyXformMpe(this);
7498
7499 if (!rv) {
7500 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
7501 return NULL;
7502 }
7503
7504 rv->m_pApply = m_pTag->GetNewApply();
7505 if (!rv->m_pApply) {
7506 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
7507 delete rv;
7508 return NULL;
7509 }
7510
7511 status = icCmmStatOk;
7512 return rv;
7513}
7514
7515
7529void CIccXformMpe::Apply(CIccApplyXform* pApply, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const
7530{
7531 const CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pTag = m_pTag;
7532
7533 icFloatNumber temp[3];
7534 if (!m_bInput || m_bPcsAdjustXform) { //PCS comming in?
7535 if (m_nIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric || m_nIntent != m_nTagIntent) { //B2D3 tags don't need abs conversion
7536 if (m_bSrcPcsConversion)
7537 SrcPixel = CheckSrcAbs(pApply, SrcPixel);
7538 }
7539
7540 //Since MPE tags use "real" values for PCS we need to convert from
7541 //internal encoding used by IccProfLib
7542 switch (GetSrcSpace()) {
7543 case icSigXYZData:
7544 memcpy(&temp[0], SrcPixel, 3*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
7545 icXyzFromPcs(temp);
7546 SrcPixel = &temp[0];
7547 break;
7548
7549 case icSigLabData:
7550 memcpy(&temp[0], SrcPixel, 3*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
7551 icLabFromPcs(temp);
7552 SrcPixel = &temp[0];
7553 break;
7554
7555 default:
7556 break;
7557 }
7558 }
7559
7560 //Note: pApply should be a CIccApplyXformMpe type here
7561 CIccApplyXformMpe *pApplyMpe = (CIccApplyXformMpe *)pApply;
7562
7563 pTag->Apply(pApplyMpe->m_pApply, DstPixel, SrcPixel);
7564
7565 if (m_bInput) { //PCS going out?
7566 //Since MPE tags use "real" values for PCS we need to convert to
7567 //internal encoding used by IccProfLib
7568 switch(GetDstSpace()) {
7569 case icSigXYZData:
7570 icXyzToPcs(DstPixel);
7571 break;
7572
7573 case icSigLabData:
7574 icLabToPcs(DstPixel);
7575 break;
7576
7577 default:
7578 break;
7579 }
7580
7581 if (m_nIntent != icAbsoluteColorimetric || m_nIntent != m_nTagIntent) { //D2B3 tags don't need abs conversion
7582 if (m_bDstPcsConversion)
7583 CheckDstAbs(DstPixel);
7584 }
7585 }
7586}
7587
7596CIccApplyXformMpe::CIccApplyXformMpe(CIccXformMpe *pXform) : CIccApplyXform(pXform)
7597{
7598 m_pApply = NULL;
7599}
7600
7609CIccApplyXformMpe::~CIccApplyXformMpe()
7610{
7611}
7612
7613
7625CIccApplyCmm::CIccApplyCmm(CIccCmm *pCmm)
7626{
7627 m_pCmm = pCmm;
7628 //m_pPCS = m_pCmm->GetPCS();
7629
7630 m_Xforms = new CIccApplyXformList;
7631 m_Xforms->clear();
7632
7633 m_Pixel = NULL;
7634 m_Pixel2 = NULL;
7635}
7636
7645CIccApplyCmm::~CIccApplyCmm()
7646{
7647 if (m_Xforms) {
7648 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
7649
7650 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
7651 if (i->ptr)
7652 delete i->ptr;
7653 }
7654
7655 delete m_Xforms;
7656 }
7657
7658// if (m_pPCS)
7659// delete m_pPCS;
7660
7661 if (m_Pixel)
7662 free(m_Pixel);
7663 if (m_Pixel2)
7664 free(m_Pixel2);
7665}
7666
7667bool CIccApplyCmm::InitPixel()
7668{
7669 if (m_Pixel && m_Pixel2)
7670 return true;
7671
7672 icUInt16Number nSamples = 16;
7673 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
7674
7675 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
7676 if (i->ptr->GetXform()) {
7677 icUInt16Number nXformSamples = i->ptr->GetXform()->GetNumDstSamples();
7678 if (nXformSamples>nSamples)
7679 nSamples=nXformSamples;
7680 }
7681 }
7682 m_Pixel = (icFloatNumber*)malloc(nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
7683 m_Pixel2 = (icFloatNumber*)malloc(nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
7684
7685 if (!m_Pixel || !m_Pixel2)
7686 return false;
7687
7688 return true;
7689}
7690
7691//#define DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7692
7693#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7694static void DumpCmmApplyPixel(int nCount, const icFloatNumber* pPixel, icUInt16Number nSamples)
7695{
7696 printf("Xfm%d:", nCount);
7697 for (icUInt16Number i = 0; i < nSamples; i++) {
7698 if (i)
7699 printf(",");
7700 printf(" %.3f", pPixel[i]);
7701 }
7702 printf("\n");
7703
7704}
7705#endif
7706
7719icStatusCMM CIccApplyCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
7720{
7721 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
7722 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
7723 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
7724 const CIccXform *pLastXform;
7725 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
7726 bool bNoClip;
7727
7728 if (!n)
7729 return icCmmStatBadXform;
7730
7731 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
7732 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
7733 }
7734
7735 pSrc = SrcPixel;
7736 pDst = m_Pixel;
7737
7738#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7739 int nCount = 0;
7740 printf("Start ApplyCmm\n");
7741 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pSrc, icGetSpaceSamples(m_pCmm->m_nSrcSpace));
7742#endif
7743
7744 if (n>1) {
7745 for (j=0, i=m_Xforms->begin(); j<n-1 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
7746
7747 i->ptr->Apply(pDst, pSrc);
7748
7749#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7750 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pDst, i->ptr->GetXform()->GetNumDstSamples());
7751#endif
7752
7753 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
7754 pSrc = pDst;
7755 if (pTmp == SrcPixel)
7756 pDst = m_Pixel2;
7757 else
7758 pDst = pTmp;
7759 }
7760
7761 pLastXform = i->ptr->GetXform();
7762 i->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, pSrc);
7763 bNoClip = pLastXform->NoClipPCS();
7764 }
7765 else if (n==1) {
7766 i = m_Xforms->begin();
7767
7768 pLastXform = i->ptr->GetXform();
7769 i->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
7770
7771#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7772 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pDst, i->ptr->GetXform()->GetNumDstSamples());
7773#endif
7774
7775 bNoClip = pLastXform->NoClipPCS();
7776 }
7777 else {
7778 bNoClip = true;
7779 }
7780
7781 //m_pPCS->CheckLast(DstPixel, m_pCmm->m_nDestSpace, bNoClip);
7782
7783#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
7784 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount, DstPixel, icGetSpaceSamples(m_pCmm->m_nDestSpace));
7785 printf("End ApplyCmm\n\n");
7786#endif
7787
7788 return icCmmStatOk;
7789}
7790
7803icStatusCMM CIccApplyCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icUInt32Number nPixels)
7804{
7805 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
7806 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
7807 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
7808 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
7809 icUInt32Number k;
7810
7811 if (!n)
7812 return icCmmStatBadXform;
7813
7814 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
7815 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
7816 }
7817
7818 for (k=0; k<nPixels; k++) {
7819 pSrc = SrcPixel;
7820 pDst = m_Pixel;
7821
7822 if (n>1) {
7823 for (j=0, i=m_Xforms->begin(); j<n-1 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
7824
7825 i->ptr->Apply(pDst, pSrc);
7826 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
7827 pSrc = pDst;
7828 if (pTmp==SrcPixel)
7829 pDst = m_Pixel2;
7830 else
7831 pDst = pTmp;
7832 }
7833
7834 i->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, pSrc);
7835 }
7836 else if (n==1) {
7837 i = m_Xforms->begin();
7838 i->ptr->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
7839 }
7840
7841 DstPixel += m_pCmm->GetDestSamples();
7842 SrcPixel += m_pCmm->GetSourceSamples();
7843 }
7844
7845 return icCmmStatOk;
7846}
7847
7848void CIccApplyCmm::AppendApplyXform(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform)
7849{
7850 CIccApplyXformPtr ptr;
7851 ptr.ptr = pApplyXform;
7852
7853 m_Xforms->push_back(ptr);
7854}
7855
7869CIccCmm::CIccCmm(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace /*=icSigUnknownData*/,
7870 icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace /*=icSigUnknownData*/,
7871 bool bFirstInput /*=true*/)
7872{
7873 m_bValid = false;
7874
7875 m_bLastInput = !bFirstInput;
7876 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
7877 m_nDestSpace = nDestSpace;
7878
7879 m_nLastSpace = nSrcSpace;
7880 m_nLastIntent = icUnknownIntent;
7881
7882 m_Xforms = new CIccXformList;
7883 m_Xforms->clear();
7884
7885 m_pApply = NULL;
7886}
7887
7896CIccCmm::~CIccCmm()
7897{
7898 if (m_Xforms) {
7899 CIccXformList::iterator i;
7900
7901 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
7902 if (i->ptr)
7903 delete i->ptr;
7904 }
7905
7906 delete m_Xforms;
7907 }
7908
7909 if (m_pApply)
7910 delete m_pApply;
7911}
7912
7913const icChar* CIccCmm::GetStatusText(icStatusCMM stat)
7914{
7915 switch (stat) {
7916 case icCmmStatBad:
7917 return "Bad CMM";
7918 case icCmmStatOk:
7919 return "OK";
7920 case icCmmStatCantOpenProfile:
7921 return "Cannot open profile";
7922 case icCmmStatBadSpaceLink:
7923 return "Invalid space link";
7924 case icCmmStatInvalidProfile:
7925 return "Invalid profile";
7926 case icCmmStatBadXform:
7927 return "Invalid profile transform";
7928 case icCmmStatInvalidLut:
7929 return "Invalid Look-Up Table";
7930 case icCmmStatProfileMissingTag:
7931 return "Missing tag in profile";
7932 case icCmmStatColorNotFound:
7933 return "Color not found";
7934 case icCmmStatIncorrectApply:
7935 return "Incorrect Apply object";
7936 case icCmmStatBadColorEncoding:
7937 return "Invalid color encoding used";
7938 case icCmmStatAllocErr:
7939 return "Memory allocation error";
7940 case icCmmStatBadLutType:
7941 return "Invalid Look-Up Table type";
7942 case icCmmStatIdentityXform:
7943 return "Identity transform used";
7944 case icCmmStatUnsupportedPcsLink:
7945 return "Unsupported PCS Link used";
7946 case icCmmStatBadConnection:
7947 return "Invalid profile connection";
7948 case icCmmStatBadTintXform:
7949 return "Invalid tint transform";
7950 case icCmmStatTooManySamples:
7951 return "Too many samples used";
7952 case icCmmStatBadMCSLink:
7953 return "Invalid MCS link connection";
7954 default:
7955 return "Unknown CMM Status value";
7956
7957 }
7958}
7959
7978icStatusCMM CIccCmm::AddXform(const icChar *szProfilePath,
7979 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
7980 icXformInterp nInterp /*icXformInterp*/,
7981 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
7982 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
7983 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
7984 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/,
7985 bool bUseSubProfile /*=false*/)
7986{
7987 CIccProfile *pProfile = OpenIccProfile(szProfilePath, bUseSubProfile);
7988
7989 if (!pProfile)
7990 return icCmmStatCantOpenProfile;
7991
7992 icStatusCMM rv = AddXform(pProfile, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
7993
7994 if (rv != icCmmStatOk)
7995 delete pProfile;
7996
7997 return rv;
7998}
7999
8000
8022icStatusCMM CIccCmm::AddXform(icUInt8Number *pProfileMem,
8023 icUInt32Number nProfileLen,
8024 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
8025 icXformInterp nInterp /*icXformInterp*/,
8026 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
8027 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
8028 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
8029 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/,
8030 bool bUseSubProfile /*=false*/)
8031{
8032 CIccMemIO *pFile = new CIccMemIO;
8033
8034 if (!pFile || !pFile->Attach(pProfileMem, nProfileLen, bUseSubProfile))
8035 return icCmmStatCantOpenProfile;
8036
8037 CIccProfile *pProfile = new CIccProfile;
8038
8039 if (!pProfile)
8040 return icCmmStatCantOpenProfile;
8041
8042 if (!pProfile->Attach(pFile)) {
8043 delete pFile;
8044 delete pProfile;
8045 return icCmmStatCantOpenProfile;
8046 }
8047
8048 icStatusCMM rv = AddXform(pProfile, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
8049
8050 if (rv != icCmmStatOk)
8051 delete pProfile;
8052
8053 return rv;
8054}
8055
8056
8076icStatusCMM CIccCmm::AddXform(CIccProfile *pProfile,
8077 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
8078 icXformInterp nInterp /*=icInterpLinear*/,
8079 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
8080 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
8081 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
8082 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/)
8083{
8084 icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace, nDstSpace;
8085 bool bInput = !m_bLastInput;
8086
8087 if (!pProfile)
8088 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
8089
8090 switch(pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass) {
8091 case icSigMaterialIdentificationClass:
8092 case icSigMaterialVisualizationClass:
8093 case icSigMaterialLinkClass:
8094 nIntent = icPerceptual;
8095 nLutType = icXformLutMCS;
8096
8097 default:
8098 break;
8099 }
8100
8101 switch (nLutType) {
8102 case icXformLutColor:
8103 case icXformLutColorimetric:
8104 case icXformLutSpectral:
8105 {
8106 //Check pProfile if nIntent and input can be found.
8107 if (bInput) {
8108 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8109
8110 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || (bUseD2BxB2DxTags && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric))
8111 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
8112 else
8113 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8114 }
8115 else {
8116 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigLinkClass) {
8117 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8118 }
8119 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigAbstractClass) {
8120 bInput = true;
8121 nIntent = icPerceptual; // Note: icPerceptualIntent = 0
8122 }
8123
8124 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || (bUseD2BxB2DxTags && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric))
8125 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
8126 else
8127 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8128
8129 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8130 }
8131 }
8132 break;
8133
8134 case icXformLutPreview:
8135 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8136 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8137 bInput = false;
8138 break;
8139
8140 case icXformLutGamut:
8141 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8142 nDstSpace = icSigGamutData;
8143 bInput = true;
8144 break;
8145
8146 case icXformLutBRDFParam:
8147 if (!bInput)
8148 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8149 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8150 nDstSpace = icSigBRDFParameters;
8151 bInput = true;
8152 break;
8153
8154 case icXformLutBRDFDirect:
8155 if (!bInput)
8156 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8157 nSrcSpace = icSigBRDFDirect;
8158 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8159 bInput = true;
8160 break;
8161
8162 case icXformLutBRDFMcsParam:
8163 if (!bInput)
8164 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8165 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
8166 nDstSpace = icSigBRDFParameters;
8167 break;
8168
8169 case icXformLutMCS:
8170 if (bInput) {
8171 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8172 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
8173 }
8174 else {
8175 if (m_Xforms->size()) {
8176 CIccXformList::iterator prev = --(m_Xforms->end());
8177
8178 //Make sure previous profile connects with an icXformLutMCS
8179 if (prev->ptr->GetXformType()!=icXformLutMCS) {
8180 //check to see if we can convert previous xform to connect via an MCS
8181 if (!prev->ptr->GetProfile()->m_Header.mcs) {
8182 return icCmmStatBadMCSLink;
8183 }
8184
8185 CIccXform *pPrev = prev->ptr;
8186 CIccXform *pNew = CIccXform::Create(pPrev->GetProfilePtr(), pPrev->IsInput(), pPrev->GetIntent(), pPrev->GetInterp(),
8187 pPrev->GetConnectionConditions(), icXformLutMCS, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
8188
8189 if (pNew) {
8190 pPrev->DetachAll();
8191 delete pPrev;
8192 }
8193
8194 prev->ptr = pNew;
8195
8196 }
8197 }
8198 else {
8199 return icCmmStatBadMCSLink;
8200 }
8201
8202 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
8203 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialVisualizationClass) {
8204 if (bUseD2BxB2DxTags && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
8205 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
8206 }
8207 else {
8208 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8209 }
8210 }
8211 else if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialLinkClass) {
8212 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8213 }
8214 else {
8215 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8216 }
8217 }
8218 break;
8219
8220 default:
