8221 return icCmmStatBadLutType;
8222 }
8223
8224 //Make sure colorspaces match with previous xforms
8225 if (!m_Xforms->size()) {
8226 if (m_nSrcSpace == icSigUnknownData) {
8227 m_nLastSpace = nSrcSpace;
8228 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
8229 }
8230 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nSrcSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
8231 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8232 }
8233 }
8234 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nLastSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
8235 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8236 }
8237
8238 if (nSrcSpace==icSigNamedData)
8239 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8240
8241 //Automatic creation of intent from header/last profile
8242 if (nIntent==icUnknownIntent) {
8243 if (bInput) {
8244 nIntent = (icRenderingIntent)pProfile->m_Header.renderingIntent;
8245 }
8246 else {
8247 nIntent = m_nLastIntent;
8248 }
8249 if (nIntent == icUnknownIntent)
8250 nIntent = icPerceptual;
8251 }
8252
8253 CIccXformPtr Xform;
8254
8255 Xform.ptr = CIccXform::Create(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
8256
8257 if (!Xform.ptr) {
8258 return icCmmStatBadXform;
8259 }
8260
8261 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigMaterialVisualizationClass) {
8262 bInput = true;
8263 }
8264
8265 m_nLastSpace = nDstSpace;
8266 m_nLastIntent = nIntent;
8267 m_bLastInput = bInput;
8268
8269 m_Xforms->push_back(Xform);
8270
8271 return icCmmStatOk;
8272}
8273
8293icStatusCMM CIccCmm::AddXform(CIccProfile *pProfile,
8294 CIccTag *pXformTag,
8295 icRenderingIntent nIntent/*= icUnknownIntent*/,
8296 icXformInterp nInterp /*=icInterpLinear*/,
8297 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
8298 bool bUseSpectralPCS /*=false*/,
8299 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/)
8300{
8301 icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace, nDstSpace;
8302 bool bInput = !m_bLastInput;
8303
8304 if (!pProfile)
8305 return icCmmStatInvalidProfile;
8306
8307 switch (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass) {
8308 case icSigMaterialIdentificationClass:
8309 case icSigMaterialVisualizationClass:
8310 case icSigMaterialLinkClass:
8311 return icCmmStatBadLutType;
8312
8313 default:
8314 break;
8315 }
8316
8317 //Check pProfile if nIntent and input can be found.
8318 if (bInput) {
8319 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8320
8321 if (bUseSpectralPCS && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS)
8322 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
8323 else {
8324 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8325 bUseSpectralPCS = false;
8326 }
8327 }
8328 else {
8329 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigLinkClass) {
8330 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8331 }
8332 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigAbstractClass) {
8333 bInput = true;
8334 nIntent = icPerceptual; // Note: icPerceptualIntent = 0
8335 }
8336
8337 if (bUseSpectralPCS && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS)
8338 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
8339 else {
8340 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
8341 bUseSpectralPCS = false;
8342 }
8343
8344 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
8345 }
8346
8347 //Make sure colorspaces match with previous xforms
8348 if (!m_Xforms->size()) {
8349 if (m_nSrcSpace == icSigUnknownData) {
8350 m_nLastSpace = nSrcSpace;
8351 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
8352 }
8353 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nSrcSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
8354 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8355 }
8356 }
8357 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nLastSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
8358 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8359 }
8360
8361 if (nSrcSpace == icSigNamedData)
8362 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8363
8364 //Automatic creation of intent from header/last profile
8365 if (nIntent == icUnknownIntent) {
8366 if (bInput) {
8367 nIntent = (icRenderingIntent)pProfile->m_Header.renderingIntent;
8368 }
8369 else {
8370 nIntent = m_nLastIntent;
8371 }
8372 if (nIntent == icUnknownIntent)
8373 nIntent = icPerceptual;
8374 }
8375
8376 CIccXformPtr Xform;
8377
8378 Xform.ptr = CIccXform::Create(pProfile, pXformTag, bInput, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, bUseSpectralPCS, pHintManager);
8379
8380 if (!Xform.ptr) {
8381 return icCmmStatBadXform;
8382 }
8383
8384 m_nLastSpace = nDstSpace;
8385 m_nLastIntent = nIntent;
8386 m_bLastInput = bInput;
8387
8388 m_Xforms->push_back(Xform);
8389
8390 return icCmmStatOk;
8391}
8392
8412icStatusCMM CIccCmm::AddXform(CIccProfile &Profile,
8413 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
8414 icXformInterp nInterp /*=icInterpLinear*/,
8415 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
8416 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
8417 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
8418 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/)
8419{
8420 CIccProfile *pProfile = new CIccProfile(Profile);
8421
8422 if (!pProfile)
8423 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
8424
8425 icStatusCMM stat = AddXform(pProfile, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
8426
8427 if (stat != icCmmStatOk)
8428 delete pProfile;
8429
8430 return stat;
8431}
8432
8433icStatusCMM CIccCmm::CheckPCSConnections(bool bUsePCSConversions/*=false*/)
8434{
8435 icStatusCMM rv = icCmmStatOk;
8436
8437 CIccXformList::iterator last, next;
8438 CIccXformList xforms;
8439 CIccXformPtr ptr;
8440 bool bUsesPcsXforms = false;
8441
8442 next=m_Xforms->begin();
8443
8444 if (next!=m_Xforms->end()) {
8445 last = next;
8446 next++;
8447
8448 icColorSpaceSignature lastSpace = last->ptr->GetSrcSpace();
8449 if (!last->ptr->IsInput() && IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(lastSpace) && (GetSourceSpace() !=lastSpace || last->ptr->UseLegacyPCS())) {
8450 CIccPcsXform* pPcs = new CIccPcsXform();
8451
8452 if (!pPcs) {
8453 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
8454 }
8455
8456 rv = pPcs->ConnectFirst(last->ptr, GetSourceSpace());
8457
8458 if (rv != icCmmStatOk && rv != icCmmStatIdentityXform) {
8459 delete pPcs;
8460 return rv;
8461 }
8462
8463 if (rv != icCmmStatIdentityXform) {
8464 ptr.ptr = pPcs;
8465 xforms.push_back(ptr);
8466
8467 bUsesPcsXforms = true;
8468 }
8469 else {
8470 delete pPcs;
8471 }
8472 }
8473
8474 xforms.push_back(*last);
8475
8476 for (;next!=m_Xforms->end(); last=next, next++) {
8477 if ((last->ptr->IsInput() && last->ptr->IsMCS() && next->ptr->IsMCS()) ||
8478 (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(last->ptr->GetDstSpace()) || IsSpaceSpectralPCS(next->ptr->GetSrcSpace())) ||
8479 (!bUsePCSConversions &&
8480 (IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(last->ptr->GetDstSpace()) || IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(next->ptr->GetSrcSpace())))) {
8481 last->ptr->SetDstPCSConversion(false);
8482 next->ptr->SetSrcPCSConversion(false);
8483 CIccPcsXform *pPcs = new CIccPcsXform();
8484
8485 if (!pPcs) {
8486 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
8487 }
8488
8489 rv = pPcs->Connect(last->ptr, next->ptr);
8490
8491 if (rv!=icCmmStatOk && rv!=icCmmStatIdentityXform)
8492 return rv;
8493
8494 if (rv!=icCmmStatIdentityXform) {
8495 ptr.ptr = pPcs;
8496 xforms.push_back(ptr);
8497
8498 bUsesPcsXforms = true;
8499 }
8500 else {
8501 delete pPcs;
8502 }
8503 }
8504 xforms.push_back(*next);
8505 }
8506
8507 lastSpace = last->ptr->GetDstSpace();
8508 if (last->ptr->IsInput() && IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(lastSpace) &&
8509 (last->ptr->NeedAdjustPCS() || GetDestSpace() != lastSpace || last->ptr->UseLegacyPCS())) {
8510 CIccPcsXform* pPcs = new CIccPcsXform();
8511
8512 if (!pPcs) {
8513 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
8514 }
8515 rv = pPcs->ConnectLast(last->ptr, GetDestSpace());
8516
8517 if (rv != icCmmStatOk && rv != icCmmStatIdentityXform) {
8518 delete pPcs;
8519 return rv;
8520 }
8521
8522 if (rv != icCmmStatIdentityXform) {
8523 ptr.ptr = pPcs;
8524 xforms.push_back(ptr);
8525
8526 bUsesPcsXforms = true;
8527 }
8528 else {
8529 delete pPcs;
8530 }
8531 }
8532 }
8533
8534
8535 if (bUsesPcsXforms) {
8536 *m_Xforms = xforms;
8537 }
8538
8539 return rv;
8540}
8541
8542icStatusCMM CIccCmm::CheckPCSRangeConversions()
8543{
8544 icStatusCMM rv = icCmmStatOk;
8545
8546 CIccXformList::iterator last, next;
8547 CIccXformList xforms;
8548 CIccXformPtr ptr;
8549 bool bUsesRangeConversion = false;
8550
8551 next = m_Xforms->begin();
8552
8553 if (next != m_Xforms->end()) {
8554 last = next;
8555 next++;
8556
8557 xforms.push_back(*last);
8558
8559 for (; next != m_Xforms->end(); last = next, next++) {
8560 //Add extended PCS to standard PCS conversion as needed
8561 if (last->ptr->IsInput() && last->ptr->IsExtendedPCS() && IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(last->ptr->GetDstSpace()) &&
8562 !next->ptr->IsExtendedPCS()) {
8563 CIccProfile* pProfile = last->ptr->GetProfilePtr();
8564 CIccTag* pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigHToS0Tag + last->ptr->GetIntent());
8565 if (!pTag) {
8566 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigHToS0Tag);
8567 if (!pTag) {
8568 pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigHToS1Tag);
8569 }
8570 }
8571 //If we find the HToSxTag then create a transform for it and inject it into the transform list
8572 if (pTag) {
8573 ptr.ptr = CIccXform::Create(pProfile, pTag, true, last->ptr->GetIntent(), last->ptr->GetInterp(),
8574 last->ptr->GetConnectionConditions(), false);
8575 if (ptr.ptr) {
8576 ptr.ptr->ShareProfile(); //Indicate that profile is shared (so it won't be deleted)
8577 ptr.ptr->SetPcsAdjustXform(); // Indicates that transform should be treated as abstract
8578 ptr.ptr->AttachCmmEnvVarLookup(last->ptr->GetCmmEnvVarLookup());
8579 xforms.push_back(ptr);
8580 bUsesRangeConversion = true;
8581 }
8582 }
8583 }
8584
8585 xforms.push_back(*next);
8586 }
8587 }
8588
8589 if (bUsesRangeConversion) {
8590 *m_Xforms = xforms;
8591 }
8592
8593 return rv;
8594}
8595
8596
8607void CIccCmm::SetLateBindingCC()
8608{
8609 CIccXformList::iterator i;
8610 CIccXform *pLastXform = NULL;
8611
8612 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
8613 if (i->ptr->IsInput()) {
8614 if (i->ptr->IsLateBinding()) {
8615 CIccXformList::iterator j=i;
8616 j++;
8617 if (j!=m_Xforms->end()) {
8618 if (j->ptr->IsLateBinding()) {
8619 i->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8620 j->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8621 pLastXform = i->ptr;
8622 }
8623 else {
8624 i->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8625 j->ptr->SetAppliedCC(j->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8626 pLastXform = NULL;
8627 }
8628 }
8629 else {
8630 i->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8631 pLastXform = NULL;
8632 }
8633 }
8634 else if (IsSpaceSpectralPCS(i->ptr->GetDstSpace())) {
8635 CIccXformList::iterator j=i;
8636 j++;
8637 if (j!=m_Xforms->end()) {
8638 if (j->ptr->IsLateBinding()) {
8639 j->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8640 pLastXform = i->ptr;
8641 }
8642 else if (!j->ptr->IsAbstract()){
8643 j->ptr->SetAppliedCC(j->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8644 pLastXform = NULL;
8645 }
8646 }
8647 }
8648 else {
8649 pLastXform = NULL;
8650 }
8651 }
8652 else {
8653 if (!pLastXform)
8654 i->ptr->SetAppliedCC(i->ptr->GetConnectionConditions());
8655 else
8656 pLastXform = NULL;
8657 }
8658 }
8659}
8660
8661
8672icStatusCMM CIccCmm::Begin(bool bAllocApplyCmm/*=true*/, bool bUsePCSConversions/*=false*/)
8673{
8674 if (m_pApply)
8675 return icCmmStatOk;
8676
8677 if (m_nDestSpace==icSigUnknownData) {
8678 m_nDestSpace = m_nLastSpace;
8679 }
8680 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nDestSpace, m_nLastSpace)) {
8681 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8682 }
8683
8684 if (m_nSrcSpace==icSigNamedData || m_nDestSpace==icSigNamedData) {
8685 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
8686 }
8687
8688 CheckPCSRangeConversions();
8689 SetLateBindingCC();
8690
8691 icStatusCMM rv;
8692 CIccXformList::iterator i;
8693
8694 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
8695
8696 rv = i->ptr->Begin();
8697
8698 if (rv!= icCmmStatOk)
8699 return rv;
8700 }
8701
8702 rv = CheckPCSConnections(bUsePCSConversions);
8703 if (rv != icCmmStatOk && rv!=icCmmStatIdentityXform)
8704 return rv;
8705
8706 if (bAllocApplyCmm) {
8707 m_pApply = GetNewApplyCmm(rv);
8708 }
8709 else
8710 rv = icCmmStatOk;
8711
8712 return rv;
8713}
8714
8715
8727CIccApplyCmm *CIccCmm::GetNewApplyCmm(icStatusCMM &status)
8728{
8729 CIccApplyCmm *pApply = new CIccApplyCmm(this);
8730
8731 if (!pApply) {
8732 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
8733 return NULL;
8734 }
8735
8736 CIccXformList::iterator i;
8737 CIccApplyXform *pXform;
8738
8739 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
8740 pXform = i->ptr->GetNewApply(status);
8741 if (!pXform || status != icCmmStatOk) {
8742 delete pApply;
8743 return NULL;
8744 }
8745 pApply->AppendApplyXform(pXform);
8746 }
8747
8748 m_bValid = true;
8749
8750 status = icCmmStatOk;
8751
8752 return pApply;
8753}
8754
8755
8766icStatusCMM CIccCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
8767{
8768 return m_pApply->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
8769}
8770
8771
8782icStatusCMM CIccCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icUInt32Number nPixels)
8783{
8784 return m_pApply->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel, nPixels);
8785}
8786
8787
8802icStatusCMM CIccCmm::RemoveAllIO()
8803{
8804 if (!Valid())
8805 return icCmmStatBadXform;
8806
8807 CIccXformList::iterator i;
8808
8809 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
8810 i->ptr->RemoveIO();
8811 }
8812
8813 return icCmmStatOk;
8814}
8815
8832bool CIccCmm::IsInGamut(icFloatNumber *pInternal)
8833{
8834 if (!((unsigned int)((*pInternal)*255.0)))
8835 return true;
8836 return false;
8837}
8838
8839
8855icStatusCMM CIccCmm::ToInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icFloatColorEncoding nEncode,
8856 icFloatNumber *pInternal, const icFloatNumber *pData,
8857 bool bClip)
8858{
8859 int nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
8860 if (!nSamples)
8861 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
8862
8863
8864 icUInt16Number i;
8865 CIccPixelBuf pInput(nSamples);
8866
8867 if (!pInput.get())
8868 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
8869
8870 memcpy(pInput, pData, nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
8871 bool bCLRspace = icIsSpaceCLR(nSpace);
8872
8873 switch(icGetColorSpaceType(nSpace))
8874 {
8875 case icSigReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
8876 case icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData:
8877 case icSigBiDirReflectanceSpectralPcsData:
8878 case icSigSparseMatrixSpectralPcsData:
8879 bCLRspace = true;
8880 break;
8881 }
8882
8883 switch(nSpace) {
8884
8885 case icSigLabData:
8886 {
8887 switch(nEncode) {
8888 case icEncodeValue:
8889 {
8890 icLabToPcs(pInput);
8891 break;
8892 }
8893 case icEncodeFloat:
8894 {
8895 break;
8896 }
8897 case icEncode8Bit:
8898 {
8899 pInput[0] = icU8toF((icUInt8Number)pInput[0])*100.0f;
8900 pInput[1] = icU8toAB((icUInt8Number)pInput[1]);
8901 pInput[2] = icU8toAB((icUInt8Number)pInput[2]);
8902
8903 icLabToPcs(pInput);
8904 break;
8905 }
8906 case icEncode16Bit:
8907 {
8908 pInput[0] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[0]);
8909 pInput[1] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[1]);
8910 pInput[2] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[2]);
8911 break;
8912 }
8913 case icEncode16BitV2:
8914 {
8915 pInput[0] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[0]);
8916 pInput[1] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[1]);
8917 pInput[2] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[2]);
8918
8919 CIccPCSUtil::Lab2ToLab4(pInput, pInput);
8920 break;
8921 }
8922 default:
8923 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
8924 break;
8925 }
8926 break;
8927 }
8928
8929 case icSigXYZData:
8930 {
8931 switch(nEncode) {
8932 case icEncodeValue:
8933 {
8934 pInput[0] = (icFloatNumber)pInput[0];
8935 pInput[1] = (icFloatNumber)pInput[1];
8936 pInput[2] = (icFloatNumber)pInput[2];
8937 icXyzToPcs(pInput);
8938 break;
8939 }
8940 case icEncodePercent:
8941 {
8942 pInput[0] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[0] / 100.0);
8943 pInput[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[1] / 100.0);
8944 pInput[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[2] / 100.0);
8945 icXyzToPcs(pInput);
8946 break;
8947 }
8948 case icEncodeFloat:
8949 {
8950 icXyzToPcs(pInput);
8951 break;
8952 }
8953
8954 case icEncode16Bit:
8955 case icEncode16BitV2:
8956 {
8957 pInput[0] = icUSFtoD((icU1Fixed15Number)pInput[0]);
8958 pInput[1] = icUSFtoD((icU1Fixed15Number)pInput[1]);
8959 pInput[2] = icUSFtoD((icU1Fixed15Number)pInput[2]);
8960 break;
8961 }
8962
8963 default:
8964 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
8965 break;
8966 }
8967 break;
8968 }
8969
8970 case icSigNamedData:
8971 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
8972
8973 default:
8974 {
8975 switch(nEncode) {
8976 case icEncodeValue:
8977 {
8978 if (!bCLRspace || nSamples<3) {
8979 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
8980 }
8981 if (nSamples==3)
8982 icLabToPcs(pInput);
8983 break;
8984 }
8985
8986 case icEncodePercent:
8987 {
8988 if (bClip) {
8989 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
8990 pInput[i] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[i]/100.0);
8991 if (pInput[i] < 0.0) pInput[i] = 0.0;
8992 if (pInput[i] > 1.0) pInput[i] = 1.0;
8993 }
8994 }
8995 else {
8996 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
8997 pInput[i] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[i]/100.0);
8998 }
8999 }
9000 break;
9001 }
9002
9003 case icEncodeFloat:
9004 {
9005 if (bClip) {
9006 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9007 if (pInput[i] < 0.0) pInput[i] = 0.0;
9008 if (pInput[i] > 1.0) pInput[i] = 1.0;
9009 }
9010 }
9011 break;
9012 }
9013
9014 case icEncode8Bit:
9015 {
9016 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9017 pInput[i] = icU8toF((icUInt8Number)pInput[i]);
9018 }
9019 break;
9020 }
9021
9022 case icEncode16Bit:
9023 case icEncode16BitV2:
9024 {
9025 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9026 pInput[i] = icU16toF((icUInt16Number)pInput[i]);
9027 }
9028 break;
9029 }
9030
9031 default:
9032 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9033 break;
9034 }
9035 break;
9036 }
9037 }
9038
9039 memcpy(pInternal, pInput, nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
9040 return icCmmStatOk;
9041}
9042
9043
9059icStatusCMM CIccCmm::ToInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icFloatNumber *pInternal,
9060 const icUInt8Number *pData)
9061{
9062 switch(nSpace) {
9063 case icSigRgbData:
9064 {
9065 pInternal[0] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[0] / 255.0);
9066 pInternal[1] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[1] / 255.0);
9067 pInternal[2] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[2] / 255.0);
9068
9069 return icCmmStatOk;
9070 }
9071 case icSigCmykData:
9072 {
9073 pInternal[0] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[0] / 255.0);
9074 pInternal[1] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[1] / 255.0);
9075 pInternal[2] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[2] / 255.0);
9076 pInternal[3] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[3] / 255.0);
9077 return icCmmStatOk;
9078 }
9079 default:
9080 {
9081 icUInt32Number i;
9082 icUInt32Number nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
9083 CIccPixelBuf FloatPixel(nSamples);
9084 if (!FloatPixel.get())
9085 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9086
9087 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9088 FloatPixel[i] = (icFloatNumber)pData[i];
9089 }
9090 return ToInternalEncoding(nSpace, icEncode8Bit, pInternal, FloatPixel);
9091 }
9092 }
9093
9094}
9095
9096
9112icStatusCMM CIccCmm::ToInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icFloatNumber *pInternal,
9113 const icUInt16Number *pData)
9114{
9115 switch(nSpace) {
9116 case icSigRgbData:
9117 {
9118 pInternal[0] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[0] / 65535.0);
9119 pInternal[1] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[1] / 65535.0);
9120 pInternal[2] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[2] / 65535.0);
9121
9122 return icCmmStatOk;
9123 }
9124 case icSigCmykData:
9125 {
9126 pInternal[0] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[0] / 65535.0);
9127 pInternal[1] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[1] / 65535.0);
9128 pInternal[2] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[2] / 65535.0);
9129 pInternal[3] = (icFloatNumber)((icFloatNumber)pData[3] / 65535.0);
9130 return icCmmStatOk;
9131 }
9132 default:
9133 {
9134 icUInt32Number i;
9135 icUInt32Number nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
9136 CIccPixelBuf pFloatPixel(nSamples);
9137 if (!pFloatPixel.get())
9138 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9139
9140 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9141 pFloatPixel[i] = (icFloatNumber)pData[i];
9142 }
9143 return ToInternalEncoding(nSpace, icEncode16Bit, pInternal, pFloatPixel);
9144 }
9145 }
9146}
9147
9148
9164icStatusCMM CIccCmm::FromInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icFloatColorEncoding nEncode,
9165 icFloatNumber *pData, const icFloatNumber *pInternal, bool bClip)
9166{
9167 int nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
9168 if (!nSamples)
9169 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9170
9171 icUInt16Number i;
9172 CIccPixelBuf pInput(nSamples);
9173
9174 if (!pInput.get())
9175 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9176
9177 memcpy(pInput, pInternal, nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
9178 bool bCLRspace = (icIsSpaceCLR(nSpace) || (nSpace == icSigDevLabData) || (nSpace==icSigDevXYZData));
9179
9180 switch(nSpace) {
9181
9182 case icSigLabData:
9183 {
9184 switch(nEncode) {
9185 case icEncodeValue:
9186 {
9187 icLabFromPcs(pInput);
9188 break;
9189 }
9190 case icEncodeUnitFloat:
9191 case icEncodeFloat:
9192 {
9193 break;
9194 }
9195 case icEncode8Bit:
9196 {
9197 icLabFromPcs(pInput);
9198
9199 pInput[0] = (icUInt8Number)(pInput[0]/100.0 * 255.0 + 0.5);
9200 pInput[1] = icABtoU8(pInput[1]);
9201 pInput[2] = icABtoU8(pInput[2]);
9202 break;
9203 }
9204 case icEncode16Bit:
9205 {
9206 pInput[0] = icFtoU16(pInput[0]);
9207 pInput[1] = icFtoU16(pInput[1]);
9208 pInput[2] = icFtoU16(pInput[2]);
9209 break;
9210 }
9211 case icEncode16BitV2:
9212 {
9213 CIccPCSUtil::Lab4ToLab2(pInput, pInput);
9214
9215 pInput[0] = icFtoU16(pInput[0]);
9216 pInput[1] = icFtoU16(pInput[1]);
9217 pInput[2] = icFtoU16(pInput[2]);
9218 break;
9219 }
9220 default:
9221 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9222 break;
9223 }
9224 break;
9225 }
9226
9227 case icSigXYZData:
9228 {
9229 switch(nEncode) {
9230 case icEncodeValue:
9231 {
9232 icXyzFromPcs(pInput);
9233 break;
9234 }
9235 case icEncodePercent:
9236 {
9237 icXyzFromPcs(pInput);
9238 pInput[0] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[0] * 100.0);
9239 pInput[1] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[1] * 100.0);
9240 pInput[2] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[2] * 100.0);
9241 break;
9242 }
9243 case icEncodeFloat:
9244 case icEncodeUnitFloat:
9245 {
9246 icXyzFromPcs(pInput);
9247 break;
9248 }
9249
9250 case icEncode16Bit:
9251 case icEncode16BitV2:
9252 {
9253 icXyzFromPcs(pInput);
9254 pInput[0] = icDtoUSF(pInput[0]);
9255 pInput[1] = icDtoUSF(pInput[1]);
9256 pInput[2] = icDtoUSF(pInput[2]);
9257 break;
9258 }
9259
9260 default:
9261 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9262 break;
9263 }
9264 break;
9265 }
9266
9267 case icSigNamedData:
9268 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9269
9270 default:
9271 {
9272 switch(nEncode) {
9273 case icEncodeValue:
9274 {
9275 if (nSpace == icSigDevXYZData) {
9276 icXyzFromPcs(pInput);
9277 }
9278 else if (bCLRspace && nSamples >=3) {
9279 icLabFromPcs(pInput);
9280 }
9281 break;
9282 }
9283 case icEncodePercent:
9284 {
9285 if (bClip) {
9286 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9287 if (pInput[i] < 0.0) pInput[i] = 0.0;
9288 if (pInput[i] > 1.0) pInput[i] = 1.0;
9289 pInput[i] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[i]*100.0);
9290 }
9291 }
9292 else {
9293 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9294 pInput[i] = (icFloatNumber)(pInput[i]*100.0);
9295 }
9296 }
9297 break;
9298 }
9299
9300 case icEncodeFloat:
9301 break;
9302
9303 case icEncodeUnitFloat:
9304 {
9305 if (bClip) {
9306 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9307 if (pInput[i] < 0.0) pInput[i] = 0.0;
9308 if (pInput[i] > 1.0) pInput[i] = 1.0;
9309 }
9310 }
9311 break;
9312 }
9313
9314 case icEncode8Bit:
9315 {
9316 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9317 pInput[i] = icFtoU8(pInput[i]);
9318 }
9319 break;
9320 }
9321
9322 case icEncode16Bit:
9323 case icEncode16BitV2:
9324 {
9325 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9326 pInput[i] = icFtoU16(pInput[i]);
9327 }
9328 break;
9329 }
9330
9331 default:
9332 return icCmmStatBadColorEncoding;
9333 break;
9334 }
9335 break;
9336 }
9337 }
9338
9339 memcpy(pData, pInput, nSamples*sizeof(icFloatNumber));
9340 return icCmmStatOk;
9341}
9342
9343
9359icStatusCMM CIccCmm::FromInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icUInt8Number *pData,
9360 const icFloatNumber *pInternal)
9361{
9362 switch(nSpace) {
9363 case icSigRgbData:
9364 {
9365 pData[0] = icFtoU8(pInternal[0]);
9366 pData[1] = icFtoU8(pInternal[1]);
9367 pData[2] = icFtoU8(pInternal[2]);
9368
9369 return icCmmStatOk;
9370 }
9371 case icSigCmykData:
9372 {
9373 pData[0] = icFtoU8(pInternal[0]);
9374 pData[1] = icFtoU8(pInternal[1]);
9375 pData[2] = icFtoU8(pInternal[2]);
9376 pData[3] = icFtoU8(pInternal[3]);
9377
9378 return icCmmStatOk;
9379 }
9380 default:
9381 {
9382 icUInt32Number i;
9383 icUInt32Number nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
9384
9385 CIccPixelBuf pFloatPixel(nSamples);
9386 icStatusCMM convertStat;
9387
9388 if (!pFloatPixel.get())
9389 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9390
9391 convertStat = FromInternalEncoding(nSpace, icEncode8Bit, pFloatPixel, pInternal);
9392 if (convertStat)
9393 return convertStat;
9394 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9395 pData[i] = (icUInt8Number)(pFloatPixel[i] + 0.5);
9396 }
9397
9398 return icCmmStatOk;
9399 }
9400 }
9401}
9402
9403
9419icStatusCMM CIccCmm::FromInternalEncoding(icColorSpaceSignature nSpace, icUInt16Number *pData,
9420 const icFloatNumber *pInternal)
9421{
9422 switch(nSpace) {
9423 case icSigRgbData:
9424 {
9425 pData[0] = icFtoU16(pInternal[0]);
9426 pData[1] = icFtoU16(pInternal[1]);
9427 pData[2] = icFtoU16(pInternal[2]);
9428
9429 return icCmmStatOk;
9430 }
9431 case icSigCmykData:
9432 {
9433 pData[0] = icFtoU16(pInternal[0]);
9434 pData[1] = icFtoU16(pInternal[1]);
9435 pData[2] = icFtoU16(pInternal[2]);
9436 pData[3] = icFtoU16(pInternal[3]);
9437
9438 return icCmmStatOk;
9439 }
9440 default:
9441 {
9442 icUInt32Number i;
9443 icUInt32Number nSamples = icGetSpaceSamples(nSpace);
9444 CIccPixelBuf pFloatPixel(nSamples);
9445 icStatusCMM convertStat;
9446
9447 if (!pFloatPixel.get())
9448 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9449
9450 convertStat = FromInternalEncoding(nSpace, icEncode16Bit, pFloatPixel, pInternal);
9451 if (convertStat)
9452 return convertStat;
9453 for(i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
9454 pData[i] = (icUInt16Number)(pFloatPixel[i] + 0.5);
9455 }
9456
9457 return icCmmStatOk;
9458 }
9459 }
9460}
9461
9462
9477const icChar* CIccCmm::GetFloatColorEncoding(icFloatColorEncoding val)
9478{
9479 switch(val) {
9480
9481 case icEncodeValue:
9482 return "icEncodeValue";
9483
9484 case icEncodeFloat:
9485 return "icEncodeFloat";
9486
9487 case icEncodeUnitFloat:
9488 return "icEncodeUnitFloat";
9489
9490 case icEncodePercent:
9491 return "icEncodePercent";
9492
9493 case icEncode8Bit:
9494 return "icEncode8Bit";
9495
9496 case icEncode16Bit:
9497 return "icEncode16Bit";
9498
9499 case icEncode16BitV2:
9500 return "icEncode16BitV2";
9501
9502 default:
9503 return "icEncodeUnknown";
9504 }
9505}
9506
9521icFloatColorEncoding CIccCmm::GetFloatColorEncoding(const icChar* val)
9522{
9523 if (!stricmp(val, "icEncodePercent")) {
9524 return icEncodePercent;
9525 }
9526 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncodeUnitFloat")) {
9527 return icEncodeUnitFloat;
9528 }
9529 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncodeFloat")) {
9530 return icEncodeFloat;
9531 }
9532 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncode8Bit")) {
9533 return icEncode8Bit;
9534 }
9535 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncode16Bit")) {
9536 return icEncode16Bit;
9537 }
9538 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncode16BitV2")) {
9539 return icEncode16BitV2;
9540 }
9541 else if (!stricmp(val, "icEncodeValue")) {
9542 return icEncodeValue;
9543 }
9544 else {
9545 return icEncodeUnknown;
9546 }
9547
9548}
9549
9561icUInt32Number CIccCmm::GetNumXforms() const
9562{
9563 return (icUInt32Number)m_Xforms->size();
9564}
9565
9566
9576void CIccCmm::IterateXforms( IXformIterator* pIterater) const
9577{
9578 for (auto x = m_Xforms->begin(); x != m_Xforms->end(); x++) {
9579 pIterater->iterate(x->ptr);
9580 }
9581}
9582
9583
9595icColorSpaceSignature CIccCmm::GetFirstXformSource()
9596{
9597 if (!m_Xforms->size())
9598 return m_nSrcSpace;
9599
9600 return m_Xforms->begin()->ptr->GetSrcSpace();
9601}
9602
9614icColorSpaceSignature CIccCmm::GetLastXformDest()
9615{
9616 if (!m_Xforms->size())
9617 return m_nDestSpace;
9618
9619 return m_Xforms->rbegin()->ptr->GetDstSpace();
9620}
9621
9633CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::CIccApplyNamedColorCmm(CIccNamedColorCmm *pCmm) : CIccApplyCmm(pCmm)
9634{
9635}
9636
9637
9646CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::~CIccApplyNamedColorCmm()
9647{
9648}
9649
9650
9663icStatusCMM CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
9664{
9665 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
9666 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
9667 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
9668 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
9669 CIccApplyXform *pApply;
9670 const CIccXform *pApplyXform;
9671 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform;
9672
9673 if (!n)
9674 return icCmmStatBadXform;
9675
9676 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
9677 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9678 }
9679
9680 icChar NamedColor[256];
9681 icStatusCMM rv;
9682
9683 pSrc = SrcPixel;
9684 pDst = m_Pixel;
9685
9686#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9687 int nCount = 0;
9688 printf("Start ApplyNamedCmm\n");
9689 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pSrc, icGetSpaceSamples(m_pCmm->GetSourceSpace()));
9690#endif
9691
9692
9693 if (n>1) {
9694 for (j=0, i=m_Xforms->begin(); j<n-1 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
9695
9696 pApply = i->ptr;
9697 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9698 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9699 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
9700
9701 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
9702 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
9703 pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
9704#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9705 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pDst, pXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9706#endif
9707 break;
9708
9709 case icApplyPixel2Named:
9710 pXform->Apply(pApply, NamedColor, pSrc);
9711#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9712 printf("Xfm%d: \"%s\"\n", nCount++, NamedColor);
9713#endif
9714 break;
9715
9716 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
9717 if (j==0) {
9718 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9719 }
9720
9721 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, NamedColor);
9722#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9723 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pDst, pXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9724#endif
9725
9726 if (rv) {
9727 return rv;
9728 }
9729 break;
9730
9731 default:
9732 break;
9733 }
9734 }
9735 else {
9736 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
9737#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9738 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, pDst, pApplyXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9739#endif
9740 }
9741 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
9742 pSrc = pDst;
9743 if (pTmp==SrcPixel)
9744 pDst = m_Pixel2;
9745 else
9746 pDst = pTmp;
9747 }
9748
9749 pApply = i->ptr;
9750 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9751 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9752 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
9753
9754 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
9755 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
9756 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9757#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9758 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, DstPixel, pXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9759#endif
9760 break;
9761
9762 case icApplyPixel2Named:
9763 default:
9764 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9765 break;
9766
9767 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
9768 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, NamedColor);
9769#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9770 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, DstPixel, pXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9771#endif
9772 if (rv) {
9773 return rv;
9774 }
9775 break;
9776
9777 }
9778 }
9779 else {
9780 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9781#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9782 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, DstPixel, pApplyXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9783#endif
9784 }
9785
9786 }
9787 else if (n==1) {
9788 i = m_Xforms->begin();
9789
9790 pApply = i->ptr;
9791 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9792 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9793 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9794 }
9795
9796 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9797#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9798 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, DstPixel, pApplyXform->GetNumDstSamples());
9799#endif
9800 }
9801
9802#ifdef DEBUG_CMM_APPLY
9803 DumpCmmApplyPixel(nCount++, DstPixel, icGetSpaceSamples(m_pCmm->GetDestSpace()));
9804 printf("End ApplyNamedCmm\n\n");
9805#endif
9806
9807 return icCmmStatOk;
9808}
9809
9810
9823icStatusCMM CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icUInt32Number nPixels)
9824{
9825 icFloatNumber *pDst;
9826 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
9827 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
9828 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
9829 CIccApplyXform *pApply;
9830 const CIccXform *pApplyXform;
9831 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform;
9832 icUInt32Number k;
9833
9834 if (!n)
9835 return icCmmStatBadXform;
9836
9837 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
9838 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9839 }
9840
9841 icChar NamedColor[255];
9842 icStatusCMM rv;
9843
9844 for (k=0; k<nPixels; k++) {
9845
9846 pSrc = SrcPixel;
9847 pDst = m_Pixel;
9848
9849 if (n>1) {
9850 for (j=0, i=m_Xforms->begin(); j<n-1 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
9851
9852 pApply = i->ptr;
9853 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9854 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9855 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
9856
9857 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
9858 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
9859 pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
9860 break;
9861
9862 case icApplyPixel2Named:
9863 pXform->Apply(pApply, NamedColor, pSrc);
9864 break;
9865
9866 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
9867 if (j==0) {
9868 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9869 }
9870
9871 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, NamedColor);
9872
9873 if (rv) {
9874 return rv;
9875 }
9876 break;
9877
9878 default:
9879 break;
9880 }
9881 }
9882 else {
9883 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
9884 }
9885 pSrc = pDst;
9886 }
9887
9888 pApply = i->ptr;
9889 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9890 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9891 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
9892
9893 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
9894 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
9895 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9896 break;
9897
9898 case icApplyPixel2Named:
9899 default:
9900 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9901 break;
9902
9903 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
9904 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, NamedColor);
9905 if (rv) {
9906 return rv;
9907 }
9908 break;
9909
9910 }
9911 }
9912 else {
9913 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9914 }
9915
9916 }
9917 else if (n==1) {
9918 i = m_Xforms->begin();
9919
9920 pApply = i->ptr;
9921 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9922 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9923 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9924 }
9925
9926 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
9927 }
9928
9929 SrcPixel += m_pCmm->GetSourceSamples();
9930 DstPixel += m_pCmm->GetDestSamples();
9931 }
9932
9933 return icCmmStatOk;
9934}
9935
9936
9949icStatusCMM CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::Apply(icChar* DstColorName, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
9950{
9951 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
9952 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
9953 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
9954 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
9955 CIccApplyXform *pApply;
9956 const CIccXform *pApplyXform;
9957 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform;
9958
9959 if (!n)
9960 return icCmmStatBadXform;
9961
9962 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
9963 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
9964 }
9965
9966 icChar NamedColor[256];
9967 icStatusCMM rv;
9968
9969 pSrc = SrcPixel;
9970 pDst = m_Pixel;
9971
9972 if (n>1) {
9973 for (j=0, i=m_Xforms->begin(); j<n-1 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
9974
9975 pApply = i->ptr;
9976 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
9977 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
9978 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
9979 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
9980 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
9981 pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
9982 break;
9983
9984 case icApplyPixel2Named:
9985 pXform->Apply(pApply, NamedColor, pSrc);
9986 break;
9987
9988 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
9989 if (j==0) {
9990 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
9991 }
9992 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, NamedColor);
9993 if (rv) {
9994 return rv;
9995 }
9996 break;
9997
9998 default:
9999 break;
10000 }
10001 }
10002 else {
10003 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
10004 }
10005 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
10006 pSrc = pDst;
10007 if (pTmp==SrcPixel)
10008 pDst = m_Pixel2;
10009 else
10010 pDst = pTmp;
10011 }
10012
10013 pApply = i->ptr;
10014 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10015 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10016 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10017 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
10018
10019 case icApplyPixel2Named:
10020 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstColorName, pSrc);
10021 break;
10022
10023 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
10024 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
10025 default:
10026 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10027 break;
10028 }
10029 }
10030 else {
10031 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10032 }
10033
10034 }
10035 else if (n==1) {
10036 i = m_Xforms->begin();
10037 pApply = i->ptr;
10038 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10039 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()!=icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10040 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10041 }
10042
10043 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10044 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstColorName, pSrc);
10045 }
10046
10047 return icCmmStatOk;
10048}
10049
10050
10063icStatusCMM CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icChar *SrcColorName, icFloatNumber tint/*=1.0*/)
10064{
10065 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
10066 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
10067 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
10068 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
10069 CIccApplyXform *pApply;
10070 const CIccXform *pApplyXform;
10071 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform;
10072
10073 if (!n)
10074 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10075
10076 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
10077 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
10078 }
10079
10080 icChar NamedColor[255];
10081 icStatusCMM rv;
10082
10083 i=m_Xforms->begin();
10084 pApply = i->ptr;
10085 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10086 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()!=icXformTypeNamedColor)
10087 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10088
10089 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10090
10091 pDst = m_Pixel;
10092
10093 if (n>1) {
10094 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, SrcColorName, tint);
10095 if (rv) {
10096 return rv;
10097 }
10098
10099 pSrc = pDst;
10100 pDst = m_Pixel2;
10101
10102 for (j=0, i++; j<n-2 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
10103
10104 pApply = i->ptr;
10105 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10106 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10107 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10108 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
10109 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
10110 pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
10111 break;
10112
10113 case icApplyPixel2Named:
10114 pXform->Apply(pApply, NamedColor, pSrc);
10115 break;
10116
10117 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
10118 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, NamedColor);
10119 if (rv) {
10120 return rv;
10121 }
10122 break;
10123
10124 default:
10125 break;
10126 }
10127 }
10128 else {
10129 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
10130 }
10131 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
10132 pSrc = pDst;
10133 pDst = pTmp;
10134 }
10135
10136 pApply = i->ptr;
10137 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10138 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10139 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10140 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
10141 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
10142 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
10143 break;
10144
10145 case icApplyPixel2Named:
10146 default:
10147 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10148 break;
10149
10150 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
10151 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, NamedColor);
10152 if (rv) {
10153 return rv;
10154 }
10155 break;
10156
10157 }
10158 }
10159 else {
10160 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, pSrc);
10161 }
10162
10163 }
10164 else if (n==1) {
10165 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, DstPixel, SrcColorName, tint);
10166 if (rv) {
10167 return rv;
10168 }
10169 }
10170
10171
10172 return icCmmStatOk;
10173}
10174
10187icStatusCMM CIccApplyNamedColorCmm::Apply(icChar *DstColorName, const icChar *SrcColorName, icFloatNumber tint/*=1.0*/)
10188{
10189 icFloatNumber *pDst, *pTmp;
10190 const icFloatNumber *pSrc;
10191 CIccApplyXformList::iterator i;
10192 int j, n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
10193 icChar NamedColor[256];
10194 icStatusCMM rv;
10195 CIccApplyXform *pApply;
10196 const CIccXform *pApplyXform;
10197 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform;
10198
10199 if (!n)
10200 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10201
10202 if (!m_Pixel && !InitPixel()) {
10203 return icCmmStatAllocErr;
10204 }
10205
10206 i=m_Xforms->begin();
10207
10208 pApply = i->ptr;
10209 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10210 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()!=icXformTypeNamedColor)
10211 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10212
10213 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10214
10215 pDst = m_Pixel;
10216
10217 if (n>1) {
10218 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, SrcColorName, tint);
10219
10220 if (rv) {
10221 return rv;
10222 }
10223
10224 pSrc = pDst;
10225 pDst = m_Pixel2;
10226
10227 for (j=0, i++; j<n-2 && i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++, j++) {
10228
10229 pApply = i->ptr;
10230 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10231 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10232 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10233 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
10234 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
10235 pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
10236 break;
10237
10238
10239 case icApplyPixel2Named:
10240 pXform->Apply(pApply, NamedColor, pSrc);
10241 break;
10242
10243 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
10244 rv = pXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, NamedColor);
10245 if (rv) {
10246 return rv;
10247 }
10248 break;
10249
10250 default:
10251 break;
10252 }
10253 }
10254 else {
10255 pApplyXform->Apply(pApply, pDst, pSrc);
10256 }
10257 pTmp = (icFloatNumber*)pSrc;
10258 pSrc = pDst;
10259 pDst = pTmp;
10260 }
10261
10262 pApply = i->ptr;
10263 pApplyXform = pApply->GetXform();
10264 if (pApplyXform->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10265 pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor*)pApplyXform;
10266 switch(pXform->GetInterface()) {
10267 case icApplyPixel2Named:
10268 pXform->Apply(pApply, DstColorName, pSrc);
10269 break;
10270
10271 case icApplyPixel2Pixel:
10272 case icApplyNamed2Pixel:
10273 default:
10274 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10275 break;
10276 }
10277 }
10278 else {
10279 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10280 }
10281
10282 }
10283 else if (n==1) {
10284 return icCmmStatIncorrectApply;
10285 }
10286
10287 return icCmmStatOk;
10288}
10289
10303CIccNamedColorCmm::CIccNamedColorCmm(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace, icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace,
10304 bool bFirstInput) : CIccCmm(nSrcSpace, nDestSpace, bFirstInput)
10305{
10306 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Pixel;
10307}
10308
10317CIccNamedColorCmm::~CIccNamedColorCmm()
10318{
10319}
10320
10321
10339icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::AddXform(const icChar *szProfilePath,
10340 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
10341 icXformInterp nInterp /*icXformInterp*/,
10342 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
10343 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
10344 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
10345 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/,
10346 bool bUseSubProfile /*=false*/)
10347{
10348 CIccProfile *pProfile = OpenIccProfile(szProfilePath, bUseSubProfile);
10349
10350 if (!pProfile)
10351 return icCmmStatCantOpenProfile;
10352
10353 icStatusCMM rv = AddXform(pProfile, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
10354
10355 if (rv != icCmmStatOk)
10356 delete pProfile;
10357
10358 return rv;
10359}
10360
10379icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::AddXform(CIccProfile *pProfile,
10380 icRenderingIntent nIntent /*=icUnknownIntent*/,
10381 icXformInterp nInterp /*=icInterpLinear*/,
10382 IIccProfileConnectionConditions *pPcc/*=NULL*/,
10383 icXformLutType nLutType /*=icXformLutColor*/,
10384 bool bUseD2BxB2DxTags /*=true*/,
10385 CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager /*=NULL*/)
10386{
10387 icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace, nDstSpace;
10388 CIccXformPtr Xform;
10389 bool bInput = !m_bLastInput;
10390 icStatusCMM rv;
10391 icXformLutType nUseLutType = nLutType;
10392
10393 switch(pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass) {
10394 case icSigMaterialIdentificationClass:
10395 case icSigMaterialLinkClass:
10396 nIntent = icPerceptual;
10397 nLutType = icXformLutMCS;
10398 break;
10399
10400 case icSigMaterialVisualizationClass:
10401 nLutType = icXformLutMCS;
10402 break;
10403
10404 default:
10405 break;
10406 }
10407
10408 Xform.ptr = NULL;
10409 switch (nUseLutType) {
10410 //Automatically choose which one
10411 case icXformLutColor:
10412 case icXformLutColorimetric:
10413 case icXformLutSpectral:
10414 case icXformLutNamedColor:
10415 {
10416 CIccTag *pTag = pProfile->FindTag(icSigNamedColor2Tag);
10417
10418 if (pTag && (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass==icSigNamedColorClass || nLutType == icXformLutNamedColor)) {
10419 if (bInput) {
10420 nSrcSpace = icSigNamedData;
10421 }
10422 else if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || ((bUseD2BxB2DxTags || !pProfile->m_Header.pcs) && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric)) {
10423 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
10424 bUseD2BxB2DxTags = true;
10425 }
10426 else {
10427 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10428 }
10429
10430 if (!m_Xforms->size()) {
10431 if (m_nSrcSpace==icSigUnknownData) {
10432 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
10433 }
10434 else {
10435 nSrcSpace = m_nSrcSpace;
10436 }
10437 }
10438 else {
10439 if (m_nLastSpace==icSigUnknownData) {
10440 m_nLastSpace = nSrcSpace;
10441 }
10442 else {
10443 nSrcSpace = m_nLastSpace;
10444 }
10445 }
10446
10447 if (nSrcSpace==icSigNamedData) {
10448 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || (bUseD2BxB2DxTags && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric)) {
10449 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
10450 bUseD2BxB2DxTags = true;
10451 }
10452 else {
10453 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10454 }
10455 bInput = true;
10456 }
10457 else {
10458 nDstSpace = icSigNamedData;
10459 bInput = false;
10460 }
10461
10462 Xform.ptr = CIccXform::Create(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, icXformLutNamedColor, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
10463 if (!Xform.ptr) {
10464 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10465 }
10466 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor *)Xform.ptr;
10467 rv = pXform->SetSrcSpace(nSrcSpace);
10468 if (rv)
10469 return rv;
10470
10471 rv = pXform->SetDestSpace(nDstSpace);
10472 if (rv)
10473 return rv;
10474 }
10475 else {
10476 //It isn't named color so make we will use color lut.
10477 if (nUseLutType==icXformLutNamedColor)
10478 nUseLutType = icXformLutColor;
10479
10480 //Check pProfile if nIntent and input can be found.
10481 if (bInput) {
10482 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10483
10484 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || ((bUseD2BxB2DxTags || !pProfile->m_Header.pcs) && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric)) {
10485 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
10486 bUseD2BxB2DxTags = true;
10487 }
10488 else
10489 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10490 }
10491 else {
10492 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigLinkClass) {
10493 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10494 }
10495 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigAbstractClass) {
10496 bInput = true;
10497 nIntent = icPerceptual; // Note: icPerceptualIntent = 0
10498 }
10499
10500 if (nLutType == icXformLutSpectral || ((bUseD2BxB2DxTags || !pProfile->m_Header.pcs) && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS && nLutType != icXformLutColorimetric)) {
10501 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
10502 bUseD2BxB2DxTags = true;
10503 }
10504 else
10505 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10506
10507 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10508 }
10509 }
10510 }
10511 break;
10512
10513 case icXformLutPreview:
10514 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10515 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10516 bInput = false;
10517 break;
10518
10519 case icXformLutGamut:
10520 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10521 nDstSpace = icSigGamutData;
10522 bInput = true;
10523 break;
10524
10525 case icXformLutBRDFParam:
10526 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10527 nDstSpace = icSigUnknownData;
10528 break;
10529
10530 case icXformLutBRDFDirect:
10531 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10532 nDstSpace = icSigUnknownData;
10533 break;
10534
10535 case icXformLutMCS:
10536 switch(pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass)
10537 {
10538 case icSigInputClass:
10539 case icSigMaterialIdentificationClass:
10540 nSrcSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10541 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
10542 break;
10543 case icSigMaterialVisualizationClass:
10544 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
10545 if (bUseD2BxB2DxTags && pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS) {
10546 nDstSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.spectralPCS;
10547 }
10548 else {
10549 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.pcs;
10550 }
10551 bInput = true;
10552 break;
10553
10554 case icSigMaterialLinkClass:
10555 nSrcSpace = (icColorSpaceSignature)pProfile->m_Header.mcs;
10556 nDstSpace = pProfile->m_Header.colorSpace;
10557 break;
10558
10559 default:
10560 return icCmmStatBadLutType;
10561 }
10562 break;
10563
10564 default:
10565 return icCmmStatBadLutType;
10566 }
10567
10568 //Make sure color spaces match with previous xforms
10569 if (!m_Xforms->size()) {
10570 if (m_nSrcSpace == icSigUnknownData) {
10571 m_nLastSpace = nSrcSpace;
10572 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
10573 }
10574 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nSrcSpace, nSrcSpace) && !IsNChannelCompat(m_nSrcSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
10575 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10576 }
10577 }
10578 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nLastSpace, nSrcSpace) && !IsNChannelCompat(m_nSrcSpace, nSrcSpace)) {
10579 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10580 }
10581
10582 if (!m_Xforms->size())
10583 m_nSrcSpace = nSrcSpace;
10584
10585 m_nDestSpace = nDstSpace;
10586
10587 //Automatic creation of intent from header/last profile
10588 if (nIntent==icUnknownIntent) {
10589 if (bInput) {
10590 nIntent = (icRenderingIntent)pProfile->m_Header.renderingIntent;
10591 }
10592 else {
10593 nIntent = m_nLastIntent;
10594 }
10595 if (nIntent == icUnknownIntent)
10596 nIntent = icPerceptual;
10597 }
10598
10599 if (!Xform.ptr)
10600 Xform.ptr = CIccXform::Create(pProfile, bInput, nIntent, nInterp, pPcc, nUseLutType, bUseD2BxB2DxTags, pHintManager);
10601
10602 if (!Xform.ptr) {
10603 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10604 }
10605
10606 m_nLastSpace = Xform.ptr->GetDstSpace();
10607 m_nLastIntent = nIntent;
10608
10609 if (pProfile->m_Header.deviceClass == icSigLinkClass)
10610 bInput = false;
10611 m_bLastInput = bInput;
10612
10613 m_Xforms->push_back(Xform);
10614
10615 return icCmmStatOk;
10616}
10617
10628 icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::Begin(bool bAllocNewApply/* =true */, bool bUsePcsConversion/*=false*/)
10629{
10630 if (m_nDestSpace==icSigUnknownData) {
10631 m_nDestSpace = m_nLastSpace;
10632 }
10633 else if (!IsCompatSpace(m_nDestSpace, m_nLastSpace) && !IsCompatSpacePCS(m_nDestSpace, m_nLastSpace)) {
10634 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10635 }
10636
10637 if (m_nSrcSpace != icSigNamedData) {
10638 if (m_nDestSpace != icSigNamedData) {
10639 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Pixel;
10640 }
10641 else {
10642 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyPixel2Named;
10643 }
10644 }
10645 else {
10646 if (m_nDestSpace != icSigNamedData) {
10647 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyNamed2Pixel;
10648 }
10649 else {
10650 m_nApplyInterface = icApplyNamed2Named;
10651 }
10652 }
10653
10654 CheckPCSRangeConversions();
10655 SetLateBindingCC();
10656
10657 icStatusCMM rv;
10658 CIccXformList::iterator i;
10659
10660 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
10661 rv = i->ptr->Begin();
10662
10663 if (rv!= icCmmStatOk) {
10664 return rv;
10665 }
10666 }
10667
10668 rv = CheckPCSConnections(bUsePcsConversion);
10669 if (rv != icCmmStatOk && rv!=icCmmStatIdentityXform)
10670 return rv;
10671
10672 if (bAllocNewApply) {
10673 rv = icCmmStatOk;
10674
10675 m_pApply = GetNewApplyCmm(rv);
10676 }
10677 else
10678 rv = icCmmStatOk;
10679
10680 return rv;
10681}
10682
10693 CIccApplyCmm *CIccNamedColorCmm::GetNewApplyCmm(icStatusCMM &status)
10694 {
10695 CIccApplyCmm *pApply = new CIccApplyNamedColorCmm(this);
10696
10697 CIccXformList::iterator i;
10698
10699 for (i=m_Xforms->begin(); i!=m_Xforms->end(); i++) {
10700 CIccApplyXform *pXform = i->ptr->GetNewApply(status);
10701 if (status != icCmmStatOk || !pXform) {
10702 delete pApply;
10703 return NULL;
10704 }
10705 pApply->AppendApplyXform(pXform);
10706 }
10707
10708 m_bValid = true;
10709
10710 status = icCmmStatOk;
10711 return pApply;
10712}
10713
10714
10727icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::Apply(icChar* DstColorName, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
10728{
10729 return ((CIccApplyNamedColorCmm*)m_pApply)->Apply(DstColorName, SrcPixel);
10730}
10731
10732
10745icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icChar *SrcColorName, icFloatNumber tint/*=1.0*/)
10746{
10747 return ((CIccApplyNamedColorCmm*)m_pApply)->Apply(DstPixel, SrcColorName, tint);
10748}
10749
10750
10763icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::Apply(icChar* DstColorName, const icChar *SrcColorName, icFloatNumber tint/*=1.0*/)
10764{
10765 return ((CIccApplyNamedColorCmm*)m_pApply)->Apply(DstColorName, SrcColorName, tint);
10766}
10767
10768
10780icStatusCMM CIccNamedColorCmm::SetLastXformDest(icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace)
10781{
10782 int n = (int)m_Xforms->size();
10783 CIccXformPtr *pLastXform;
10784
10785 if (!n)
10786 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10787
10788 pLastXform = &m_Xforms->back();
10789
10790 if (pLastXform->ptr->GetXformType()==icXformTypeNamedColor) {
10791 CIccXformNamedColor *pXform = (CIccXformNamedColor *)pLastXform->ptr;
10792 if (pXform->GetSrcSpace() == icSigNamedData &&
10793 nDestSpace == icSigNamedData) {
10794 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10795 }
10796
10797 if (nDestSpace != icSigNamedData &&
10798 pXform->GetDstSpace() == icSigNamedData) {
10799 return icCmmStatBadSpaceLink;
10800 }
10801
10802 return pXform->SetDestSpace(nDestSpace);
10803 }
10804
10805 return icCmmStatBadXform;
10806}
10807
10808
10816CIccMruCmm::CIccMruCmm()
10817{
10818 m_pCmm = NULL;
10819 m_bDeleteCmm = false;
10820 m_nCacheSize = 0;
10821}
10822
10823
10831CIccMruCmm::~CIccMruCmm()
10832{
10833 if (m_pCmm && m_bDeleteCmm)
10834 delete m_pCmm;
10835}
10836
10837
10858CIccMruCmm* CIccMruCmm::Attach(CIccCmm *pCmm, icUInt8Number nCacheSize/* =4 */, bool bDeleteCmm/*=true*/)
10859{
10860 if (!pCmm || !nCacheSize)
10861 return NULL;
10862
10863 if (!pCmm->Valid()) {
10864 if (bDeleteCmm)
10865 delete pCmm;
10866 return NULL;
10867 }
10868
10869 CIccMruCmm *rv = new CIccMruCmm();
10870
10871 rv->m_pCmm = pCmm;
10872 rv->m_nCacheSize = nCacheSize;
10873 rv->m_bDeleteCmm = bDeleteCmm;
10874
10875 rv->m_nSrcSpace = pCmm->GetSourceSpace();
10876 rv->m_nDestSpace = pCmm->GetDestSpace();
10877 rv->m_nLastSpace = pCmm->GetLastSpace();
10878 rv->m_nLastIntent = pCmm->GetLastIntent();
10879
10880 if (rv->Begin()!=icCmmStatOk) {
10881 delete rv;
10882 return NULL;
10883 }
10884
10885 return rv;
10886}
10887
10888CIccApplyCmm *CIccMruCmm::GetNewApplyCmm(icStatusCMM &status)
10889{
10890 CIccApplyMruCmm *rv = new CIccApplyMruCmm(this);
10891
10892 if (!rv) {
10893 status = icCmmStatAllocErr;
10894 return NULL;
10895 }
10896
10897 if (!rv->Init(m_pCmm, m_nCacheSize)) {
10898 delete rv;
10899 status = icCmmStatBad;
10900 return NULL;
10901 }
10902
10903 return rv;
10904}
10905
10913template<class T>
10914CIccMruCache<T>::CIccMruCache()
10915{
10916 m_cache = NULL;
10917 m_nNumPixel = 0;
10918 m_pixelData = NULL;
10919 m_nSrcSamples = 0;
10920 m_pFirst = NULL;
10921}
10922
10930template<class T>
10931CIccMruCache<T>::~CIccMruCache()
10932{
10933 if (m_cache)
10934 delete[] m_cache;
10935
10936 if (m_pixelData)
10937 free(m_pixelData);
10938}
10939
10954template<class T>
10955bool CIccMruCache<T>::Init(icUInt16Number nSrcSamples, icUInt16Number nDstSamples, icUInt16Number nCacheSize)
10956{
10957 m_nSrcSamples = nSrcSamples;
10958 m_nSrcSize = nSrcSamples * sizeof(T);
10959 m_nDstSize = nDstSamples * sizeof(T);
10960
10961 m_nTotalSamples = m_nSrcSamples + nDstSamples;
10962
10963 m_nNumPixel = 0;
10964 m_nCacheSize = nCacheSize;
10965
10966 m_pFirst = NULL;
10967 m_cache = new CIccMruPixel<T>[nCacheSize];
10968
10969 if (!m_cache)
10970 return false;
10971
10972 m_pixelData = (T*)malloc((int)nCacheSize * m_nTotalSamples * sizeof(T));
10973
10974 if (!m_pixelData)
10975 return false;
10976
10977 return true;
10978}
10979
10980template<class T>
10981CIccMruCache<T> *CIccMruCache<T>::NewMruCache(icUInt16Number nSrcSamples, icUInt16Number nDstSamples, icUInt16Number nCacheSize /* = 4 */)
10982{
10983 CIccMruCache<T> *rv = new CIccMruCache<T>;
10984
10985 if (!rv->Init(nSrcSamples, nDstSamples, nCacheSize)) {
10986 delete rv;
10987 return NULL;
10988 }
10989
10990 return rv;
10991}
10992
11008template<class T>
11009bool CIccMruCache<T>::Apply(T *DstPixel, const T *SrcPixel)
11010{
11011 CIccMruPixel<T> *ptr, *prev = NULL, *last = NULL;
11012 int i;
11013 T *pixel;
11014
11015 for (ptr = m_pFirst, i = 0; ptr; ptr = ptr->pNext, i++) {
11016 if (!memcmp(SrcPixel, ptr->pPixelData, m_nSrcSize)) {
11017 memcpy(DstPixel, &ptr->pPixelData[m_nSrcSamples], m_nDstSize);
11018 if (ptr != m_pFirst) {
11019 last->pNext = ptr->pNext;
11020
11021 ptr->pNext = m_pFirst;
11022 m_pFirst = ptr;
11023 }
11024 return true;
11025 }
11026 prev = last;
11027 last = ptr;
11028 }
11029
11030 //If we get here SrcPixel is not in the cache
11031 if (i < m_nCacheSize) {
11032 pixel = &m_pixelData[i*m_nTotalSamples];
11033
11034 ptr = &m_cache[i];
11035 ptr->pPixelData = pixel;
11036
11037 if (m_pFirst) {
11038 ptr->pNext = m_pFirst;
11039 }
11040 m_pFirst = ptr;
11041 }
11042 else { //Reuse oldest value and put it at the front of the list
11043 if (prev)
11044 prev->pNext = NULL;
11045 last->pNext = m_pFirst;
11046
11047 m_pFirst = last;
11048 pixel = last->pPixelData;
11049 }
11050 T *dest = &pixel[m_nSrcSamples];
11051
11052 memcpy(pixel, SrcPixel, m_nSrcSize);
11053
11054 return false;
11055}
11056
11057template<class T>
11058void CIccMruCache<T>::Update(T* DstPixel)
11059{
11060 memcpy(&m_pFirst->pPixelData[m_nSrcSamples], DstPixel, m_nDstSize);
11061}
11062
11063//Make sure typedef classes get built
11064template class CIccMruCache<icFloatNumber>;
11065template class CIccMruCache<icUInt8Number>;
11066template class CIccMruCache<icUInt16Number>;
11067
11068
11069CIccApplyMruCmm::CIccApplyMruCmm(CIccMruCmm *pCmm) : CIccApplyCmm(pCmm)
11070{
11071 m_pCachedCmm = NULL;
11072 m_pCache = NULL;
11073}
11074
11082CIccApplyMruCmm::~CIccApplyMruCmm()
11083{
11084 if (m_pCache)
11085 delete m_pCache;
11086
11087}
11088
11103bool CIccApplyMruCmm::Init(CIccCmm *pCachedCmm, icUInt16Number nCacheSize)
11104{
11105 m_pCachedCmm = pCachedCmm;
11106
11107 m_pCache = CIccMruCacheFloat::NewMruCache(m_pCmm->GetSourceSamples(), m_pCmm->GetDestSamples(), nCacheSize);
11108
11109 if (!m_pCache)
11110 return false;
11111
11112 return true;
11113}
11114
11129icStatusCMM CIccApplyMruCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel)
11130{
11131#if defined(_DEBUG)
11132 if (!m_pCache)
11133 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
11134#endif
11135
11136 if (!m_pCache->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel)) {
11137
11138 m_pCachedCmm->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
11139
11140 m_pCache->Update(DstPixel);
11141 }
11142
11143 return icCmmStatOk;
11144}
11145
11161icStatusCMM CIccApplyMruCmm::Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icUInt32Number nPixels)
11162{
11163 icUInt32Number k;
11164
11165#if defined(_DEBUG)
11166 if (!m_pCache)
11167 return icCmmStatInvalidLut;
11168#endif
11169
11170 for (k=0; k<nPixels;k++) {
11171 if (!m_pCache->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel)) {
11172 m_pCachedCmm->Apply(DstPixel, SrcPixel);
11173 m_pCache->Update(DstPixel);
11174 }
11175 SrcPixel += m_pCmm->GetSourceSamples();
11176 DstPixel += m_pCmm->GetDestSamples();
11177 }
11178
11179 return icCmmStatOk;
11180}
11181

11184} //namespace refIccMAX

◆ IsNChannelCompat

#define IsNChannelCompat (   x,
  y 
)    ((IsSpaceNChannel(x) && icNumColorSpaceChannels(x)==icGetSpaceSamples(y)) || (IsSpaceNChannel(y) && icNumColorSpaceChannels(y)==icGetSpaceSamples(x)))

◆ IsSpaceCMYK

#define IsSpaceCMYK (   x)    ((x)==icSigCmykData || (x)==icSig4colorData)

◆ IsSpaceColorimetricPCS

#define IsSpaceColorimetricPCS (   x)    ((x)==icSigXYZPcsData || (x)==icSigLabPcsData)

◆ IsSpaceDevicePCS

#define IsSpaceDevicePCS (   x)    ((x)==icSigDevXYZData || (x)==icSigDevLabData)

◆ IsSpaceMCS

#define IsSpaceMCS (   x)    (icGetColorSpaceType(x)==icSigSrcMCSChannelData)

◆ IsSpaceNChannel

#define IsSpaceNChannel (   x)    (icGetColorSpaceType(x)==icSigNChannelData)

◆ IsSpacePCS

#define IsSpacePCS (   x)    (IsSpaceColorimetricPCS(x) || IsSpaceSpectralPCS(x))

static
97{
98 sig = icGetColorSpaceType(sig);
99

101 sig==icSigTransmissionSpectralPcsData ||
102 sig==icSigRadiantSpectralPcsData ||

)
static
5342{
